column4: if you want to learn your lesson and finally experience inner wealth.

column1: 622;RADIX_0000000000001988;Lilith - The Suppressed Femininity;"Lilith is not a planet but a calculated so called 'sensitive' point. Its position on the chart is determined by the elliptical orbit of the Moon around the Earth. First the points on the Moon's orbit furthest from the Earth are connected by an axis. Lilith is found at the point along this axis directly across from the Earth at the same distance from the center of the ellipse. Next to the Earth
column2: this point is the second focal point on the Moon's orbit. Lilith's orbit takes 3232 days
column3: about 8.9 years.

column1: To interpret its position in the chart
column2: it is important to know Lilith's history. She was Adam's first wife and was thrown out of Paradise because she refused to surrender to him on the grounds of her sex. She then lived with demons
column3: with whom she bore innumerable children at the Red Sea. The angels sent from God eventually found her and demanded that she return to Adam. Lilith refused. As punishment one hundred of her children were killed each day. Lilith went mad with grief and commenced killing others. Her victims were women in childbed
column4: small children and men
column5: who she first seduced and then killed. Apart from that
column6: she was also supposed to have appeared as a serpent in Paradise and offered Eve the apple from the tree of knowledge
column7: which led to their expulsion from Paradise.

column1: Also an additional name for Lilith offers insight into its meaning in the horoscope: Lilith is also called the Black Moon (and is illustrated as such) becoming the other
column2: unseen side of femininity. She is not only the creator of life but also brings death
column3: pain and disaster. She played an important role in the ancient Astrology of Babylon and Assyria
column4: which was rediscovered as women in the sixties and seventies emancipated themselves
column5: demanding the rights to regulate their own sexual behavior
column6: birth control
column7: abortion and demanded equal treatment. It is not surprising that women were attracted to Lilith nor that the literature on Lilith interpretations was written mainly by women.

column1: In light of modern psychology
column2: interpretations of Lilith's position tells us about unfulfilled wishes
column3: the suppressed shadow-side of our personality
column4: painful experiences
column5: privation and darkness. As with Pluto
column6: the processes triggered here should lead to self-recognition and the acceptance of our dark side. Good and bad should nt be differentiated from each other
column7: but human existence should be seen as many-faceted.

column1: In a man's horoscope
column2: Lilith can reveal what type of woman he fears most and which type of woman can drive him to despair."

column1: 623;RADIX_0000000000000644;Chiron - The Social Attitude;"Chiron is a relatively small celestial body discovered on the 1st of November 1977. Its orbit lies between Saturn and Uranus. Chiron takes between 50 and 51 years to orbit the Sun. Its elliptical orbit causes it to spend a varying duration of time in each sign. Chiron travels through Libra in no more than 18 months while it remains in Aries for eight years. Some Astrologers let Chiron rule the sign Virgo
column2: others opt for Sagittarius.

column1: The preliminary interpretations of Chiron have understandably not progressed too far. Its astrological exploration is just beginning. As with all the planets discovered in modern times
column2: the general mood and the situation of the entire human race at the time of the discovery are taken into account in Chiron's interpretations. Chiron's symbol resembles a key.

column1: A second indication to its interpretation is its role in ancient mythology. Chiron was a Centaur
column2: half human and half horse. He was a healer
column3: astrologer
column4: teacher
column5: musician and warrior in one. The great heroes like Heracles
column6: Achilles and Orpheus were all taught by him. He also founded the Asclepeion
column7: a center where the sick were healed and medicine was taught. Interestingly enough
column8: Chiron was wounded by an arrow shot by Heracles
column9: which was dipped in a poison he himself discovered. Chiron suffered great pain
column10: but him being immortal
column11: could not die. He withdrew to a cave and was not freed from his agony until he willingly ascended to the underworld

column1: As mentioned above
column2: Chiron orbits the Sun between Saturn and Uranus; between the last inner planet and the first outer planet. This key position has granted Chiron the role as a bridge between the inner and outer planets. Through Chiron's experience the mysterious planets
column3: Uranus
column4: Neptune and Pluto
column5: become more accessible. The collective energies of these planets can be experienced and utilized with Chiron's help.

column1: A closer look at the time since Chiron's discovery reveals an intensive search for meaning. More and more individuals have come to understand the necessity of united insight and action. Thus
column2: Chiron appears to be an inner guide offering light in the midst of darkness
column3: opening the spirit for experiences beyond daily routine.

column1: The development of a positive collective consciousness that alone can bring about the necessary upheaval to create a peaceful and secure future may
column2: due to the discovery of Chiron
column3: not remain merely a dream.

column1: If you are interested in learning more about this topic
column2: its best to start thinking about the position of Chiron in your own horoscope. You may discover key experiences which altered your thinking and perception. Special attention should be paid to Chiron's square aspects while in transit
column3: which
column4: according to the position of Chiron in the natal chart
column5: may take place at different ages."

column1: 624;RADIX_0000000000002244;The Ascendant - Gate to the External World;"The Ascendant is the rising sign in the East at the time of birth. It metaphorically channels our expectations of life. The first impression stays with us throughout the day
column2: influencing each contact and every event. The Ascendant channels all the other energies in the chart actively working to express them. It describes the way we live our natal chart and how we confront our environment
column3: making up an important part of our identity.

column1: As to the question of the differentiation between the Ascendant and the role of the Sun keep in mind how difficult it is for us as well as for others to differentiate the expression of our personality from our personality itself. This question can therefore only be partially resolved. It is much more important to live the positive aspects of your sign and to bring it into harmony with all the other energies and influences."
625;RADIX_0000000000002241;Your Ascendant in Aries;"The driving force in the life of a person with an Aries Ascendant is the energy of Mars
column2: which rules over Aries. You will most certainly notice the influence of its energy. The power wielded here is hardly rivaled in our universe. Especially anything new and foreign attracts and stimulates it.

column1: Whether it is caused by its power or in spite of it
column2: an Aries Ascendant creates dangers that can take two directions. You could develop an arrogance that prevents you from accepting suggestions and constructive criticism from the people around you. This type of behavior results from your drive for independence
column3: which if unchecked
column4: can swell into the delusion that you can get along without anybody in your life. The danger could also lie in the opposite direction. You may endeavor to fulfill all the expectations placed on you. This may come from a lack of self-confidence. You fail to notice how you put yourself under pressure with senseless rivalry.

column1: It is important for you to direct your energy and abilities toward a worthy goal. Create peace in your innermost self and try to be as honest as possible
column2: especially if you cannot bring yourself to listen to what others think.

column1: You may have problems keeping up with your own fast pace and the spontaneous course changes in your life. The people around you will eventually lose patience and you will probably come to regret not ever having carried a sensible activity through to the finish. You run in circles and when whatever it is your doing becomes difficult
column2: you toss it aside for some new endeavor.

column1: On the other hand an Aries Ascendant brings you the valuable ability to keep your self-confidence in a critical environment and to see yourself as a complex being deeply in touch with yourself."

626;RADIX_0000000000018625;Your Ascendant in Taurus;"Your Taurus Ascendant gives you a marked energy reserve; this is why you keep working and pursuing your goal when everyone else has long since given up. You are known for your determination
column2: you love to work on long term projects and make promising investments. You are also a sensitive person and are very sympathetic to the plight of others.

column1: Stability is an important theme in your life. But do not expect to find it in the outside world; this will only make you dependent on others or create a dependency on possessions. Becoming obsessed with collecting material things will cost you your freedom. On the other hand
column2: concentrating on the needs of others could lead you to confuse your needs with theirs
column3: losing yourself. Accept the flow of change in your life. Learn to let go of the past and you will find that flexibility is constantly offering new opportunities.

column1: The negative expression of a Taurus Ascendant is an attachment to comfort and luxury. Your sensuous nature leads you to give in to life's pleasures where you tend to become obsessive. This can lead to compulsive behavior. In addition
column2: you assume that everyone in the world has to see things the way you do. You waste your time with vain attempts to convince people
column3: earning you a reputation for being stubborn and defiant.

column1: The positive side of this Ascendant is best explained by recalling that Taurus is ruled by Venus. Your greatest talent must be accepting people wholeheartedly and without ulterior motives. Once you have found peace with yourself you can be quite generous. You are able to precisely identify the needs of others and offer them what they are lacking. You also have a sense for aesthetics and are musically talented.

Your other talents are in quite different areas. You are practical and earthy. These qualities could enable you to create a solid foundation for your life providing you with the security you are longing for. You will find yourself by following your intuition and your heart. Feel free to express your inner harmony."
627;RADIX_0000000000035009;Your Ascendant in Gemini;"You are an extroverted person
column2: eloquent and interested in nearly everything. Still you feel like you are not progressing enough and are not informed enough about everything. You have not learned that the key to your development has to be found within yourself. Becoming a sponge
column3: soaking up all the contradicting information and opinions in your environment
column4: will only lead to inner confusion. If you begin to identify yourself with things that you have only recently found out about
column5: others will find you flaky.

column1: You sometimes feel inferior. This is because you do not look at others critically but notice their good side first. You are often considered superficial
column2: although you like people and your bubbling personality wins you a lot of friends. The problematic side of this Ascendant is the lack of direction
column3: which allows you to become confused by the myriad possibilities offered in your surroundings and distracts you from consequently following your own path through life. Take care not to place too much emphasis on being witty. This might push people away who cannot grasp your sense of humor at first sight.

column1: Arise to challenges and take the time to put your thoughts in order. This will allow you to commit yourself. You will not have to worry about your understanding for everything and everyone tearing you in different directions. Your clear and definite manner of speaking will help you to find the completeness you are seeking."
628;RADIX_0000000000051393;Your Ascendant in Cancer;"Your Cancer Ascendant makes you seem moody and indecisive
column2: like the Moon
column3: which has its home in this sign. Your delicate nature is probably expressed in soft facial features. To live according to your true self you must keep in touch with your soul and avoid acting contrary to your intuition. This intuition will accompany you through your entire life. Your task lies in learning to differentiate when your inner voice is speaking out of a temporary mood or is expressing a basic need
column4: which you should address in your plans. This will not be easy because you tend to take on other people's problems as your own. You always run the risk of being used
column5: among other things
column6: as an emotional garbage dump. Another quality of the sign Cancer is the tendency to cling to the past. With the wisdom of a mother of teenagers
column7: avoid taking responsibility for people capable of taking care of themselves. If you give in to your caregiver instinct and continually disperse love and warmth
column8: expect to be frequently disappointed and frustrated. You have difficulty maintaining distance from situations and people and are extremely vulnerable
column9: easily offended and quickly feel rejected. It would be a good idea to develop a thicker skin; it most certainly would not do any harm. Use your brain before tuning into the mood of the people who are close to you
column10: although your sensitive nature may make this difficult.

column1: Once you have overcome your uncertainty and found your center
column2: you need not hesitate to follow whims of your spiritual life. Feelings will guide you through life
column3: because your Cancer Ascendant
column4: as a symbol of fertility and birth
column5: will keep you in touch with the tides of life."

column1: 629;RADIX_0000000000067777;Your Ascendant in Leo;"You radiate energy like the Sun and attract people with your creativity
column2: optimism and leadership capabilities. You are often more successful than others
column3: who have trouble getting off the sidelines. You have no problem doing just that
column4: you love being the center of attention and need to rant about on center stage. With your charisma
column5: you will not be overlooked.

column1: Do not deceive yourself: Your behavior holds traps for you; your inclination is to be overconfident and not notice how ridiculous your power struggles are. If you want to achieve the greatness of which you are capable
column2: then you will have to learn to use your extraordinary talents responsibly. That will prevent you from acquiring a false pride
column3: seeing the world as a stage and defying reality to bask in narcissism. It would be a shame if you waste your energy only to draw the envy of your ""subjects"".

column1: You should make it a habit to frequently step back and practice humility. Let someone else have a turn and look on calmly. You need to relax more
column2: no one can hold out controlling everything for very long.

column1: It is important for you to surround yourself with friends who do not hesitate to tell you what they really think and have enough confidence to raise the stakes during a confrontation
column2: not simply applauding you. These friends will help you to recognize what you can actually achieve and help you set sensible goals that will establish relationships based on trust. If you manage that
column3: your natural powers
column4: inspiration and creativity will radiate more strongly than you ever imagined possible."

column1: 630;RADIX_0000000000084161;Your Ascendant in Virgo;"Probably you are often accused of being reserved and too shy and of taking things too seriously. You do not come on as being especially spontaneous and flamboyant. You have trouble simply enjoying the pleasures of life without serious contemplation. This lies in your inclination to worry too much and to always want to have an overview of everything that is happening. This prevents you from relaxing
column2: because your brain keeps on churning. However
column3: this brain has astounding capabilities. You analyze details which others have not even recognized. Your strength is rational thinking. When you are living from your center
column4: others can rely on your judgement. Then you are able to organize your thoughts
column5: refrain from pageantry and not let yourself get distracted from your ambitions.

column1: It may take a long time to reach this point. Your task is to accept the ""chaos"" principle you run into everywhere
column2: which lends chaos to its own kind of organization.

column1: Overcome your resistance to ideas that you cannot understand or explain. Look inside yourself before you jump to criticize. It is for you to learn that your standards are not the only valid ones and that humans are not perfect machines. Try to accept life's imperfections and do not lose sight of the whole picture by concentrating on details.
Once you have accomplished this
column2: you have done your duty. No one is asked for more than to find an inner balance. You will then be able to recognize what is really important in life. Once you have been purified in this manner
column3: you will be able to truly help others."

column1: 631;RADIX_0000000000100545;Your Ascendant in Libra;"Your Libra Ascendant gives you a pleasant exterior and a friendly
column2: charming personality. You decorate your surroundings tastefully. It is no wonder that wherever you go people are glad to see you and so many people
column3: especially the opposite sex
column4: are attracted to you.

column1: You are actually seething under this pleasant facade. This is because your high ideals demand a tranquil environment. You are making it difficult for yourself. You do not realize that you are chasing a dream and are preparing yourself for more and more frustration. You must learn to accept certain unpleasant truths. Consider how much you do for others to gain their acceptance and to raise your own self-esteem.
To achieve contentment with your life
column2: you need to balance your needs with those of others
column3: as the symbol of the scale suggests. Do not simply compromise with your bad feelings but examine their cause at its root. Become aware of your own needs to avoid assuming the needs of others as your own. You can give with astounding selflessness
column4: once you have learned to take just as naturally. Remember that you do not have to make amends to anyone.

column1: When trying to reach a goal
column2: you should not battle frantically
column3: but wait it out calmly. Unity and harmony cannot be forced. When you have realized this
column4: you will become the most valuable gift you can give to anyone. Your willingness to sacrifice will leave no one untouched."

column1: 632;RADIX_0000000000116929;Your Ascendant in Scorpio;"You do not disappear in the crowd. Your extraordinary charm
column2: dark and mysterious
column3: makes you stand out. You are as original and interesting as you appear to be. You search for higher knowledge like an expedition from earlier times that fears no danger
column4: constantly offering challenge to grow and develop.

column1: You are accompanied by the energy of the planet Pluto
column2: which guides you into depths no one else would dare to explore. You can take this risk because you command astounding regenerative powers and are willing to cross any barrier. There could be danger for you and others if you do go too far with this. When you are frustrated you become the most dangerous enemy
column3: stabbing at the most vulnerable places. It is amazing that you seem to disregard yourself and inflict the worst wounds on yourself.

column1: Your desire to continually develop often leaves you feeling discontented with your current state of consciousness. For this reason
column2: you occasionally appear to be embittered
column3: especially when you are unwilling to make compromises. You can be sure that your ""everything or nothing"" attitude is only getting in your way. You would do better if you tried being more lenient on occasion. Your friends will thank you. You will also be out of danger of becoming a loner. It is not necessary to lose your identity through identification with a group to avoid isolation
column4: so do not scare people away.

column1: You find strength in letting the cycles of life and death become a part of you. This enables you to let go when a cycle comes to an end. Use the significance of the principles of regeneration and transformation to guide yourself and others to develop healing qualities."

633;RADIX_0000000000133313;Your Ascendant in Sagittarius;"You can tear through life like an excited child; with intuition and childlike naivet you are able to disclose unseen truths. You are quick to recognize interconnections and then are able to express that concisely. You are generally spontaneous and witty
column2: a people person
column3: not the type to sit alone in a corner at a party.

column1: Not everything in your life runs as smoothly as it first appears. A Sagittarius is a mutable fire sign
column2: which can make it difficult for you to stay with one activity over a period of time and not let yourself be distracted by the prospect of new adventures. The planet Jupiter that rules the sign Sagittarius has extraordinary influence through its principle of expansion; you are attracted by everything that crosses your path and is large or conspicuous. You like to use big words and exaggerate every narration. Even if people listen
column3: because they find you entertaining
column4: you should keep it down or risk that only half of what you say will be believed.

column1: Your behavior is based on your desire to get to know the world
column2: gain deeper insights by understanding everything and find the truth. This brings you to travel often and take part in discussions on the meaning of life. You will not let yourself get tied down too soon; if the Earth element is a strong influence in your horoscope
column3: you will save your dream of a house in the country for your old age.

column1: You radiate hope and optimism. Be careful not to let it mislead you to ignore your failures and continue on in the same way. If you really want to gain insight
column2: then get inside yourself and search there. The simple and unpretentious may be more valuable than you imagine. Finding your center will help you realize great truths that will also prove to be helpful to your friends."

column1: 634;RADIX_0000000000149697;Your Ascendant in Capricorn;"You do not rush into things but consider the consequences and let your sense of responsibility guide you. You are logical and consistent
column2: but sometimes lack spontaneity and a sense of humor
column3: so much so that you have problems with the ""the unbearable lightness of being"". It can go so far as to cause you vague feelings of guilt and to have inhibitions against letting your inner struggles surface. You do not approach others for light conversation.

column1: Everything in your life should have meaning and permanence. To achieve this
column2: you work unusually hard
column3: sometimes embittered but always remaining loyal to your boss. These traits will secure your future in a high position. Your colleges may not always be pleased about this
column4: unless you have realized that positive emotions are essential to our well being and everyone should try to overlook things on occasion. Emotional instability leads you to erect barriers around yourself. You would be better off if
column5: instead of binding up your feelings in a corset of rules and regulations
column6: you ""come out"" occasionally. Material values are not the only significant factor to creating happiness. Try really taking in the beauty of a rose without thinking about the next day at the office. You are not responsible for everything that does not work out.

column1: You should learn not to pay too much attention to status symbols; these are often bought at a high price
column2: namely at the cost of unfulfilled wishes. Consider whether you hold to traditional values out of conviction or if they only serve to create an illusion of security.

column1: Strangely enough
column2: you may loosen up in your old age and live a more youthful existence than you did when you were young. Your practical skills and sober outlook enable you to accomplish a lot for your community and find fulfillment. Your popularity will be at its highest when it does not matter to you any more."

column1: 635;RADIX_0000000000166081;Your Ascendant in Aquarius;"Innovation and progress are very important to you. You like to see yourself as the instigator of new ideas
column2: developments and societal reforms. You reveal yourself as unconventional and take pleasure in relaxing rigid social pressures and proclaiming a new avant-garde lifestyle. As Aquarius is an air sign
column3: you can let your intuition guide you in your endeavors
column4: which will most likely be intellectual. You feel best when working with a group of people of similar convictions. This brings you to collective movements born in the spirit of the times
column5: even though you object to taking a position in a hierarchy.

column1: Personal and intellectual freedoms are priorities for you. This is evident in your active participation in experiments and exploration. Simply hearing the justification ""because it has always been that way"" gets on your nerves and incites rebellion. By constantly getting into new areas
column2: you run the risk of taking on more than you can handle without gaining expertise in any one area. column1: 650;RADIX_0000000000003268;Prolog;"We are pleased to see that you are showing an interest in your horoscope. We use a computer for this delicate task

column1: But what is ASTROLOGY??

Some people maintain that we humans are influenced by strange forces emanating from various planets. The popular press would have us believe that the inhabitants of planet Earth can be divided into twelve different types that they then fill with their shallow perceptions.
Astrology can only be as competent as the people who make use of it. Astrology as such is actually nothing more than a mathematical system
column2: showing a person's planetary representation at the time of birth in a 360 circle.

column1: To accomplish this we consider various factors. The first question to be answered is why these creatures involved in Astrology seem to be infatuated with the exact time of birth. It is really quite simple! We are interested in finding out which ascendant was chosen to experience Earthly life. The twelve houses symbolize the areas of life and the ascendant is the beginning of the FIRST HOUSE
column2: the beginning of the chart.

column1: What is it that awakens the chart's houses to life?
...The planets-each symbolizes a certain type of energy. Their positions within the houses determine into which areas of life their energy is channeled. In addition
column2: the angular relationships of the planets to each other that are called aspects put Astrologers in the position to make statements about the manifestation of these diverse forms of energy in the life of an individual person.

column1: CURIOUS?  You will have to be patient a little longer!
Before we get started on your horoscope
column2: I would like to call your attention to a small problem. As you hold your interpretation in your hands
column3: you may be startled to read that you are characterized differently in the various interpretation texts - Sun in Sagittarius: you are open
column4: warm... followed by Moon in Capricorn: you appear cold and distanced... It is your job to piece them together
column5: because everyone's character is made up of different qualities and you have learned more or less to live with these types of contradictions. Actually it is better to be open about contradictions in your personality

You should try to develop a feeling for the basic energies that are manifested in an aspect or a planet and keep in mind that they may appear in a somewhat different form in your life. Take the opportunity to discover and develop your own form of Astrology. Here you have finally found a field that is not governed by strict rules
column2: but can be formed by your own individual sensitivity.

651;RADIX_0000000000002180;The Part of Fortune - Your Personal Key for True Contentedness;"Everyone asks themselves once in a while what they can do to be happy and finding an answer to this question is not as easy as it may seem

column1: The Part of Fortune is calculated by subtracting the Sun position from the Ascendant position. We add the number of degrees of the moon to this result. A simple formula would look like the following:
Part of Fortune = Ascendant - Sun + Moon
The position of the Sun
column2: the Moon and the Ascendant are not randomly used for calculating the Part of Fortune. It is based on the consideration that the energy of these three bodies are what characterize people and gives them their individual personalities:  The Sun as the symbol of identity and ambition
column3: the Moon for its emotionality and its conscious and subconscious reactions
column4: and finally the Ascendant as the visible personality
column5: which expresses the energies of the Sun and the Moon. The position in the horoscope where Sun
column6: Moon and Ascendant are most harmoniously working together is called the Part of Fortune. The energies of a sign and the affairs of the astrological house concerned will show you how to reach a state of true happiness."

column1: 676;KOMBIN_0000000000000004;The meaning of the Sun in the Composite/Combine;"The Sun's position is especially important to the interpretation of the Composite/Combine charts. column3: which will call for special effort and compromises if it is to lead to a satisfying relationship. Whereas harmonious aspects indicate a common basic drive based on shared convictions. This may prevent conflicts from arising or make those that do show up easy to resolve.

column1: Because the Sun stands for the ability to express yourself in the regular natal chart
column2: your position in the Composite/Combine will demonstrate your ability to develop independently of one another or to suppress aspects of your personality which will make you dissatisfied in the long run."

column1: 678;KOMBIN_0000000000003268;Prolog;"Welcome to the interpretation of your Combine/Composite chart. On the following pages your relationship to a certain person will be described. If you are interested
column2: but arent yet familiar with this method of partnership analysis
column3: a brief introduction follows.

column1: In contrast to the older method of Synastry
column2: the principle of Composite and Combine is to take two individual horoscopes to create a basis for a new single interpretation. Calculating a Composite this is done by finding the midpoints between the same planets in the birth charts of two people
column3: such as the midpoint between his and her Sun. The ascendants are calculated the same way. In theory
column4: the two points should always lie opposite each other
column5: because the calculations are based on a circle
column6: the Zodiac. All the relevant points are determined by a visual estimation of the shorter distance ""between"" the planets. At this point the energies are stronger and therefore have a more intense expression.

column1: Calculating a Combine is somewhat different. Here we take the dates of birth and the geographical positions of the places of birth into account and find the geographical middle as well as the exact birthday (date and time) in the middle and use these to construct the Combine chart.

These method of calculating the energies between people has become popular with Astrologers. The principle behind it takes into account that individuals in interaction with another previously unknown person often display behavior which they havent yet become aware of in themselves or which hasnt come up in other relationships.

Every relationship develops its own dynamics and should therefore have its own horoscope. Keep this in mind whenever you notice deviations from your birth horoscope. If the new partnership leads to new behavior and personality traits
column2: it should be seen as a contribution to your character development. In our opinion
column3: this is also the case when people are encouraged to admit weaknesses.

column1: Basically the following is more an interpretation of the romantic relationship between you and another person
column2: than a business relationship. Thereby the principle of the Composite/Combine can be transferred to every kind of human contact
column3: no matter how different they may be. If you have been doing Astrology for a longer period of time
column4: your experience will be helpful because basically a Composite/Combine is not interpreted any differently than a natal chart. As was already stated
column5: the challenge is to come up with original thoughts and research
column6: for this is still the most productive way of conducting Astrology.

column1: In conclusion
column2: we would like to call attention to the use of gender in the interpretations. The masculine and feminine pronouns used in the texts are not intended to imply that the interpretations are more valid for one sex than the other. The genders are randomly chosen. This is only due to the fact that the English language lacks pronouns which apply to both sexes.

column1: Hopefully
column2: you are now curious enough to devote your attention to the following pages while retaining a critical outlook. As with all of our texts
column3: we wish you fruitful insights!"

column1: In contrast to the older method of Synastry
column2: the principle of Composite and Combine is to take two individual horoscopes to create a basis for a new single interpretation. Calculating a Composite this is done by finding the midpoints between the same planets in the birth charts of two people
column3: such as the midpoint between his and her Sun. The ascendants are calculated the same way. In theory
column4: the two points should always lie opposite each other
column5: because the calculations are based on a circle
column6: the Zodiac. All the relevant points are determined by a visual estimation of the shorter distance ""between"" the planets. At this point the energies are stronger and therefore have a more intense expression.

column1: Calculating a Combine is somewhat different. Here we take the dates of birth and the geographical positions of the places of birth into account and find the geographical middle as well as the exact birthday (date and time) in the middle and use these to construct the Combine chart.

These method of calculating the energies between people has become popular with Astrologers. The principle behind it takes into account that individuals in interaction with another previously unknown person often display behavior which they havent yet become aware of in themselves or which hasnt come up in other relationships.

Every relationship develops its own dynamics and should therefore have its own horoscope. Keep this in mind whenever you notice deviations from your birth horoscope. If the new partnership leads to new behavior and personality traits
column2: it should be seen as a contribution to your character development. In our opinion
column3: this is also the case when people are encouraged to admit weaknesses.

column1: Basically the following is more an interpretation of the romantic relationship between you and another person
column2: than a business relationship. Thereby the principle of the Composite/Combine can be transferred to every kind of human contact
column3: no matter how different they may be. If you have been doing Astrology for a longer period of time
column4: your experience will be helpful because basically a Composite/Combine is not interpreted any differently than a natal chart. As was already stated
column5: the challenge is to come up with original thoughts and research
column6: for this is still the most productive way of conducting Astrology.

column1: In conclusion
column2: we would like to call attention to the use of gender in the interpretations. The masculine and feminine pronouns used in the texts are not intended to imply that the interpretations are more valid for one sex than the other. The genders are randomly chosen. This is only due to the fact that the English language lacks pronouns which apply to both sexes.

column1: Hopefully
column2: you are now curious enough to devote your attention to the following pages while retaining a critical outlook. As with all of our texts
column3: we wish you fruitful insights!"

column1: 680;KOMBIN_0000000000000068;The meaning of the Moon in the Composite/Combine;"The position of the Moon in the Composite/Combine charts is especially significant
column2: because it tells about your emotional bond to each other and if the relationship has a sound emotional foundation. If the Moon receives harmonious aspects you will feel at ease with each other and maybe even feel like you have known each other for a long time
column3: because the Moon symbolizes the past. You won't need a lot of words to understand each other and closeness
column4: warmth and trust should develop quickly.

column1: If the Moon has challenging aspects or if it's in a less favorable house
column2: it may be difficult for you to talk about your feelings and everything that is going on inside you. You may even have an uneasy feeling that something isn't quite right with the relationship and you aren't able to get to the root of the problem. The house position will also tell you which area of life holds the greatest emotional conflicts
column3: while the Moon's aspects tell about the quality of emotions in the partnership and how they effect the other factors."

column1: 682;KOMBIN_0000000000000132;The meaning of Mercury in the Composite/Combine;"As with the natal chart interpretation
column2: Mercury stands for your communication abilities in Composite/Combine charts. Its position tells how well you understand each other
column3: what your conversations are about and if your thought structures are similar. The dynamics of thought is expressed in the relationship; you can recognize the extent to which you can delve into your partner's thoughts and if you come to share the same convictions. Also Mercury's position tells you how honest you are with each other and if you express your thoughts openly. In many relationships it can be observed that there is simply not enough interactive communication; the Composite/Combine Mercury is put out of action.

column1: If Mercury has challenging aspects it may indicate that your communication often ends in misunderstandings and you often talk on different levels. The aspects represent the remaining factors influencing your intellectual bond to each other. A well-placed Mercury will have a favorable effect on the relationship because the danger of misunderstandings will be minimized and disappointments can often be avoided. It also indicates that organizing every day life doesn't pose any great problems and can be approached in a similar manner."

684;KOMBIN_0000000000000196;The meaning of Venus in the Composite/Combine;It goes without saying that the position of Venus in the Composite/Combine chart has special significance for all relationships
column2: not only romantic. It gives information about your ability to love and about what love means to you and what role it plays in your day to day life. You may even come to understand how you came to be attracted to each other. It's not a matter of stability or having a life together
column3: but rather the inexplicable emotions and impulses which keep two people together. This refers to the satisfaction and joy you feel from deep within
column4: which evades  reason and all attempts of discipline. If Venus is in a favorable position it should be an indication that you can get close to each other
column5: share everything without holding back and genuinely feel good about the relationship while its aspects describe the factors which have a supporting or disturbing influence on the way you feel for each other.

column1: 686;KOMBIN_0000000000000260;The meaning of Mars in the Composite/Combine;"Mars position in the Composite/Combine charts describes the relationships potential for releasing energy. It will tell about the areas in which you enjoy doing things together and where you can achieve a lot
column2: provided that you are able to concentrate your strengths. On the other hand the position of Mars describes possible points of conflict
column3: aggressive drives and the tendency to get your way even if it conflicts with your partners interests. Mars doesnt ask about the consequences of anything it does
column4: it just forges on ahead
column5: so that if Mars has challenging aspects it could present problems whenever you act without thinking. This is because neither of you are willing to take control or there is no way of compensating for your overactive drive and slowing it down.

column1: In a romantic relationship
column2: its position will provide a basis for an interpretation of sexuality and describe the emphasis placed on it in the relationship. An unfavorable Mars position could indicate a tendency to use sex as a way of carrying out conflicts
column3: turning it into a power struggle. If one of you has too low or too high self esteem it will result in submissive or domineering behavior. A favorable Mars position may indicate that you both have a healthy ego and are capable of satisfying your needs without infringing on your partner."

column1: 688;KOMBIN_0000000000000324;The meaning of Jupiter in the Composite/Combine;"Jupiters position in the Composite/Combine chart can tell in which areas you have common potential for development. As the planet of luck
column2: Jupiter
column3: together with the corresponding house
column4: symbolizes the area of life where you have the least problems and which gives you the opportunity to expand your horizons. If you find day to day life oppressive and lose yourself in thousands of details
column5: Jupiter will show you how to find the meaning of your relationship which will lead you to a greater understanding of yourself. The area containing Jupiter will also give you the opportunity to make the most out of what you have and to realize humanistic ideals in your relationship. Maybe after this lesson you will see how certain problems from the past are solved in the relationship.

column1: The only difficulty which may arise with Jupiter is the tendency to exaggerate and generally overdo things. Your challenge is to avoid excesses in this area and not to take useful opportunities for granted. Generally you can assume that Jupiters harmonious aspects will bring positive energy and optimism which will make everything a little bit easier."

690;KOMBIN_0000000000000388;The meaning of Saturn in the Composite/Combine;"Saturns position is characterized by a more problematic part of the relationship where diverse causes can surface. You may have had bad experiences with these problems in the past which are still straining your current relationship and prevent trust from developing. Or you are simply insecure how you should act in the area of life represented by that specific house. You may feel restricted
column2: controlled or oppressed. If Saturn has challenging aspects it indicates difficulties expressing your personality
column3: whereby
column4: as personal interaction
column5: your partner plays a significant role.

column1: Once Saturns challenges have been overcome
column2: it will reveal the area which will bring stability to your relationship where you can see your situation especially realistic. Then you will no longer be carrying an idealized vision of your partner
column3: but you are going to accept him as he is. Saturns remaining aspects will show the effects of your power of concentration in conjunction with other factors in your relationship."

column1: 692;KOMBIN_0000000000000452;The meaning of Uranus in the Composite/Combine;"Uranus in the Composite/Combine chart stands for the potential for development in unconventional ways. It stands for the renewal brought about by the partnership and for your readiness to react spontaneously and intuitively to your partners unusual behavior. In the area of life represented by its house position you should be ready for anything because the greatest turbulence may creep up on you unexpectedly in this area. Your spiritual development and your interest in unusual experiences should harmonize with those of your partner
column2: otherwise your differing lifestyles and enthusiasm for experiments may lead to problems. Uranus position and its aspects will tell you whether there is harmony or not.

column1: Uranus will teach you to give your partner freedom and also provide lessons in detachment
column2: if they should be necessary. In spite of this
column3: or because of it
column4: a romantic relationship can continue as a friendship even after it has been ended. Uranus can make it possible. The least number of problems will arise in this context if your expectations are not all too exact and if your partnership is easy going and flexible. Remember that every form of freedom and every advantage open to you has to also be granted to your partner."

column1: 694;KOMBIN_0000000000000516;The meaning of Neptune in the Composite/Combine;"The position of Neptune in the Composite/Combine chart isnt easy to interpret. It basically stands for the spiritual side of a partnership
column2: cherishing your partner and giving him/her unconditional love and affection. There is a reason that Neptune is called the higher octave of Venus
column3: because it represents selfless giving; which can also lead to abuse and completely giving up on oneself
column4: when it reaches a negative extreme. The area of life symbolized by this house also harbors the tendency for long-term self-deception and chasing ideals
column5: which can never be attained. On the other hand you can take advantage of the opportunity to develop an intuitive understanding of each other.

column1: You should become aware of the way you act in this area and ask yourself if you are prepared to come to terms with the reality of your partnership. You should appreciate the extraordinary potential hidden therein which you only need to tap. But dont forget
column2: wherever Neptune is present
column3: wishful thinking will often set the stage."

column1: 696;KOMBIN_0000000000000580;The meaning of Pluto in the Composite/Combine;"Plutos position in the Composite/Combine chart describes the area of life where the partnership should expect great changes. This planet will make sure that previous developments are brought to a close and give you opportunities to prove yourself in new situations. You are also called on to exercise detachment from certain circumstances and to allow people for your continued development and new experiences. If you arent flexible and try to resist this course of events
column2: there will be problems in your relationship brought about by baggage which you cant seem to let go of. Letting yourself get closer to the people you meet up with will give you enough energy to make changes to your way of life. Pluto symbolizes the topics which can be most important to a relationship and may even induce changes.

column1: If Pluto receives negative aspects
column2: you have to be careful not to drift into senseless power struggles or intense competitions in this area. Neither of you likes to give in and both of you try to dominate and manipulate your partner. Still crises can arise which may prove to be healing in the end. Although you may not be able to appreciate the benefits until you have put the events behind you. Additionally
column3: under Plutos influence bursts of emotion and uncontrollable passions may suddenly take over."

column1: 698;KOMBIN_0000000000000006;The Sun in the first house;"Probably you are known for being a harmonious couple who can deal with any situation. The relationship is important to each partner. One especially positive aspect is that each is given enough space for further development. Each supports the other and is willing to admit his own weaknesses without hesitation. This will allow you to form a strong union which will stand up to any opposition. It is very important not to carry out your conflicts in public
column2: and demonstrate how well you complement each other and that your personalities work to help each other mature. It would be safe to assume that the relationship will last a long time and that your partner will help you to see things more clearly. It will also provide both of you with the best opportunities to emphasize the positive sides of your personality and to achieve success by concentrating your energies on one goal which would remain elusive to either of you alone. Maybe others think of you as a power couple
column3: because you always manage to get the people around you excited about starting new projects.

column1: This house position is basically positive
column2: you should only watch out that in spite of the strong relationship you are still able to go out on your own and can handle listening to criticism of your partner. Dont make friendships dependent on your partners acceptance."

column1: 700;KOMBIN_0000000000000390;Saturn in the first house;"This Saturn position can lead you to expect difficulties in your relationship and prevent you from ever really being happy together. It may be that you are so hung up on your partner that you get tangled up in complicated patterns of behavior which serve only to deprive you of your freedom and bring dissatisfaction with time. Eventually frustration may set in which poisons the atmosphere and puts you under increasing pressure. Once this has set in it will be difficult for you to show your feelings and have constructive conversations.
If Saturn receives negative aspects
column2: one of you may feel oppressed in the relationship and will try to break out some day. Make sure that you grant your partner enough freedom and avoid
column3: even unconsciously
column4: seeing the relationship as an institution whose primary purpose is the union. If you are tolerant and accept your partners free will
column5: you will probably stay together a long time
column6: because you will have learned to pull yourself together and talk to each other even under the most difficult circumstances. Until this point it will be a treacherous path."

column1: 702;KOMBIN_0000000000016390;The Sun in the second house;"Because the second house is associated with material possessions
column2: this position of the Sun is especially advantageous for relationships based on business deals or economic purposes. It will come to activities with greater significance in this respect
column3: which may well be successful. In a romantic relationship you will agree with your partner on a workable economic foundation as well as decisions on financial security and life insurance. Possibly you will be doing well financially
column4: live in a beautiful house and both enjoy nurturing your fortunes.

column1: You have similar values and can build a long term relationship
column2: but should watch out that you stay spontaneous and not create a life around material success. Maybe you will both come up with a good  business idea
column3: earn a small fortune and enrich each other with your differing talents. But dont allow yourself to become imprisoned among your valuable furnishings
column4: and have to admit that you have neglected your emotions in favor of a full bank account.

column1: 704;KOMBIN_0000000000032774;The Sun in the third house;"In your relationship everyday conversation plays a great role and is only seldom drown out by silence. The relationship is dependent on a constant exchange of thoughts which makes it exciting. Probably you understand your partner and it doesnt take a lot of words to convey an idea to him. Your thought structures are tuned in to each other and you should complement each other well. It is always easy to organize the household because both of you invest energy in a well thought out daily schedule.

Still you should watch out that the relationship doesnt get over intellectualized or that expectations of perfection in every aspect of life arise because you cant to deal with your partners human weaknesses. There is the danger talking your emotions to death and discussing until no one remembers what the discussion was about. If you try to have deeper discussions and dont neglect emotions
column2: this Sun position should prove to have a positive influence. This constellation should be welcome especially in business relationships. Also friendships should be stress free.

column1: If the Sun receives challenging aspects in the third house
column2: you will sense a desire for spiritual closeness
column3: whereby there will be many hurdles to overcome on the way."

column1: 706;KOMBIN_0000000000049158;The Sun in the  fourth house;"The fourth house plays an important role
column2: especially in the Composite and Combine charts
column3: because its constellation will tell you how important home and family are and how family life is organized. The Sun in this house will provide you with communal roots and your ambitions will be directed towards creating a secure foundation; which is less a question of financial interests than of establishing a feeling of belonging. Probably you live together and take exchanges of insights into the inner world of the other for granted and consider it a prerequisite for harmony. You will never drift apart from each other
column4: but always try to stay in touch and share as many experiences with each other as possible. All of this could stabilize the relationship and help to ensure its longevity. Rest assured that you know each other well and that intimacy is important to both of you. You open yourselves to each other and share common views about life together.

column1: Possibly you prefer to spend a quiet evening relaxing in your living room to going out and meeting people. Which is okay as long as you dont withdraw from others thinking that your partner will be capable of fulfilling every need for the rest of your life. Try to maintain some independence from each other in order to see the other from a somewhat objective distance."

column3: because here emotions are more often suppressed than they are openly expressed. Dont make it your obligation to take care of your partner
column4: but think about how much of what you do is voluntary. You have the potential to help each other without restrictions and to support each other in all situations
column5: still there is the danger that your conscience will pressure you into it because your expectations of a perfect relationship are very high.

column1: Allow yourself some freedom
column2: show no tolerance for inconsistencies and dont force your emotions into a tight corset. If you really want to understand your partner better
column3: then try being more lenient with yourself. You shouldnt forbid yourself to feel the less pleasant emotions once in a while and allow yourself to become furious sometimes. This will enliven the relationship. The positive side of the Moon in the sixth house is the feeling that you can rely on your partner in any and every situation."

column1: 738;KOMBIN_0000000000065606;The Moon in the fifth house;"The fifth house represents pleasure
column2: self expression and creativity. The influence of the Moon will allow you to enjoy being together. You successfully avoid restricting your partner and robbing each other of the opportunity to develop because your intuition tells you that you would only have half has much fun together. Therefore you appreciate each other as you are and are happy to be increasingly more honest with each other. The relationship should be dynamic
column3: probably you will discover your creativity even if you didnt think it was possible.

column1: If the Moon receives challenging aspects
column2: your ties will possibly be too moody and inconsistent to be able to overcome crises together. Also you could be easily insulted because of your exaggerated pride. Maybe you generally have problems committing yourself to this one partner; because you might be missing something. Once you have overcome this hurdle
column3: you will be able to have a happy relationship where kids will play a large role.

column1: This Moon position is also advantageous for business relations
column2: because you will have a lot of ideas and can be especially successful in the entertainment sector or in advertising."

column1: 740;KOMBIN_0000000000049222;The Moon in the fourth house;"The Moon is at home in the fourth house. This constellation will be mostly positive forming a deep emotional bond between you. Especially if you live together or if you want to bring warmth to your surroundings
column2: this Moon position will prove to be helpful. If the Moon forms harmonious aspects then you will probably feel a strong bond to each other and it shouldnt be surprising if you find that you come from similar neighborhoods of even grew up together. In any case you will be able to share stories about your childhood
column3: which greatly simplifies living together in the present. Having a lot to give
column4: you will certainly be able to find the security you so desperately need in this relationship. Maybe you will isolate yourself from the outside world because you are content and want to avoid irritation
column5: but as long as you are happy together everything else will be okay.

column1: If the Moon receives a challenging aspect
column2: it could be that you will become at least partially dependent on each other and be incapable of imagining life without the other. An extreme emotional emphasis makes it necessary to take a look at the relationship from a distance once in a while or at least not to be angry at your friends who honestly express what they think about your relationship."

column1: 742;KOMBIN_0000000000032838;The Moon in the third house;"In your relationship communication will always be determined by your feelings for each other. Basically the third house represents objectivity and sober judgment
column2: still with the Moon in the game everything is different: you make subjective decisions not only about your relationship
column3: but also about everyday decisions and place more trust in your intuition than in reason. That has advantages and disadvantages. Probably you can make yourself understood with very few words and often there is an astounding amount of agreement on the way to do things
column4: which is also very important to you. Arguments or intellectual differences could threaten the foundation of the relationship
column5: still these problems should only occur if the Moon is aspected challengingly.

column1: To avoid these kinds of problems
column2: you should not take advantage of your partners weaknesses in arguments and manipulate each other in directions none of you really wants to go. Probably you feel hurt immediately by any misunderstanding
column3: then it is important to shift your reason into gear and make it clear to yourself that you will always remain two individuals no matter how much your every day lives are intertwined. In any case your continuous efforts to talk about your motives and feelings have a positive aspect. Because the third house stands for siblings and other relatives
column4: they may have an unusually large influence on your relationship
column5: and maybe helped you to get together in the first place."

column1: 744;KOMBIN_0000000000016454;The Moon in the second house;What you are looking for in a relationship is stability and you will also be able to find it. The value you place on the feeling of security your partner gives you
column2: would never permit you to place your relationship unnecessarily at risk. Other people will help you to recognize what you need to lead a satisfied and emotionally satisfying life. The common values which bind you should allow you to feel understood by your partner. Possibly you both are too attached to material possessions
column3: if the Moon receives a challenging aspect you could become dependent on your common possessions and then one day come to feel trapped by them. It is up to you to do something about it. If you only stay together because you own a house
column4: you will never be happy. This Moon position can ensure that you will have a long lasting and satisfying relationship. This constellation will also benefit business or professional relationships. You will sense intuitively which steps are profitable and will move you closer to financial success.

column1: 746;KOMBIN_0000000000000070;The Moon in the first house;"In your relationship warmth plays a large role
column2: which is obvious to everyone around you. If the Moon receives harmonious aspects
column3: you will have a great feeling of togetherness
column4: which will take you through thick and thin. Each of you feels secure with the other and you provide each other with warmth and comfort. You know each other well and understand each other so well that you can sense how the other feels. Probably you dont ask if you are really loved
column5: because your intuition will tell you if everything is alright or not. You feel what is going on with the other and can offer help tactfully even in sensitive situations. Your way of doing things is characterized by deep certitude which your partner can rely on. That is a bonus which can improve the relationship.

column1: If the Moon is challengingly aspected some problems may arise. Your mood swings can put your partner under pressure and squeeze him like a sponge because you think you can take whatever you want without considering whether you are giving enough. The Moon always brings subjectivity with it
column2: which is why you always have trouble seeing your relationship in the right light. Maybe you are becoming emotionally dependent and vent your feelings although you know that reason would help you more.

column1: Generally this Moon position should be a positive experience
column2: because you should be able to work through the past and feel lucky to have found such an understanding partner."

column4: your ambitions arent tied to vague desires
column5: but are founded on hard facts. Together you are grounded in reality and leave it only in rare exceptions
column6: which may include romance or talking lovingly together and being silly; although Mercurys position has to be examined more thoroughly in order to make a definite statement.

column1: 770;KOMBIN_0000000000180358;Mercury in the twelfth house;"This Mercury position is especially significant
column2: because it will enable you to talk to each other about your deepest feelings and greatest secrets. There is a potential within you to grasp subconscious motivations and routines and to experience great changes. You are sure that you develop a different psychology and reflexes as a couple than you would have as two individuals; you also prefer to examine this process intellectually. It is important to you to understand your partner with body and soul.

column1: Still Mercury in the twelfth house harbors dangers which you should pay special attention to. If there are challenging aspects
column2: you will be inclined to take on the dominant role in the relationship. In time you will reach deeper insights of the inner processes of your partner
column3: such that you are conscious of your responsibility and guard against pushing your partner into a corner or causing pain with verbal attacks below the belt. That could go so far as to prevent all intellectual exchange and create a lot of problems. In addition you have a tendency to withdraw from your environment for discussions about topics which could be examined in more depth in a larger group."

column3: neither of you cares for emotional outbreaks
column4: although below the surface things can get quite hot. You will have to make an effort to find a way to honestly express what you feel and overcome all inhibitions. Maybe you have had such bad experiences in the past that you arent able to completely surrender to your feelings
column5: still it wont help you to shy away. If a stable and open relationship is important to you
column6: you are going to have to find the courage to place trust in your partner.

column1: 774;KOMBIN_0000000000164038;Venus in the eleventh house;"This Venus position may place the relationship in a positive light
column2: because you agree on what a modern partnership should be like and are able to express it emotionally. Probably you met through contact to others and in the course of your life social occasions will play a large role and there will always be time to go out with a group of friends. It shouldnt be difficult for you to help your partner feel comfortable and accepted with your friends. As a couple you symbolize a union based on free will and are above resorting to tactical moves. You are open with each other and place value on your autonomy
column3: but you should make sure that your partnership doesnt react merely to logical questions but also to emotional. If you are successful
column4: it will lead to a stable friendship which will last a lifetime
column5: regardless of whether romance is involved or not.

column1: Together you enjoy a lot of different activities which make you feel that you belong together and that you should work to create harmony. It is important to you to fulfill the general expectations of a partnership; because you both can be opinionated. You are especially pleased to have found a relatively unorthodox partner and give yourself more space than people generally do."

776;KOMBIN_0000000000147654;Venus in the tenth house;"You dont exactly take romance lightly
column2: but have fairly persistent ideas about living together. Probably you would prefer the relationship to have meaning and want to be able to always count on the support of your partner
column3: especially when it comes to the advancement of your career. If Venus receives a challenging aspect it could be that you want to use the relationship to advance your career and the bond is not based on deep love but on ambitions. Your love affair could also develop into a business arrangement
column4: which shouldnt necessarily be condemned as long as it makes you happy and you are honest with each other.

column1: 778;KOMBIN_0000000000131270;Venus in the ninth house;"You are glad that your relationship allows for so much intellectual freedom and that your partner encourages you to develop. Together you feel like adventurers
column2: who go exploring hand in hand and learn a lot. You see your relationship from a distance; you wont give up your autonomy and will always try to be honest about your feelings for each other. Maybe you will strive for high intellectual goals and would like to show the people around you how to live in harmony without becoming dependent on each other or starting unnecessary conflicts. Especially the way you tolerate each other is impressive. You dont need help from your partner to do all the things which have to be taken care of regularly or to discuss the household budget. Your relationship should rise up into spheres which you couldnt attain alone. You would like to get a better understanding of your life and your role in the universe.

column1: It is important to you to have a similar outlook on life and to receive intellectual stimulation. If you should have the feeling that your relationship isnt going anywhere and you sense a lack of motivation in yourself
column2: then the love and harmony has probably come to an end. Make sure that you share honest affection for each other and not just see the relationship as an intellectual challenge; this is more probable if Venus receives challenging aspects."

column3: pleasure and romance plays a larger role than in other relationships. Even if you should fight sometimes
column4: it will be difficult for you to stay mad at each other after a while."

column1: 796;KOMBIN_0000000000000262;Mars in the first house;"Probably you are a power couple and have to be out doing things constantly in order to make effective use of all the energy you generate together. It is important to you to find an outlet for your energy and to place your mark on your surroundings. Your strong will wont let anything get in the way of your plans. Probably you will benefit from the fact that it was the relationship which revealed your full potential. You may even become overzealous and start believing that your super strength can overcome any barrier which gets in your way. That may work for a while
column2: but then something will happen which will intimidate you so thoroughly that you wont recover from it for a while.

column1: It would be wonderful if you had creative ambitions to invest your energy in. If Mars had a challenging aspect
column2: you could have serious problems with each other because you follow your egotistical interests and seldom take consideration of others. It could come to the point where physical confrontations are common. It depends on whether you are able to combine your enthusiasm for staying active and self assertion with a relative harmonious relationship. Possibly it will help you to live out your sexuality and prove your potency."

column1: 798;KOMBIN_0000000000016646;Mars in the second house;"In your relationship you invest a lot of energy in securing your income
column2: working
column3: earning money and even acquiring a fortune. Dealing with material possessions is important to both of you because you want to invest your energy in concrete projects with tangible results. Probably you wont need anyones help to stay on your feet
column4: because accepting help would conflict with your self image. It is very possible that some day you will go into business for yourself or start some other projects with the intention of increasing your wealth. You shouldnt overdo it
column5: because that would make a harmonious partnership more difficult for you to express tenderness beyond a certain degree.

column1: If Mars is receiving challenging aspects
column2: you may have a tendency to define yourself by your possessions and base your self image on status and reputation. At times your frustration over an unhappy relationship can lead you to devote yourself to material things in order to forget your troubles."

column1: 800;KOMBIN_0000000000033030;Mars in the third house;"This Mars position can express itself in various ways. If it is aspected harmoniously
column2: you may enjoy temperamental verbal conflicts because it will encourage your intellectual development and provide stimulation as well as an opportunity to present yourself as strong and convincing. When you test your strength it is less by means of physical exertion than in hefty discussions where you show what you can do. Additionally you invest a lot of energy in studying and spend a lot of time in adult education classes. Your partnership will awaken a need to communicate about daily life; possibly a competition will develop between you and your partner about who is better informed.

column1: On the other hand there could be a lot of arguments which are merely destructive. If Mars receives negative aspects you may not be able to accept that your partner has an different mental structure. Then you will have to try to step back
column2: exercise tolerance and make up for it by planning activities with siblings and other relatives. Mars in the third house is always a challenge to pay careful attention to your choice of words and draw consequences if daily conflicts threaten to take over."

column1: 802;KOMBIN_0000000000049414;Mars in the fourth house;"This Mars energy is especially noticeable if you have different social backgrounds

column1: 804;KOMBIN_0000000000065798;Mars in the fifth house;"In the fifth house your Composite/Combine Mars should find a way to vent its frustrations. That will probably happen when you discover your creativity and have the feeling that endless opportunities are open to you. You try out everything
column2: become active in the arts and bring some of your talents to light
column3: which have been lying idle. It is important to you to show what you can do; your self confidence will benefit by the relationship which will also be the solution to some problems. You dont use your energy to control your partner and to spend every minute of the day together
column4: but also enjoy being active on your own and then proudly presenting what you have accomplished. If you have children
column5: you will do a lot with them and probably spend a lot of time in fantasy and adventure parks. Both of you want to lead dynamic lives and want to support each other in your search for new forms of self expression. There is hardly a chance that you will ever get bored.

column1: If Mars has unfavorable aspects
column2: it could lead to difficult conflicts because you feel suppressed and cant express your energy the way you would like to. Especially in the area of sexuality it will be important to you to find each other and find the security you need."

column1: 830;KOMBIN_0000000000098630;Jupiter in the seventh house;"Congratulations on attaining this wonderful constellation whose influences should quickly become obvious. You invest all of your abilities in the relationship and experience the union as an extension of your potential and an enrichment to your life. Maybe you will recognize for the first time
column2: the extent of influence another persons personality can exercise on your development without being strenuous. You can be glad to have a fixed common foundation based on your values and mutual respect. Possibly you will finally develop enough self confidence to realize dreams you have been holding on to for a long time. These should lead to a deep satisfaction and tranquillity which no one will be able to take away from you.

column1: Certainly you dont take your relationship lightly and will eventually be able to place high expectations on your partner
column2: which may become a problem if Jupiter receives unfavorable aspects. Otherwise you will be happy with each other and able to appreciate having found an open and generous partner who doesnt try to restrict you. Every kind of relationship will benefit from this constellation."

column1: 832;KOMBIN_0000000000082246;Jupiter in the sixth house;"You find fulfillment in supporting your partner and you are standing by in any and every situation. Probably you will do more for your partner than you have in past relationships
column2: invest a lot of energy and in return be respected for your loyalty. Neither of you feels like youre losing out on something by restricting yourselves in favor of your partner. Your strength and self respect are based on the experience that everything that you give whole-heartedly will eventually have positive consequences. Also working together will improve your concentration and attention to detail without turning you into a square or making you lose sight of the big picture.

column1: Business or professional connections will benefit from this constellation and will be characterized by careful planning and realistic estimations of the situation. If Jupiter were to receive challenging aspects
column2: you could become excessively helpful
column3: turning yourself into a martyr in order to keep your conscience clean.

column1: Make sure that your loyalty stays on a close personal level. Try to avoid helping people merely for the sake of rational and distanced ethical principals. Otherwise you can forget everything you are trying to achieve together."

834;KOMBIN_0000000000065862;Jupiter in the fifth house;"The relationship will give you opportunity to show yourself as you really are and will enable you to work up enough self confidence so that you dont feel a need to hide your weaknesses. You enjoy each others company and make happiness your primary source of strength. The relationship makes it clear to you that so many opportunities are open to you that it will be difficult to choose. Your path of development will eliminate some less important differences of opinion as well as out-dated convictions and restrictions you have placed on yourself. You learn from each other that only people who can get along on their own are capable of leading happy relationships. Otherwise you will experiment with all kinds of self expression which will certainly include dancing
column2: painting as well as many types of physical activity. Romance
column3: flirting and allowing your emotions to run free are not areas which you neglect. In fact you have a tendency to exaggerate your emotions and to experience everything more intensely than it actually is.

column1: Probably you will have a lot of kids together
column2: and have an easy going relationship with them. You have a way with children and you love to play and to try out new things
column3: your family can help you live out your drive to get out and do things. You could learn a lot from your kids if you would just put yourself in their shoes
column4: but that shouldnt be a problem for you
column5: as long as you can keep yourself from taking everything too serious. Still you stand for your ethical convictions whereby self respect and generosity play a large role."
