column1: 836;KOMBIN_0000000000049478;Jupiter in the fourth house;"If Jupiters aspects in this house arent more unfavorable than usual
column2: you may like this constellation because it will bring a happy and contented home life with it. You find fulfillment together in your private sphere because you give each other warmth and comfort. Probably you have a relationship you can count on to give you a sense of worth because your partner is constantly demonstrating that being with you is important to her. Especially friends and acquaintances will often drop by and will have no cause to complain about a lack of hospitality. You both value having an open and friendly house with enough room for everyone in need of your help
column3: as long as they dont abuse your kindness.

column1: The home will be the focal point of your relationship
column2: which is why you will invest a lot in getting enough space and decorating it tastefully. Maybe you got your house from your parents and live together with them
column3: which is why there is always something going on and there is no lack of excitement. In any case
column4: your attitude of belonging together and your commitment to building a foundation together will determine the way you treat each other and ensure your loyalty. Children may feel especially comfortable in such an atmosphere; it wouldnt be surprising if you had a lot of kids
column5: because Jupiter stands for wealth in every respect."

column1: 838;KOMBIN_0000000000033094;Jupiter in the third house;"The third house stands for mastering your everyday life
column2: daily contact and dealing with todays flood of data. With Jupiter in this house there should be no problems in this area. Together you may even find out that its worth while to take a closer look at the ""normal"" routines. You will have to make an effort to see the meaning in seemingly insignificant patterns of behavior. Probably you continually remind each other that the basics of every day life have to be managed before you set out to conquer intellectual heights. You are in danger of taking superficialities too seriously and becoming too fond of gossiping. Maybe you know a lot of people
column3: but the relationships arent very deep and you divide yourself between so many activities and areas of interest that you may lose your orientation.

column1: Generally this is a positive constellation
column2: which should be advantageous for the relationship. Between you the sparks will probably never die out and even if you get angry on occasion you should talk to each other instead of withdrawing in silence. That will give you a chance to take care of all your problems. The contact to each other provides intellectual stimulation opening you to many new fields
column3: which will only serve your further development."

column4: otherwise you may suffer unnecessary losses."

column1: 858;KOMBIN_0000000000131462;Saturn in the ninth house;"Both of you keep your feet firmly on the ground and plan your future carefully. For this reason you are well protected from unpleasant surprises but should try not to neglect having fun. Your views are probably very conservative and arent likely to change any time soon; your outlook on life is based on the attitude that everyone has to do her part to keep the system running smoothly and expecting help only once you have made every effort. You see your relationship as ""rational"" as you confirm each others philosophy of life. If Saturn receives challenging aspects then it may be just the opposite whereby your differing outlooks on life could lead to conflicts.

Possibly you will develop an intolerance of people who dont share your opinions. Taking every opportunity to develop and keeping in tune with the times will be of central importance. Even if you invest a lot of energy in continuing your education
column2: you will have to try to learn with your heart
column3: not just with your head. It could be dangerous for you to allow your high standing to make you arrogant and to start avoiding less cultivated people."

866;KOMBIN_0000000000180678;Uranus in the twelfth house;"It wont be easy for you to provide your relationship with stability and a basis of trust. It may be that you dont feel ready to bond with another person and to accept all the consequences which this implies. The ties to each other could develop unexpectedly because the distance may be difficult to bridge and neither one of you is really motivated to make the effort. Differences concerning inner values could lead to an unwillingness to compromise which may serve to vent any frustrations which may have built up.

The positive side of Uranus in the twelfth house is that you can shape each other which may eventually help you to fully accept each other as you are. A deep friendship could develop in which no one asks how much someone has given and how much was received in return. The exchange of thoughts may impress you so much that you free yourself from a too strict adherence to values and allow you to loosen up a little and ease up on yourself. If this process has trouble getting started and you arent able to find a way to reach each other
column2: problems will arise which you wont be able to sort out because of an unwillingness to take points of conflict on the surface seriously enough. It would help you to try to be more honest with yourself and to let your partner see who you really are."

column1: 868;KOMBIN_0000000000164294;Uranus in the eleventh house;"In this house Uranus can show its best side because it is at home here. You may have very idealistic ideas about a relationship and put a lot of effort into realizing them while keeping yourselves from falling back into tired old ruts. Your partnership is constantly being enriched by new impulses; probably you share the same dreams and visions
column2: like to work for the community and spend a lot of time with your clique. Your friends may also help to keep you interested in what is going on and keep up with the latest trends. Maybe you have some ""crazy"" friends which you get along with because you find conforming to the norms of society a frightening thought.

column1: For you a partnership is a special kind of friendship
column2: which can be carried on with no problem after the romance has died. Your common goals
column3: the belief in the future and the humanitarian challenge facing the world community is more important to you than a cozy twosomeness demanding a lot of obligations. Probably you both realize that keeping an open mind makes life more interesting and that no one should be too quick to adopt the opinions dominant in society. When necessary you will stand up for your convictions."

column1: 872;KOMBIN_0000000000131526;Uranus in the ninth house;"You could cause so much confusion for each other that your entire outlook on life will be upset and you will be forced to rethink your ethical convictions. This relationship will give you the chance to keep other people from telling you what to do and to think over the opinions you have adopted from your friends. This will eventually lead to the creation of your own philosophy which will incorporate progressive ideas as well as alternative forms of communal living. This development could be brought about by traveling together and coming into contact with exotic ideas. You should concentrate on making use of your intellectual potential and of the freedom of thought which you are entitled to; then the relationship will help you to make the most positive development possible.
Uranus in the ninth house indicates an ability to see yourself as an individual and at the same time as part of a team
column2: you will also have an intuitive understanding of societal events. Intellectual exchanges in your partnership mean a lot to you; also education is important to you although you dont want to learn about conservative or out dated viewpoints. Even if you have serious fights on occasion and arent able to agree
column3: your conversations will be stimulating and will be a means for you to confront the events occurring around you and in your relationship."

column1: 874;KOMBIN_0000000000115142;Uranus in the eighth house;"The relationship to your partner will initiate important processes which could change your personality quickly and completely. You feel challenged to let go of conventional structures and to make extreme experiences within the relationship which for the most part will take place in your heads. Maybe your mental state isnt exactly stable
column2: which will give you opportunity to overcome old fears and inhibitions with the help of your partner. You should be as open as possible and not enter the relationship with fixed ideas about how a relationship should be; that will certainly cause an early separation.

column1: This constellation also indicates that it is possible to free yourself from material burdens and to take care of your possessions in unusual ways which will result in increasing your wealth. Due to your dislike of having to make financial decisions
column2: your means will eventually be turned over to a larger community so that you can work for the well-being of the people around you."

column1: 914;KOMBIN_0000000000180806;Pluto in the twelfth house;"In your relationship important developments take place in secret; even if it is nothing exciting externally

column3: but it would still be best if you didnt fight the process. There may be certain patterns of behavior which you have felt powerless to change which you can now get under control; childhood problems could be worked through

column1: 916;KOMBIN_0000000000164422;Pluto in the eleventh house;"You dont waste a lot of time talking about your visions of the future
column2: but will get started right away working to realize them. Probably you hold a general attraction for other people
column3: which is why you like to meet people who you expect to become good friends of yours in time. You nurture friendships outside the partnership and like to meet with people for more than just superficial chatter. Maybe you initiate group projects which bring about changes to the existing circumstances
column4: get involved politically or take part in public life in other ways which are equally effective. Its important to you to carry the developments which have taken place within your partnership to others and to try to influence the consciousness of as many people as possible (hopefully in a positive manner).

column1: You have a tendency to be aggressive and protest for a cause you believe in. You expect solidarity from yourself

column3: courage
column4: and strength

column7: you should make sure that you learn to respect your partners achievements wholeheartedly
column8: since there might be a danger of you starting to envy each others successes."

column1: 922;KOMBIN_0000000000115270;Pluto in the eighth house;"Because the eighth house is where Pluto is at home
column2: its effects can be especially potent and should be watched carefully. It is important to experience a further development due to the relationship
column3: which wont indicate which direction it is taking you. You want to make new intensive experiences with the help of your partner and give the relationship a chance to delve into new depths. Probably you will experience extreme phases of coming closer together and then drifting apart again which will have important effects on your personality and your psyche. In the end you will recognize what it was which brought you together and in which direction you want to head.

column1: If you have an erotic relationship
column2: it will be filled with passionate emotions. column3: it will be your challenge to stay conscious of your behavior and your expectations and to judge them as objectively as possible. If you lose your sense of judgment
column4: it will result in complications leading to dependencies. If your conscience is complex as well as open
column5: you will be able to profit from each other in a way which is possible for only very few couples."

column1: 930;KOMBIN_0000000000049734;Pluto in the fourth house;"This Pluto position is not without danger because this planet can unfold all of your potential in the fourth house. Probably your common household is important to you

column1: 934;KOMBIN_0000000000016966;Pluto in the second house;"The second house stands for your values

column4: just dont expect that money alone will make you happy."

column1: 942;KOMBIN_0000000000294914;The Sun in Square with the Moon;"This constellation will indicate the conflicts which are likely to arise in your partnership. Generally the energy isnt distributed harmoniously which is why your reason may not make you immune to emotional confusion. Emotional bonds may suffer from the force of your intellect. It may be that one of you is more sensitive and weaker than the other and may suffer from the other's inability to be understanding of the situation. Also other factors could make it difficult for you to feel at ease with each other and just let yourselves go.
On the other hand you could profit from this challenge
column2: overcoming it by becoming aware of your needs and how to keep things in balance. Everyone can take on some of their partners positive qualities to compensate for their own deficits and change significantly. It could be worth while to stick it out longer."

column1: 950;KOMBIN_0000000000589826;The Sun in Sextile with Mercury;"The relationship is intellectually stimulating
column2: which is why you will have so many good ideas together and also be able to find the necessary energy to put them into practice. Both of you take notice of similar things and you both have your feet firmly on the ground and go about things pragmatically. Your logic harmonizes well together and you may let your partner talk you into continuing your education or getting involved in what is going on around you.

column1: You may find out that you can talk to each other easily and are quick to see where your partner is headed. Your conversations play an important role because the topics you bring up are followed by consequences. You are both willing to talk about your personalities and also about intimate subjects. Intellectual exchanges can have an immediate effect on your level of energy and bring about some changes which will be immediately noticed by others. In any case you will always analyze your behavior in the relationship and maintain distance in spite of your feelings for each other. This may prove to be very useful with this constellation."

952;KOMBIN_0000000000557058;The Sun in Square with Mercury;"Maybe you have trouble relating to each other intellectually and not getting into an argument over minor misunderstandings. The relationship could cause you some confusion and bring you to ask yourself if you are too selfish or if you have more of a tendency to neglect yourself. Possibly you dont understand your partners point of view and have to work on understanding the way his logic works.
There is a danger that you both find the relationship too complicated and prefer to criticize than to motivate each other with praise and recognition. You influence each others way of thinking
column2: although the results arent very positive. The relationship has one advantage: you ponder the meaning of your life without painting everything in rosy colors. If you feel strongly about each other and want to stay together
column3: it would make sense not to take on too many intellectual activities
column4: maybe go dancing or participate in sportive activities instead. Take care of each other and make an effort to express yourselves clearly."

column1: 992;KOMBIN_0000000001605634;The Sun in Square with Saturn;"This is one of the most difficult aspects in a Composite/Combine horoscope
column2: because it indicates that the dominance of one partner is not only blocking the free flow of energy but also the expression of individual personality. Maybe you should ask yourself which qualities of your partner you really appreciate so that you give the positive side enough emphasis. Otherwise you could both fall into a pattern of continuous criticism and complaining and contribute to your own unhappiness. Possibly you inihibit rather than strengthen each other.

column1: If you are able to really understand each other
column2: the relationship could end in frustration and your entire potential may be swept under the carpet. Maybe it would be to your advantage to do as much as possible on your own and to grant your partner more freedom. You wont be able to get around tolerating your partners idiosyncrasies
column3: because you expect the same in return."

column9: getting involved and protecting him or her will earn you respect.

column1: 1004;KOMBIN_0000000002359682;Saturn in Conjunction with Pluto;"The relationship will probably be extremely challenging and could put you to the test. This may be complicated by your determination or your inclination to neglect your own needs which can make the atmosphere embittered. You set your goals extraordinarily high and work hard to achieve them
column2: but are hard to please and rarely give yourself time to rest. One day the pressure could build up to the point where you start to look for a way to let off steam and then explode for no apparent reason. For this reason you should definitely make sure that you are clear about what it is that you want and find a way to put yourself at ease. That could release enormous amounts of energy and maybe disrupt actions which havent been given thorough consideration
column3: but have been built up over a period of years.

column3: which promised to stand behind each other

column1: 1006;KOMBIN_0000000009175426;Saturn in Conjunction with the Ascendant;"For you consistency and standing up for each other makes up a central point in your relationship. Otherwise your expectations are rather humble; it is difficult for you to give up some of your personal wishes and concentrate on common goals in order to save your relationship even if it involves de-emphasizing the expression of your personality and giving up an intense night-life. Both of you need a partner who you can rely on in every respect
column2: which is why you want to avoid experiments at all costs. This is also why other people may think that your partnership is boring
column3: however you dont let these kinds of remarks get to you. Both of you have your principles
column4: both want the relationship to be stable and can build up a lot together over a period of time
column5: whether it be a business or a beautiful house. You can get by without wealth and luxury and consider a long time before taking a long trip.

column2: which you should be especially wary of. It could be that a lot of routine has slipped into your life which robs you of your chance for further development. column1: 1008;KOMBIN_0000000009240962;Saturn in Sextile with the Ascendant;"This aspect will be able to make your relationship stable and long lived
column2: but it will be dependent on whether the other factors of your horoscope can be interpreted positively and if you can live together happily over the years
column3: or on the other hand you will hesitate to break up even if it would be the sensible thing to do. In any case you have the potential to get through the hard times together and to give up your own interests when necessary. You only have to watch out that there is enough life and spontaneity to keep you from getting lost in the boring routines of every day life. Both of you can have fixed ideas about how you expect your partner to act
column4: and should guard against restricting the other or imposing too many rules.

column3: but roll up your sleeves in order to put all your strength into mastering life."

column1: 1010;KOMBIN_0000000009208194;Saturn in Square with the Ascendant;"Probably you dont motivate each other to enjoy lifes pleasures and take care of your obligations without worrying. This square indicates that you are disciplined and have such high expectations on correct behavior that there is little time left for relaxation. It could be especially difficult for you to show your affection and to let an atmosphere of love and understanding develop. Fear and inhibitions could cause you not be able to trust your partner completely or think that you have to keep control over the relationship. If you arent willing to grant every freedom and you are not leading your relationship in such a way that each one of you can get along without the other
column2: your behavior will result in dependency and rigidity.

column1: This square can represent a serious challenge
column2: which is why you should examine more closely whether there are constellations which point to a happy life together. First of all you have to accept the fact that no one

column1: 1014;KOMBIN_0000000009191874;Uranus in Opposition with the Ascendant;"The attraction between you may be great
column2: because being together with your partner opens a completely new and unusual world. Nothing is the way past experience has taught you
column3: which can have both positive as well as negative effects. It may be that you soon feel overwhelmed and long for things to be the way they were. The partnership could destabilize you so that you feel insecure and lack support. The relationship may change your whole life. It seems as if you cant count on anything any more; things change so quickly that it doesnt make any sense to make long term plans. Maybe you can get together and try out some of the things you have been thinking about
column4: if you are able to overcome your inhibitions. Uranus represents your common energies at an intellectual level
column5: which will ensure that your conversations will be stimulating and will inspire your imagination. But it wont be a stable relationship which you will be able to rely on. Stability would take a lot of effort and requires building on compensating aspects.

column1: Possibly outside pressures may prevent your relationship from becoming stable and long-lasting. To overcome these difficulties refuse to let yourselves be pigeon holed and show enough courage to stand up to your relationships unusual character."

column1: 1022;KOMBIN_0000000002425282;Uranus in Sextile with Pluto;This sextile is a generational aspect and naturally appears in Composite/Combine horoscopes of couples in this age group. If you have an open relationship then it may be because neither of you let yourselves be chained up and you both place much more value on your freedom than on intimacy.

column1: 1037;KOMBIN_0000000002113538;The Sun in Opposition with Neptune;"Perhaps both of you deny the recognition of your partner as the person he or she really is
column2: preferring to idealize rather than to confront weaknesses and the true character of the relationship. You could believe that you arent able to get along without the other and are dependent on each other's help in all circumstances. Often this constellation produces a willingness to sacrifice whereby the one on the receiving end has to pay for this with eternal gratitude and loving care. Possibly you have both internalized unequal roles to the point where you dont want to change anything in your relationship and one day will be forced to live with unpleasant insights.

column1: Consider for a moment how much effort each of you invests in the relationship and with what kind of motivation. Long-term satisfaction can only come from a relationship in which giving and taking are in balance and where each of you has the chance to lead a mature and equal relationship without placing all the responsibility for happiness onto each other's shoulders. For long none of you can handle that sort of responsibility."

1039;KOMBIN_0000000002146306;The Sun in Trine with Neptune;"This aspect speaks less for a sexual union than as an indication for a deep friendship where trust and sympathy play an important role. You probably feel a strong bond between you and share dreams and ideals. It wouldnt be surprising if you were able to sense what the other is experiencing and therefore have no need for long conversations. There is a silent agreement between you which motivates you to give your best without making it conditional on anything. This is certainly praiseworthy
column2: but you should also devote yourself to practical topics otherwise you will lose your grip on reality and eventually have immense financial problems or similar hardships to deal with.

column3: you will be able to appreciate your relationship
column4: glad to have found someone who is completely on your wavelength."

column1: 1045;KOMBIN_0000000002097154;The Sun in Conjunction with Neptune;"This conjunction can have very different effects depending on whether you had both feet on the ground when you met or if you always showed the tendency to take evasive action. You could both be putting on an act for the other and eventually be forced to wake up and smell the coffee. It could be that you deny your partners mistakes and do nothing to prevent yourself from becoming dependent on people who havent earned your trust. Wishful thinking could win the overhand allowing you to live an illusion
column2: which is by no means an equal partnership. Hopefully you remain steadfast in a crisis. Possibly you believe that your fate is somehow joined to your partners
column3: without being aware of your role in creating this fate.

column1: In the best case
column2: you really have an extraordinary and sensitive union
column3: which allows you to dream and harmonize your ideals with each other. You could build up a highly sensitive connection to each other
column4: which will allow you to perceive exactly what your partner is responding to at every second. Under these conditions you will help each other to reach your potential and will feel fortunate to have found the right counterpart. Just dont make the mistake of trying to prove yourself a hero who can free your partner from the deepest dilemmas
column5: because there is a real danger."

column1: 1047;KOMBIN_0000000002359298;The Sun in Conjunction with Pluto;"This is a very powerful conjunction which wont go by without leaving its effects. Maybe your relationship wouldnt be considered ""harmonious"" in a classical sense
column2: but still gives you energy which you would never be able to generate on your own. And no matter how great the crisis may be which you both have to go through
column3: you will weather them out together. You have a talent for never giving up and come through every experience a little stronger. If you seriously intend to spend your lives together
column4: no one will be able to prevent you. The partnership will teach you exactly where your strengths lie
column5: but you will also be confronted with the unpleasant sides of your and your partners personality. The awareness will provide you with the opportunity to strive toward concrete improvements and
column6: if problems arise
column7: not to shirk your responsibility.

column1: With this considerable potential
column2: you have to treat each other with great care
column3: always remaining aware of the consequences of your actions. When conflicts do arise
column4: then they hit hard. At these times the partnership isnt something which can be treated as an afterthought. During the course of your relationship you will collect a lot of knowledge about your partner
column5: which should be treated respectfully. Without additional indicators
column6: it shouldnt be assumed that you will never use your energy negatively or abuse trust."

column1: 1049;KOMBIN_0000000002424834;The Sun in Sextile with Pluto;"Your relationship is very intense and emotional
column2: whereby not everything has to be played out on the surface
column3: the most important changes will take place within your consciousness. You influence each other and each plays an important role in the others life
column4: which should be viewed positively. Still you wont be able to avoid taking the events in your partners life seriously and getting involved without hesitating. This aspect also shows that there should really be a willingness to act.

column1: Together you could proceed more dynamically than you would be able to as individuals. You motivate and encourage each other and let your partner see deep within you to ensure that you are really being understood. Maybe you treat each other a little roughly sometimes
column2: but getting to the truth is more important to you than the mere appearance of harmony. You will be able to go through some highs and lows together and will be recognized by your environment for your efforts. It wouldnt be surprising if a lot of people find the two of you very charming."

column1: 1051;KOMBIN_0000000002392066;The Sun in Square with Pluto;"You really dont make it easy to create peace and harmony. Probably you enjoy provoking each other and sometimes go too far. Together you have an enormous potential
column2: but arent able to make much use of it because you dont think things through enough or use it in a destructive way. Maybe you are constantly in competition with each other or cant recognize your partners achievements without envy or you fight making changes which you should have put into practice long ago. It could also be that you draw the anger and opposition from your surroundings and arent able to deal with it.

column1: If you want to get along
column2: you will have to show more good will and tolerance and be open for every kind of development. Otherwise you will end up in conflicts which could have terrible consequences and leave wounds which wont heal. In any case
column3: you will have to accept your partners free will and frequently take the time to relax and get rid of tensions; if you dont you could both ""drown"" because you direct your will power in the wrong direction."

column1: Your external life is directed to your need to feel warm and close

column3: but approach life dynamically although other factors in your horoscope could keep these tendencies in balance. If you treat each other well in other areas you will profit from this conjunction and reach unspoken agreements
column4: but if you get hung up on your subjective ideas you will have problems because neither of you can present the facts for the other clearly."

column1: 1073;KOMBIN_0000000000589890;The Moon in Sextile with Mercury;"This aspect is useful because it supports the verbal exchange which enables you to openly express your feelings for your partner. You know your partner well and can sense how certain things can be understandably explained. The atmosphere should be warm enough to allow you to reveal your secrets to each other and to talk about very personal ideas and events. Your partner lets you know that your words are being understood the way you intended
column2: which also brings you closer. Emotion and intellect are related in a harmonious friendship
column3: so that you can act sensibly in discussions and not be tempted to misuse your partners trust.

column1: Maybe you havent discovered how warm it can feel when you are really open enough to talk about your thoughts and impressions. Make use of the potential of this aspect by spending a lot of time talking to each other. There should be no problems organizing the details of every day life and an honest exchange should help you to find useful strategies for every problem."

1075;KOMBIN_0000000000557122;The Moon in Square with Mercury;"It would be probably do you good to make decisions with a clear head and not merely follow your emotional inspirations. Otherwise you could go into conflicts so subjectively that rational solutions seem impossible. Both of you have to learn to express yourselves clearly and not to bring complicated emotions into your conversations which provoke confrontations. Taking care of every day activities will suffer when misunderstandings arise and allow verbal wounds to turn into larger problems.

Try to treat each other with more sensitivity and dont withdraw as soon as you feel that you were misunderstood. Harmonizing the intellect and the emotions so that neither one is given priority over the other presents a challenge which wont be easy to live up to. The more important a certain area becomes
column2: the more you will be pressed to make your partner understand your position. In this area you have to express your arguments clearly and convincingly. The only advantage this constellation presents is that you express your negative emotions immediately and the other is at least informed about them."

column2: the relationship will take on the character of an intense
column3: but short-lived confrontation.

column1: 1099;KOMBIN_0000000001065026;The Moon in Opposition with Mars;"This aspect will not be easy for you to get a hold of
column2: because you get into arguments often and hurt each others feelings or an all too personal perspective of the situation can block the way back. Probably you are harboring negative emotions or even have grudges against each other
column3: so that it can come to tensions or even to an explosive transfer
column4: where no one wants to give in. Or you let your bad moods out on each other because you are dissatisfied with yourself or are generally frustrated. Maybe you are incapable of sharing your life with your partner or giving comfort to each other because you believe your own interests would suffer.

column1: If you want to get these problems under control you will have to learn to approach each other and develop an understanding for each other. column1: 1109;KOMBIN_0000000001310786;The Moon in Conjunction with Jupiter;"You have good intentions with your partner and want him or her to be as happy as possible. You give a lot of effort to make this possible
column2: although this aspect stands more for a basic emotional attitude than for action. This sentiment will lead to a lot of wonderful situations which will give you and your partner the feeling of being secure and accepted. This will strengthen your self confidence and advance your development and uncover many new fields of activity for you. With your good will you can achieve positive changes.

column1: You treat each other very generously and dont rub the others face in every little mistake. Deep within you have the feeling to have found someone who really wants the best for you and who may be very important as you continue on your lifes path. You manage to support each other but without interfering with the others freedom or loading all the responsibility for the success of the relationship onto yourself. It is to be hoped that you both are able to make use of the wonderful potential of this conjunction."

1111;KOMBIN_0000000001572930;The Moon in Conjunction with Saturn;"This aspect could be hard to get a grip on unless you both make a lot of effort to be open with each other and to talk about differences in the area of emotions. First there is the danger that your silent communication isnt working
column2: thereby causing intuitive misunderstandings. Maybe you try to approach this problem too analytically and rationalize your feelings so that no room is left to get to know all the facets of your inner world and then bar comprehension. Maybe you are inclined to try to structure all the subtle emotions which you perceive from the partnership. The result would be a tense and icy atmosphere which would make you feel restricted because you wouldnt be able to share things spontaneously.

column1: For this reason it is important for both of you to learn to lower your expectations and to avoid pressuring your partner - even subtly - into a certain behavior of expressing emotions which you can really only appreciate if they are given freely and wholeheartedly. Try to understand that care and affection cant be demanded because you have entered a relationship
column2: but that every kind of human relationship is in a constant state of development and you have opportunities to influence this development at every point in time. Probably the stability you are looking for can be found nowhere but in yourself. Once you have realized that
column3: you will treat your partner with more tolerance and have more trust. Under this constellation you will see everything more negatively than it actually is and it would be a shame if that were to rob you of your happiness
column4: because you refuse to give in on your principal demands and expect emotions to be one hundred percent."

column1: 1113;KOMBIN_0000000001638466;The Moon in Sextile with Saturn;"The basic atmosphere in your relationship could be described by someone on the outside as very serious and rational
column2: however you analyze your relationship and consider your partners well-being as well as your relationship to her because stability and reliability are very important to you. It is to be assumed that you have deepened your partnership slowly and that it isnt a casual affair. The only disadvantage in this sextile is that you dont exactly spread cheer and have a hard time joking around together and really enjoying life. Still
column3: other factors in your horoscope could help to restore balance.

column1: You know exactly what you need to feel safe and secure in the partnership. column2: which is

column4: an enormous advantage. You dont take to romantic dreaming; both of you have a sense of reality and have achieved concrete results or received support through the relationship."

column1: 1121;KOMBIN_0000000001851458;The Moon in Opposition with Uranus;"Your feelings and deepest needs have proven to be short-lived
column2: which can make a serious relationship almost impossible. Your partners personality and impressions of you could irritate you so much that you keep your distance and dont allow any real warmth or closeness to develop. The atmosphere seems to be somehow electrified. Although you are curious about each other
column3: a restlessness could take over which makes you nervous. It is simply a case of a missing foundation which prevents you from staying focused on a common future. Probably you immediately felt drawn to each other
column4: but are having trouble uniting your differing expectations and allowing the other enough freedom.

column1: If you could let go and be open for your partners feelings
column2: this opposition will show its positive side and set things in motion. If you concentrate on the here and now you will have a lot of new experiences and gain a new emotional attitude toward partnership. Although there may not be a regular future over a longer period of time
column3: it may still be beneficial. The friendship which may keep you together will be very unusual and also extraordinarily valuable."

column3: so to speak and can understand each other without the help of tedious negotiations. An atmosphere of warmth and trust should make you happy to show affection and take care of the other. Maybe you will react more emotional and instinctive than rational
column4: but that shouldnt cause you any problems. Rather you should be happy to have found someone who makes you feel secure and who makes it easy for you to accept security. The effects of this sextile will be intensified if you have a family
column5: whereby everyone will feel secure enough to talk about all their problems and will always find an open ear.

column1: You like to decide intuitively and arent opposed to good arguments; which may result from Moon aspects under some circumstances. An additional advantage is that you treat each other tenderly and are quick to give in when there is an argument and are open for compromises. You wont put on an act for your partner
column2: but will express your internal life as it is
column3: which will help prevent conflicts from arising in the first place."

column1: 1157;KOMBIN_0000000009175170;Mercury in Conjunction with the Ascendant;"You see your relationship very reasonably and dont let yourself get confused by fleeting emotions. The communicative exchange and good conversations which bring you closer together are especially important. Probably you will both develop your intellectual abilities in this relationship and show interest in areas with which you have been completely unfamiliar up until now. Mercury at the ascendant indicates that you will stimulate each others intellect and try to advance by means of further education. Meeting each other on a sentimental level wont make you happy; you both want to learn from your partner and profit from each other's knowledge.

It will never get boring because you both need a lot of change which will make you curious about everything unfamiliar. One disadvantage could be that it takes you a long time to get personal and to tell your partner about your subjective experiences. Mercury emphasizes logic and reason
column2: but whenever two people meet up with each other and fall in love
column3: logic fortunately takes a back seat. For this reason you can be sure that you wont have so many misunderstandings because you speak the same language and your thought processes run in a similar way. An initial emotional distance in a personal relationship will be expressed differently than in a business relationship. In either case
column4: this constellation is extraordinarily suited for this. Because you have a good business sense and are good with finances."

column1: 1159;KOMBIN_0000000000786562;Mercury in Conjunction with Venus;"The closer you get to each other
column2: the more use this conjunction will be to you. Even if you just barely know each other
column3: you should be able to develop sympathy for each other and be able to put yourself in your partners place. Basically
column4: this aspect indicates that you can communicate affectionately and that it is important to you to solve the challenges of every day life harmoniously. Because you are willing to try and see things the way your partner does
column5: you should have no trouble reaching compromises or simply giving in. Also whenever your partner is down you find beautiful words at the right time
column6: which is extremely valuable.

column1: You can give your partner your complete trust because you wont be left in the dark about his or her feelings
column2: but will be constantly informed during your conversations. If this conjunction receives challenging aspects from other planets
column3: it may be possible for you to avoid all conflicts
column4: arguments and fights
column5: and live in a superficial harmony which doesnt have a firm basis."

column1: 1161;KOMBIN_0000000000852098;Mercury in Sextile with Venus;"Conversation and intellectual exchange bring you a lot of pleasure and should take place at a higher level. You may enjoy discussing questions of aesthetics
column2: art
column3: literature or go to concerts together. You are interested in everything beautiful and are perceptive and can judge critically in this area. It should be emphasized that you treat each other tenderly and demonstrate a willingness to compromise. If problems arise you wont yell at each other or hurt each other unnecessarily
column4: but with the intention of reaching an acceptable compromise
column5: you will search systematically for a workable solution. The tone between you is characterized by affection and good will
column6: therefore misunderstandings hardly ever arise.

column1: You have to watch out that you dont avoid important confrontations because Venus need for harmony could bring you to do just that. It is very important for you not to let every day obligations become too tiresome and leave plenty of room for the pleasant side of life
column2: although you should be able to accomplish this. Because you freely express all your positive feelings for your partner
column3: the two of you will spend many wonderful hours together. Since you love to demonstrate your adoration
column4: you compliment your partner often. It is important to overcome your inhibitions about expressing justified criticism."

column1: 1163;KOMBIN_0000000001065090;Mercury in Opposition with Mars;"You have a rather thick skull which allows you to make life difficult for yourself. Whenever you start a discussion
column2: things tend to heat up right away
column3: because each of you insist on your position and neither of you want to give in. Maybe you react aggressively to your partners objections or cant take being criticized. Therefore it is important for you to learn to compromise and to admit mistakes if you want to stay together for any period of time. Your intellectual activities will be stimulated by the partnership
column4: but will come too fast and only take your own ideas into account. You could get hung up on ideas which wont be of use to any one
column5: only because you dont want to change direction or lose face.

column1: The tone between you could be rude. You want to be honest with each other but dont always understand when it is important to consider your partners feelings
column2: which can make verbal confrontations tough. Before you do irreparable damage you should try to keep your temperament under control and not get into fights over little things. Accept that every person has their own way of thinking and their own way of doing things
column3: dont give advice until youre asked."

column1: 1165;KOMBIN_0000000001097858;Mercury in Trine with Mars;"Because you can strengthen your self confidence through your partnership
column2: it is easy for you to express your opinion freely
column3: even if unpleasant topics have to be addressed. This will bring a lot of honesty into your relationship and your partner already knows where he or she stands with you and if you can deal with the way things are seen. You need stimulation which will bring you into intellectual exchange with each other. That is why you like discussions and keep up with current events. It could come to conflicts because you will be temperamental in conversations and like to make sure that your opinion is taken seriously. Basically this harmonious aspect will have a positive effect
column4: which is why it doesnt take you very long to make up with each other and you arent opposed to making apologies.

column1: Especially in professional relationships you may be able to make good use of the determination you have developed together
column2: because it leads you to take risky although well planned action. If a friendship develops
column3: the recognition and sense of achievement which you experience in the relationship could bring you to experiment with or make changes in your professional life. In any case
column4: you will learn how to estimate your abilities and not to hide your light under a bushel
column5: which is not unimportant theses days. Look for high level intellectual work which makes use of your potential."

column4: because your determination and ambition werent pronounced enough.

column1: 1173;KOMBIN_0000000001310850;Mercury in Conjunction with Jupiter;"The partnership animates you to think about things which are often forgotten in the course of every day life
column2: due to a lack of time. Now you have a need to develop your intellect and not just study the shopping list but also fields like philosophy
column3: sociology and education. Probably you will both decide to take advantage of continued education programs in order to expand your horizons. A good opportunity would be to look into sophisticated literature. Both of you will benefit from the resulting discussions. What you finally decide to do
column4: to sharpen your intellect and to judge your situation with a greater distance
column5: is up to you. There will certainly be no lack of ideas in this area.

column1: You will depart from your humble visions during the course of your life together and develop good intentions which will be fun to put into practice. Maybe you will work for free thinking
column2: tolerance and long term planing
column3: because you are concerned about the future and both want to contribute to the process of making this world a place with less problems to solve. Knowledge and fairness will be very important to you and will make others want to listen to you and seek your advice when problems arise. You should make sure that you dont get arrogant and start looking down on people with less education."

column1: 1175;KOMBIN_0000000001376386;Mercury in Sextile with Jupiter;"You understand each other and direct your attention to being good to each other and treating each other fairly. Because you are able to judge the events and development in your relationship you can also accept criticism. Your way of thinking and the way you go about managing your every day affairs balance each other well; probably you animate each other to continue your education and to constantly raise your intellectual level. Reading sophisticated literature could make you understand the importance of positive ideas in order to keep you alive intellectually and to consciously take advantage of the opportunities presented. Probably you will learn a lot from each other because it will be easy for you to let go of your old ways of thinking and to open yourself to your partners ideas.

You should travel together as often as possible in order to make the best use of the great potential of this sextile and allow your insights and perspective on life to mature. Your being together could open your eyes and allows you to recognize how the things are connected
column2: which you have previously overlooked because your attention was focused on the details. Especially your tendency to keep your partner optimistic and to believe in your future leads one to assume that you will be a happy couple achieving a lot together."

column1: 1183;KOMBIN_0000000001572994;Mercury in Conjunction with Saturn;"This relationship will help you to direct your thoughts toward certain goals and to improving your concentration. Both of you need security and will start building your common future right away. Whatever you take on and plan will have substance. You can rely on each other and know that no decisions will be made without first taking the needs of the other into consideration. column1: 1187;KOMBIN_0000000001605762;Mercury in Square with Saturn;"This square indicates that you restrict each other. The negative influences are primarily in the area of free thought and your partners right to express an own opinion. Possibly rigid ideas about a responsible partnership make it difficult for you to set your imagination free and to feel at ease together. Maybe you have inhibitions about expressing your thoughts and feelings in your partnership and if your partner isnt able to read your mind
column2: this could be the cause of misunderstandings. Your happiness in the relationship will be dependent both on your ability to be honest and open and your ability to listen to the other. Its not a good idea to express criticism when your partner wants to talk about a problem or make a suggestion. It is important to you to create an atmosphere of trust and good will in which each of you feel free to talk about everything without making hasty judgments or performing psychoanalysis.

column1: 1193;KOMBIN_0000000001851522;Mercury in Opposition with Uranus;"Your partner could completely upset your thoughts and ideas about a happy relationship
column2: causing confusion and turmoil. Together you can agitate and spread turbulence
column3: get involved in various activities which will destabilize your surroundings. Possibly conversations with your partner will change your opinion so often that in time you will no longer know what you believe. In this relationship you want to do everything differently than before
column4: but dont have any direction other than rejecting convention. Your circle of friends may find this behavior objectionable
column5: which wont exactly make things any easier. Both of you should make an effort to explain your way of thinking to the other and not to throw out tradition without first finding a sensible alternative.

column1: In extreme cases you may have completely different views than your partner and provoke verbal exchanges in order to prove that you arent letting yourself be dominated. This will ensure that the discussions will be interesting enough
column2: but will prevent a consensus
column3: which is necessary for any couple. You enjoy provoking each other so much that you cant find any peace together
column4: which you both desperately need. If you want to stay together
column5: you should first place an emphasis on your common ground and try to understand your partners convictions before you reject them. Work on establishing at least a few basic rules and maintain your point of view for a while to show your partner what you're up to."

column1: 1195;KOMBIN_0000000001884290;Mercury in Trine with Uranus;"You enjoy being active together and will have countless discussions. These will lead you to depart from traditional values which you have taken over without thinking about and have been carrying them around inside. On an intellectual level you will understand each other and will have brilliant ideas and make discoveries which up until now have been inhibited by rigid ways of thinking. Together you will develop new ideas and oppose senseless regulations while consequently making use of your intellectual freedom. You approach unusual topics without prejudice
column2: discuss God and the world and have a good time together. Transformation of thought will effect both your behavior and the way you live. In extreme cases
column3: this will lead you to recognize the entire range of options open to you. They may even arouse your curiosity enough to let you take off on paths where you wouldnt have dared to tread without your partner.

column1: Enjoy the new world which is opening up in front of you and make good use of your imagination and your wealth of ideas. Maybe you will develop innovative business ideas together or be successful because you finally make new suggestions which the competition has never thought of. In any case you will make important experiences which will leave their impression on you after you have separated. Because you have a lot of fun together and share diverse activities
column2: you will probably stay together a long time."

column1: 1209;KOMBIN_0000000002146434;Mercury in Trine with Neptune;"You should understand each other well and see immediately where your partner is headed. This may not take a lot of words

column1: 1213;KOMBIN_0000000002375810;Mercury in Opposition with Pluto;"Generally an opposition indicates a certain problem and it would be a good idea to be more careful. It is as if each of you becomes a part of the other and can set things in motion which can later take on a life of their own and may even cause damage. Both of you could lead toward a domination of the other and insist on getting your way under all circumstances
column2: which naturally can lead to a number of conflicts. Probably you will have to learn the art of reaching a compromise and because whenever Pluto is involved fundamental changes can take place. This presents you with many opportunities; however if you dont make use of them and assume that you and only you know the right way to do things
column3: it will become difficult because your partner has an equal mental strength and isnt going to put up with your behavior for long. The result could be loud conflicts where both of you give the other a piece of your mind and may even find it satisfying to hit your partner below the belt.

column1: Both of you are faced with the challenge of questioning your way of thinking and showing respect for your partners intellectual achievements. Guard yourself against psychoanalytical judgment because they could be too destructive and self-righteous. In any case you should listen to criticism and take your partners complaints seriously. Your challenge is to maintain a balance between intellectual autonomy on one side and the ability to see things from another perspective. This will be demanding but will also inspire important developments."

1215;KOMBIN_0000000002408578;Mercury in Trine with Pluto;"This aspect may cause confusion in your consciousness and thought processes
column2: which can only have positive effects. You are especially intrigued by the psychology of this union. The deep conversations stimulate you intellectually and do more than just scratch the surface. You find your partners personality as well as the relationship itself so interesting that it presents an intellectual challenge which makes it easy for you to either train your mind or part with the convictions you held previously. This will be the start of something which will turn your way of seeing things up-side-down and may even completely transform the way you go about taking care of the little things of every day life as well as complex problems. With your eye for detail you are no longer satisfied with flimsy excuses and dig until you get down to what you were after.

column1: For this reason you could do well in scientific research together or be able to convince others. You plan every detail
column2: are well equipped for every argument and will acquire a good understanding of human nature in the course of time. The greater the problem
column3: the more intriguing the solution. Even if you are only working on ""normal"" incidents
column4: others will trust your judgment."

column1: 1221;KOMBIN_0000000002359426;Mercury in Conjunction with Pluto;"The connection between Mercury and Pluto in Composite/Combine horoscopes indicates that you enjoy analyzing each other and dont shy away from addressing delicate problems. Possibly your way of thinking and the way your logic works will be changed by this union
column2: which should be mostly positive
column3: if you both manage to accept your partners motivation. Certain situations and experiences will bring you to question your previous behavior completely and develop the ability to revise your convictions. You should be able to recognize what is going on in your relationship and be able to comprehend your partners personality. Because neither of you want to stagnate
column4: you will have productive discussions and be happy about the intellectual activity.

column1: This conjunction could be problematic since it could lead to exerting more influence on your partners thinking than is justified. If you approach the relationship with certain ideas and expectations you may try to dominate the other and take up so much of your partner s space that he or she wont dare to take a step without worrying about what you will say about it. Your intention should be to remain intellectually independent and still keep up the exchange which will give you every opportunity to train your intellect and attain new perspectives."

column1: 1241;KOMBIN_0000000001048770;Venus in Conjunction with Mars;"You probably have a very temperamental way of dealing with each other and show each other the passionate sides of your personality. This conjunction indicates a sexual relationship in which this area doesnt play a subordinate role. Most likely your feelings are in harmony with your behavior. Assume that it will never be boring and that you will be happy to withstand tests to your courage and be physically active enough to get to know your limits. What is special about this conjunction is its effect on contradictory emotions whereby they are mixed; this could result in a love/hate relationship which will give you the opportunity to feel attracted to your partner while you are fighting each other.
To both of you love means surviving the challenges of life by offering each other support whenever you can
column2: whereby you shouldnt let yourself be taken advantage of. This attitude will prevent you from giving up your rights or from wanting to take advantage of your partner. You are both strong and can assert yourself when necessary. Although you dont hold grudges
column3: but are intense. It may be that your expression of affection come across rather crudely
column4: still you can be sure that your partner understands what you mean. Be prepared for an exciting relationship in which the will to manipulate and to compromise are closely related."

column5: if it has been missing up until now. column1: 1245;KOMBIN_0000000001376450;Venus in Sextile with Jupiter;"You are open and generous with each other and wont allow yourselves to be restricted by misconceptions of love which seem more like ownership. The harmonious quality of this sextile and the fortunate influence of Jupiter will make it possible for you to live your lives together with mutual good will and also make it possible for you to never lose respect for each other. The benefits of this relationship could show up in the area of finances and can be especially noticeable in your newly gained self-confidence. You support each other as well as you can which results in a deep trust you have for each other. The only disadvantage could be that you both prefer to live in comfort and avoid any difficult challenges because you find being together completely satisfying. It would be a shame if you didnt make use of the opportunities for development
column2: you may regret it someday.

column2: that will change now. Also the relationship itself is structured so that each of you has enough freedom and space to do your own thing without becoming dependent on the other in any way. It makes you happy to be unsure of what tomorrow will bring which will prevent you from ever developing long term plans. On the other hand you could use the talents you have developed and try to live out your entire potential."

column1: 1327;KOMBIN_0000000001868034;Mars in Square with Uranus;"Probably you both have problems keeping your temper under control and maintaining a minimum of predictability for your partner. You can both suddenly feel a need to do something and go into action without thinking
column2: which can burden your relationship and cause confusion. The level of energy is high
column3: although it can't always be put to use
column4: which is why you often lose patience when your partner has done something and you are no longer sure what your common goal actually was. It will be important for you to clear up basic questions beforehand
column5: even if you find it difficult. Because you both are apt to want to have your way in all circumstances
column6: it will be sensible to set up some ground rules and maybe even the corresponding sanctions while you're at it. Because you are allergic to any kind of restriction
column7: you will either have to realize that a relationship is more than just a dance
column8: or split up.

column1: It would be wonderful if you could find a common area of interest which is fun for both of you and where you can put your ideas into practice. Any kind of irritation will unload itself and lead to a loss of trust. Try to keep control of your temper and be ""reasonable"" or else the ensuing storm may be violent enough to make a reconciliation impossible."

1333;KOMBIN_0000000002113794;Mars in Opposition with Neptune;"Your relationship probably lacks clarity about what you would like to achieve together and how to go about it. Your goals aren't clearly defined
column2: and what is worse
column3: you could become confused about your rights and start sacrificing yourselves for each other
column4: although no one expects it of you. The partnership could generally weaken your self confidence and cause you to question your needs and abilities. A fear of open confrontation and unpleasant words could cause you to put up a front and turn your dissatisfaction toward your partner inward which may make you feel guilty. If you can overcome all of this
column5: you will have the strength to stay on your path
column6: as long as you have analyzed it critically.

column1: Neptune's qualities could lead you to set your ambitions too high and to try to achieve too much of your idealism in the course of your efforts and generally in the way you go about doing things. Hopefully this attitude won't bar you from ever being happy. It may be an attitude of martyrdom which brings you to want to sacrifice
column2: especially in relation to the partnership
column3: without insisting on satisfying any needs of your own. Or you don't have enough confidence to defend your efforts and make your partner understand that this is just your way of striving for success. Illusion
column4: self-deception and unnecessary evasive maneuvers could result. Possibly you are making yourself weaker than you actually are in order to bind your partner and fill him or her with guilt
column5: if you have stopped paying attention to each other. All this is the consequence of a misguided self-image and assertiveness
column6: made possible by Neptune forming an opposition with Mars. If you want to master these difficulties you will have to first be honest with yourself and ask yourself what you want before you will be able to convince your partner."

column1: 1335;KOMBIN_0000000002146562;Mars in Trine with Neptune;"Between you there is not only complete agreement on your common goals
column2: but also on how to get there
column3: without having to rely on long tedious discussions. That is because you understand each other so well and seem to think on the same wavelength without using spoken language. To others you seem to be unusually gentle and sensitive and you would never allow yourself to make exaggerated demands or to try to force these on everyone around you against their will. You are extraordinarily conscientious toward each other
column4: thus you try to avoid direct confrontation while working on creating a basic harmony. Probably you have good intentions and want to be helpful to others and invest your energy in projects which benefit more people than just yourself. Maybe the hidden intent of your relationship is to work toward your ideal whereby Neptune's involvement makes it possible for your focus to be spiritual or artistic.

column1: The relationship should also have a positive effect on you and could bring you to free your life from unnecessary stress and lend a spiritual note to your assertiveness which will tell you about the state of your ego. Narcissism
column2: reacting defiantly and working for your personal advantage at the cost of others will mostly cease to exist. If you have a sexual relationship
column3: the emphasis of the union will be more on spiritual aspects than on the physical. Generally you should not allow yourself to be taken advantage of and learn to say no at the right point
column4: because your good nature could be misinterpreted by egotistical people."

column1: 1341;KOMBIN_0000000002097410;Mars in Conjunction with Neptune;"The connection between Mars and Neptune in a Composite/Combine horoscope could prove to be difficult because your energy may be weakened and you may have problems asserting yourself in day to day life. Maybe you will have enough self confidence and the relationship may bring you to doubt if your previous goals have been self centered and you are allowed to insist on having certain expectations of life. You could invest all your energy in working for your partner's ideas so that each of you feels obligated to hold your own self expression back in order to chase abstruse ideals of true solidarity. This will make you both dissatisfied in the long run
column2: unless you are extremely sensitive to what makes your partner happy and what you can rely on. You should fulfill each other's wishes without letting guilt put you under pressure.

column1: You have to be careful not to try to pad each other against every pain and to vent aggravation which can build up suddenly. Maybe you see your partner weaker than he or she really is and ""coddle"" him so much that it inhibits development. Be aware that you are capable of doing everything you used to do before the relationship. Also it will be necessary to make clear agreements about your common goals and about what each of you can to do further them. On an intellectual level you should be very understanding of each other and don't have to prove that you are capable of recognizing and taking care of your obligations together in every day life. It would probably be a good idea to look either for a position where you can help others or for something in the arts."

1343;KOMBIN_0000000002359554;Mars in Conjunction with Pluto;"The relationship between you may be characterized by strength and a desire to dominate. The way you treat each other isn't exactly gentle
column2: but shows both a willingness to take risks as well as a strong will. There could be some violent collisions in store for you
column3: although this conjunction really means that there is a higher level of energy in the relationship and that by being together you have the ability to generate more energy. How you use this reservoir is another story. Beware of taking yourself and what you do too serious and do not try to always get your way at all circumstances. You may be getting away with it
column4: but only through hard battles and at the cost of harmony
column5: because your partner won't give you anything for free. If your motivations aren't ""kosher"" and you are only thinking of yourself
column6: you will have the potential to lose all sensitivity and inconsiderately oppose all adversaries
column7: which may include your partner.

column1: This conjunction can also indicate that a great change is taking place within you which can turn your goals and your drive to assert yourself in a completely new direction. Not only you but also your community will profit from your intellectual and physical abilities. Maybe you have something important in mind you would like to do together which you are working for investing all your energy. You could achieve everything you take on in peaceful cooperation and leave your mark on your entire surroundings. That will only happen if you respect each other and don't use your energy for destruction. Especially sexuality will be very important to you and will hopefully show you that working together will bring more fulfillment than otherwise."

1345;KOMBIN_0000000002425090;Mars in Sextile with Pluto;"You can develop well together and your union will also have beneficial effects on your self confidence.
Probably you feel an urge to look for something useful to do
column2: where you both can use your abilities to change the world in some small way. You are willing to examine your goals critically and to let your partner give you tips. Although you motivate each other
column3: neither of you is trying to outdo the other or to steer your partner in a certain direction. The relationship will make you aware of your strengths and potential
column4: but instead of making you big-headed
column5: it will bring you to identify weaknesses and to think about what you can do better. Basically it would be an advantage for you to roll up your sleeves and take on life the way it is and with as few preconceptions as possible. Probably you won't forget your own needs
column6: although you see yourself as a part of the community which makes your contribution to every project especially valuable.

column1: Sexuality will be very important to you and may provide an impulse for making changes. Maybe you have some extreme experiences in this respect before you since you feel strongly attracted to each other. The attraction is so great that you may be completely obsessed with each other for a time
column2: which will do no harm. It would be better for you to invest your energy in a form of expression in order to enable you to experience the beauty of making someone else happy."

column1: 1347;KOMBIN_0000000002392322;Mars in Square with Pluto;"You should be very careful with each other because your interaction could produce an energy capable of causing great destruction
column2: even if you aren't aware of it. It could seem as though you are working more against each other than with each other or that one of you is trying to dominate the other with a strong will. In conflicts you could let all your masks fall and try to get in a good punch in any way possible. The problem is that you both want to have your way and enter compromises only reluctantly. It may be that you don't see yourself as being able to give in
column3: but with a basic attitude which leads you to overemphasize your own needs and keep yourself from disappearing into the shadows.

column1: Your relationship is dynamic and has a high energy level which you will have to use carefully if you want to put it to good use. The impulses you provide for each other could spur your drive to advance. If you see the relationship as nothing but a challenge where you have to prove yourself each day
column2: it will quickly tire both of you. This square should be examined more closely to see if other horoscope factors can compensate for it
column3: otherwise the atmosphere could be like that of an unending battle. This will bring about some changes in you
column4: although these won't be especially desirable."

column1: 1349;KOMBIN_0000000002408706;Mars in Trine with Pluto;"You can develop well together and your union will also have beneficial effects on your self confidence.
Probably you feel an urge to look for something useful to do
column2: where you both can use your abilities to change the world in some small way. You are willing to examine your goals critically and to let your partner give you tips. Although you motivate each other

column4: but instead of making you big-headed
column5: it will bring you to identify weaknesses and to think about what you can do better. Basically it would be an advantage for you to roll up your sleeves and take on life the way it is and with as few preconceptions as possible. Probably you won't forget your own needs
column6: although you see yourself as a part of the community which makes your contribution to every project especially valuable.

column1: 1351;KOMBIN_0000000002375938;Mars in Opposition with Pluto;"You should be very careful with each other because your interaction could produce an energy capable of causing great destruction
column2: even if you aren't aware of it. It could seem as though you are working more against each other than with each other or that one of you is trying to dominate the other with a strong will. In conflicts you could let all your masks fall and try to get in a good punch in any way possible. The problem is that you both want to have your way and enter compromises only reluctantly. It may be that you don't see yourself as being able to give in
column3: but with a basic attitude which leads you to overemphasize your own needs and keep yourself from disappearing into the shadows.

column1: Your relationship is dynamic and has a high energy level which you will have to use carefully if you want to put it to good use. The impulses you provide for each other could spur your drive to advance. If you see the relationship as nothing but a challenge where you have to prove yourself each day
column2: it will quickly tire both of you. This opposition should be examined more closely to see if other horoscope factors can compensate for it
column3: otherwise the atmosphere could be like that of an unending battle. This will bring about some changes in you
column4: although these won't be especially desirable."

column1: 1353;KOMBIN_0000000009191682;Mars in Opposition with the Ascendant;"The partnership will make you aware of your strength which can have positive or negative effects. When it gets serious you will develop confidence
column2: be active together and find confirmation in almost everything you take on. Your partner encourages you to assert yourself and to speak up whenever a disagreement arises. The way you speak with each other is direct and clear
column3: neither of you shies away from expressing criticism because you are sure that it wont be misconstrued. If one of you is feeling tired or is lacking energy
column4: the other will wake her up and show her how much energy well earned success can generate. You enjoy making a new life together and working together as a team.

column1: You have to watch out that no too much competitive thinking slips in on you leaving you constantly trying to interrupt the other. Probably this situation will arise when a common goal
column2: which you can work towards is lacking. The tone between you can be somewhat aggressive
column3: with conflicts arising more frequently until at some point neither of you will want to give in. You know what you can achieve and if you simply insist on getting your way long enough
column4: it will only serve to intensify your egotism
column5: which may make an estrangement unavoidable because neither of you is dependent on the other's assistance. Circumstances may arise in which you will be forced to defend yourselves against attacks from outside because you appear self-confident
column6: which some people can't deal with."

column1: 1355;KOMBIN_0000000009224450;Mars in Trine with the Ascendant;"Neither of you likes to be lazy or to spend a lot of time theorizing; you have more of a drive to do something active together and to take your lives into your own hands. The partnership will give you enough confidence to bring up reasonable requests and won't keep you from opposing your enemies with the necessary force. You will get to know your strengths and will appreciate the fact that you don't have to put on velvet gloves before you touch your partner but can deal with each other without things becoming overly complicated. This should allow you to say what you think is right; you don't have to hold back or suffer from a lack of opportunities to develop your abilities and follow your interests. The efforts you make hand in hand are those you enjoy the most anyway
column2: and will prove to be the most productive as long as you are able to master the tight rope act involved in acknowledging your needs and asserting yourself when it is important
column3: on the other hand being considerate and not placing your ego too much in the foreground.

column1: Use this trine to structure your surroundings according to your wishes
column2: you won't offend anyone
column3: but you may captivate other people along the way and maybe realize things which would have remained empty chatter without your initiative. With this energy you could both come to celebrate many successes which is why a professional relationship could profit from this aspect. You can rely on at least one of you having enough energy to motivate the other
column4: if it should ever be necessary."
