column1: 1357;KOMBIN_0000000009208066;Mars in Square with the Ascendant;"In your relationship everything will depend on whether you are reasonable enough to sacrifice your own interests in favor of your partner. This square indicates that you have a tendency to assert your egotistical wishes against your partner's will and to provoke conflicts. Probably each of you wants to have the last word. Thus you are quick to feel constrained and can't bring yourself to give in once in a while. Both of you like to be active and have to put a lot of effort into finding the right catalytic converter for your excess energy. If you aren't able to do that
column2: you may wind up flipping out whenever everything doesn't go the way you want it to. Because you enjoy giving in to your aggressive nature
column3: the tone in your home could be a little rough. The problem of how to appear in public together will take on more importance. Each of you could be under pressure not to seem like a wimp and therefore endeavor to display strength. Of course no one expects this kind of behavior to create a warm
column4: homey environment.

column1: Try to examine more closely what it is about your partner that provokes you and what it is that causes you to lose yourself. It may be that these are problems which you can only solve with yourself because it doesn't have anything to do with the other. It would be a shame if you were to waste your precious energy on senseless arguments instead of making constructive use of it and working together."

column1: 1361;KOMBIN_0000000009175362;Jupiter in Conjunction with the Ascendant;"The relationship will prove to be advantageous to you. It will open up possibilities which you would never have been exposed to without your partner. These opportunities could manifest themselves in your human development as well as in concrete material gains. It almost seems as if success is always within your reach and it is only up to you to grab it. Probably your mental attitude
column2: which is characterized by optimism
column3: far-sightedness and mutual good will
column4: will lead you to accept your partner from the start and to offer every kind of support without allowing it to make you dependent. You will be able to get to the bottom of this relationship and recognize its meaning for the future in light of your past. In addition you are generous with each other and can give without expecting anything in return. Tolerance for the others weaknesses makes it easier for both of you to recognize your mistakes and to overcome them without getting uptight.

column1: The most important aspect is a fundamental belief in the future
column2: which your partnership will be able to provide. You sense that you will stand behind each other through all the difficulties as long as things remain fair and you dont lose faith in each other. Because you enjoy learning from your partner you are even willing to change your view of the world
column3: which certainly wouldnt do you any harm."

column1: 1363;KOMBIN_0000000001573186;Jupiter in Conjunction with Uranus;"With this conjunction Saturn is trying to see your relationship realistically and not expect more than it can deliver. This attitude can be either positive or negative depending on its intensity: you will save yourself some disappointment if you can avoid plunging into doing things which you don't fully understand and act more reservedly
column2: always doing your best to cover yourself. In extreme cases you could miss some good opportunities because you aren't open or confident enough to recognize and make use of them. Maybe you aren't able to see the options open to you and place yourself under restrictions which can bring you down. You will always be reasonable
column3: although a little overconfidence at the right time can make the relationship more lively and more exciting. If you say from the start that traditional ways of doing things are the only options
column4: you will rob yourself of the opportunity to celebrate great successes.

column1: In spite of this you will get along well; without making exaggerated demands and keeping yourselves content. An additional advantage of this conjunction is its tranquillity
column2: especially if important decisions have to be made. You won't rush into anything or rely on luck
column3: because you are convinced that everything has to be earned and even if you were to become rich one day
column4: both of you will guard against throwing your money out the window
column5: but will make intelligent investments
column6: preferably in real estate. Your goal is to let your relationship form a secure basis and to keep it under control the best you can. Your efforts should also be successful. If this attitude was brought about by painful memories
column7: it would be better to direct your attention to the future and not to close yourself off to positive experiences."

column1: 1365;KOMBIN_0000000001638722;Jupiter in Sextile with Saturn;"Your relationship may be well balanced
column2: as far as your expectations for the future are concerned: you can judge the situation between you realistically and also see the possibilities open to each of you. This will prevent you from losing contact with reality and help you to take advantage of every opportunity. You can put your thoughts and ideas into practice whenever you want
column3: without getting involved in false or exaggerated expectations. Fortune will be on your side because that is what this sextile stands for. You are not asking for anything free
column4: but try to do everything you do without getting uptight and watch it from a distance. Work and other efforts provide more enjoyment when they have meaning
column5: which is why social projects or supporting organizations working for a better future are perfect for you.

column1: Because you see each other the way you are
column2: there shouldn't be any great disappointment in store for you. Your partnership is stable
column3: but lively and what is especially positive is that you complement each other and whenever necessary can spur the other on or call for moderation. Most likely you will keep your respect for your partner and stay together for a long time. The satisfaction and the perspective you find in this relationship are based on your basic attitude toward the most reasonable way for people to treat each other. And because you not only make an effort but can also admit to your own mistakes
column4: you will be able to live out your intellectual potential in your every day life."

column1: 1367;KOMBIN_0000000001605954;Jupiter in Square with Saturn;"Your relationship to each other could leave you feeling very imbalanced and cause you to see your situation from one day to the next in completely different colors. You are either overly optimistic
column2: oblivious to the most evident facts
column3: or you see everything too pessimistically and shy away from changes out of fear of the uncertain. Maybe this constellation also means that you have very different attitudes toward life which may lead one of you to try to hold the other back
column4: making him or her feel like being restricted. It would be positive if you were able to bring your opposing qualities into harmony and finally achieve realism which includes being able to take calculated risks. Still square aspects represent a challenge in the respect that the partner may have trouble unifying all the energies involved.

column1: This square concerns the necessary qualities which exist in a state of infancy

column5: either to your partners need for security or the need to be unrestrained. If you arent willing to compromise
column6: at least one of you will become dissatisfied over time."

column1: 1381;KOMBIN_0000000001835330;Jupiter in Conjunction with Uranus;"You are a couple which likes to go out exploring and are interested in everything new. It is important to you that your partner has an independent personality because you arent interested in any form of mothering or taking your partner by the hand. Probably you want to keep all possibilities for your future open
column2: but you will stay together as long as you get along well and as long as your partnership gives you enough impulses. Neither of you should be dependent on the other
column3: but find that sharing your lives with each other is more fulfilling. That's why you chose to stay together. There are no definitive rules between you
column4: you both stay flexible and spontaneous so that situations will come up which you would never have thought about before. You need a certain excitement and change
column5: which is guaranteed by your open and active lifestyle.

column1: The relationship will bring about a change of mind. You wont just settle for the superficial. You want the things you do to be meaningful. Maybe you have a very unusual partnership
column2: which others wont object to because you can relate its advantages well and others are in favor of your lifestyle. Possibly you have enough power to initiate social changes in your immediate surroundings and to convince others to free themselves from their self-imposed restrictions. You will be good for each other
column3: which applies to both your private life as well as to your business relations
column4: because you give your partner plenty of space to develop and are honest and friendly with each other and your intentions are basically good. Eventually the relationship will be ended
column5: if one of you starts looking for more stability
column6: although additional factors of the horoscope should be considered before assuming that this is the case."

column1: 1383;KOMBIN_0000000002097474;Jupiter in Conjunction with Neptune;"You treat each other with sensitivity and arent leading this relationship merely to coordinate every day life together
column2: but to satisfy your intellectual and spiritual needs and to immerse yourself in new worlds together. Probably you dont hesitate to share your most secret thoughts and wishes and to fantasize together uninhibitedly
column3: because your dreams are in harmony with each other and are usually concerned with people learning to understand each other better. Even if you appear unworldly
column4: your lack of even a trace of evil intentions together with your warm and friendly manner will evoke sympathy. Yet you should still make an effort not to lose sight of reality and not to neglect small every day obligations because otherwise conflicts may arise
column5: which will exist even if you dont understand them.

column1: You will get to know your partners inner life down to the last detail because neither of you are afraid of getting close and you can melt into each other
column2: with complete trust. Possibly you will devote yourselves to religious questions
column3: recognize the true nature of your spirituality and begin to delve into esoteric studies. In any case you can approach spiritual questions which require a sense of overlying principles. This could lead to a special kind of maturity and charm. Additionally you bring a willingness to experience true happiness and bonding through being together with this person. Armed with this attitude
column4: your search is destined to be successful. Deep within you sense a confidence which allows you to look into the future with joy and tranquillity. You would do everything in order to avoid disappointing the other
column5: still you should try to find clear words and not ignore healthy reason."

Fear of disrupting this tranquillity could lead to a rude awakening one day. Maybe you have already begun to see your partner more as a prince or princess than as a person
column2: which wont make day to day living very easy. But it doesnt have to reach that point
column3: if you try to love your partner with all his or her faults and not ignore human weakness.

column1: It may be that you have exaggerated your relationship from the start and make it out to be more than it is. Reality seems to be too boring or gruesome to allow you to live in satisfaction
column2: but at some point you are going to have to grow up. It would be best to ask yourself if you really love each other as you actually are or if you are in love with an image of your own creation. You probably consider this relationship unique
column3: and should probably clarify for yourself what you find so special about it. It isnt necessary to pad each other in cotton
column4: even if you feel uncertain
column5: two people who are really close to each other wont separate so quickly. So keep your eyes open and let yourself be surprised at how interesting and exciting a partnership can be
column6: even if it is less than perfect."

column1: 1393;KOMBIN_0000000002376002;Jupiter in Opposition with Pluto;"It may be that the two of you are so obsessed with being successful that your attitude makes your lives difficult. Social position means a lot to you. All this could cause your life together to be reduced to practical organization where tenderness and sensitivity is neglected. In spite of this you could be very successful and achieve what you set out to do
column2: however the question remains
column3: whether that contributes to your happiness? But maybe you got into this partnership under the pretense of helping each other out and were prepared to take on certain roles from the beginning which are then tied to specific expectations. Think about whether you really accept your partners weaknesses and stand by when you are needed. You shouldnt resent your abilities but should be willing to learn from each other.

column1: Maybe you are trying to keep each other under control and want to keep tabs on everything your partner does. You could have a tendency to see each other as competitors working against each other instead of admitting that your abilities are complementary. With a little cooperative effort you could realize your dreams. People around you will feel the influence of your charm
column2: because you could try to use it to win friends for yourself and subtly turn them against your partner. The stress could cramp you up so much that it leaves you isolated. Consider whether you are ready to approach each other with good will and treat each other well. If that is the case
column3: you can turn over a new leaf; you just need to be understanding and to relax a little in order to tune into your strengths instead of your weaknesses."

column1: Maybe you are trying to keep each other under control and want to keep tabs on everything your partner does. You could have a tendency to see each other as competitors working against each other instead of admitting that your abilities are complementary. column2: because you could try to use it to win friends for yourself and subtly turn them against your partner. The stress could cramp you up so much that it leaves you isolated. Consider whether you are ready to approach each other with good will and treat each other well. If that is the case
column3: you can turn over a new leaf; you just need to be understanding and to relax a little in order to tune into your strengths instead of your weaknesses."

column1: 1401;KOMBIN_0000000002359618;Jupiter in Conjunction with Pluto;"This conjunction is characterized by motives and actions which are not based on personal gain. column4: which are especially favored by Jupiter
column5: but also in all other undertakings.

column5: you will both find appropriate ways to live out the aspects potential and to let everyone who is close to you share the results of your achievements."

column1: 1403;KOMBIN_0000000009240898;Jupiter in Sextile with the Ascendant;"The relationship will prove to be advantageous to you. It will open up possibilities which you would never have been exposed to without your partner. These opportunities could manifest themselves in your human development as well as in concrete material gains. It almost seems as if success is always within your reach and it is only up to you to grab it. Probably your mental attitude
column2: which is characterized by optimism
column3: far-sightedness and mutual good will
column4: will lead you to accept your partner from the start and to offer every kind of support without allowing it to make you dependent. You will be able to get to the bottom of this relationship and recognize its meaning for the future in light of your past. In addition you are generous with each other and can give without expecting anything in return. Tolerance for the others weaknesses makes it easier for both of you to recognize your mistakes and to overcome them without getting uptight.

column1: The most important aspect is a fundamental belief in the future
column2: which your partnership will be able to provide. You sense that you will stand behind each other through all the difficulties as long as things remain fair and you dont lose faith in each other. Because you enjoy learning from your partner you are even willing to change your view of the world
column3: which certainly wouldnt do you any harm."

column1: 1411;KOMBIN_0000000009191810;Saturn in Opposition with the Ascendant;"Probably you dont motivate each other to enjoy lifes pleasures and take care of your obligations without worrying. This square indicates that you are disciplined and have such high expectations on correct behavior that there is little time left for relaxation. It could be especially difficult for you to show your affection and to let an atmosphere of love and understanding develop. Fear and inhibitions could cause you not be able to trust your partner completely or think that you have to keep control over the relationship. If you arent willing to grant every freedom and you are not leading your relationship in such a way that each one of you can get along without the other
column2: your behavior will result in dependency and rigidity.

column1: This opposition can represent a serious challenge
column2: which is why you should examine more closely whether there are constellations which point to a happy life together. First of all you have to accept the fact that no one
column3: not even your partner sees the world from quite the same perspective as you do and that your partner has to carry the responsibility for his or her own life. Certainly it will improve the situation if you could both ease up and stop seeing the relationship as an obligation or a burden but as an opportunity for further development."

column1: 1413;KOMBIN_0000000002113922;Saturn in Opposition with Neptune;"In combination with Saturn
column2: Neptune brings a danger of grave miscalculations effecting the relationship like no other Neptune opposition. You could also have difficulty seeing both your role in the partnership and your partners personality realistic. It may lead to a deep insecurity about your abilities
column3: your partners reliability or your common ground. You could start to lose self-esteem or blame yourself for events which occurred due to your differing personalities. Actually you could complement each other well
column4: because you can teach each other to keep your feet on the ground of reality as well as learning the value of unconditional faith. Certainly misunderstanding and frustration will arise; both of you will have to invest a lot of patience and understanding for your partners way of seeing things in order to get closer to each other.

column1: 1415;KOMBIN_0000000001851778;Saturn in Opposition with Uranus;"The happiness of your partnership depends on whether you are able to build a healthy and reliable foundation without feeling restricted. Both of you might equate a steady relationship with loss of freedom and mutual control. It may be that neither of you has enough patience to think through the way you go about your daily activities and are looking more for entertainment and excitement than trust and responsibility. It could be that one of you will try to run off as soon as the other starts to consider founding a family or tries to include the other in his or her lifes planning. This is why you should talk about what a long term relationship could be like and what kind of restrictions are tolerable for both of you. The other extreme would be that you freely believe that you have to give up every kind of individuality and never make a decision without your partner because you want to stay together.
Your job is to find a balance between these two extremes which will be satisfactory to you without merely burying the same old frustration below the surface. You shouldnt deny yourself anything
column2: but must recognize how a life together differs from life as a single and at the very least let your partner know where he or she stands with you. If one of you wants to put the other under pressure and force him or her into doing things
column3: your relationship will have no chance; however each of you should decide if you really want to have an equal and lively relationship and then act accordingly."

column1: 1419;KOMBIN_0000000001868162;Saturn in Square with Uranus;"The happiness of your partnership depends on whether you are able to build a healthy and reliable foundation without feeling restricted. Both of you might equate a steady relationship with loss of freedom and mutual control. It may be that neither of you has enough patience to think through the way you go about your daily activities and are looking more for entertainment and excitement than trust and responsibility. It could be that one of you will try to run off as soon as the other starts to consider founding a family or tries to include the other in his or her lifes planning. This is why you should talk about what a long term relationship could be like and what kind of restrictions are tolerable for both of you. The other extreme would be that you freely believe that you have to give up every kind of individuality and never make a decision without your partner because you want to stay together.
Your job is to find a balance between these two extremes which will be satisfactory to you without merely burying the same old frustration below the surface. You shouldnt deny yourself anything
column2: but must recognize how a life together differs from life as a single and at the very least let your partner know where he or she stands with you. If one of you wants to put the other under pressure and force him or her into doing things
column3: your relationship will have no chance; however each of you should decide if you really want to have an equal and lively relationship and then act accordingly."

column1: 1425;KOMBIN_0000000002097538;Saturn in Conjunction with Neptune;"This conjunction will probably bring you to think about the essence of your partnership without drawing any clear conclusions. You may ask yourself what you have in common and which goals you want to set for the future. Everything seems distorted and unclear
column2: which could leave you feeling helpless
column3: abandoned and frightened. You could be confronted with your own weaknesses which will give you the feeling that you arent as strong as you always thought you were and may be losing your confidence in your partners reliability. Your partnership has no recognizable structure
column4: which doesnt necessarily mean that it is completely lacking structure.

column1: This aspect can also be interpreted as an indication of a common foundation
column2: whereby wishful thinking has priority over your sense of reality and you may have to deal with the bitter fact that you have been building on sand. Saturn-Neptune stands for experiences which are mostly unwelcome
column3: but have to be endured whenever you refuse to face reality over a long period of time. Thereby you have the opportunity to change everything for the better and to continue the relationship under different conditions as mature individuals. Once you have overcome this obstacle you will be able to follow your dreams without neglecting your every day obligations. Your competence in combining the material with the spiritual is based on the recognition that the material demands are often exaggerated these days and take up space which could be put to better use by getting closer and becoming more loving and spiritual. This can extend to complete self sacrifice and asceticism. But its not necessary to exaggerate."

column1: 1468;KURZDEUTUNG_0000000000002052;The Moon's Nodes - The Karmic Component - Where Do I Come From - Where Am I Going?;"The Moon's nodes are points where the moon's orbit around the Earth crosses the Earth's orbit around the Sun. The points are calculated and lie directly across from each other. When these two points are connected
column2: the Moon Node Axis crosses the entire chart. It runs backwards
column3: from Aries into Pisces
column4: then into Aquarius
column5: etc.

column1: The Moon Node Axis can travel through the horoscope in 18.5 years
column2: which leaves 1.5 years in each sign. The people our own age have their Moon Nodes in the same sign as we do
column3: but not necessarily in the same house.

column1: The rising Moon Node is referred to as the northern Moon Node or Dragon's Head. The falling Moon Node is called the southern Moon Node or Dragon's Tail. In Indian Astrology they are called Rahu and Ketu.
The meaning of the Moon Node Axis is tied closely to Karmic Astrology and is easier to understand in this context. It begins with a premonition that we are not on planet Earth for the first time
column2: but that we have brought experiences from previous lives with us. In a horoscope the principle of reincarnation is described by the Moon Node Axis
column3: whereby the falling Moon Node shows where the soul is coming from while the rising Moon Node describes where it is going to and our goals in this life. The Axis is the path we walk in this life. It can also be seen as a horoscope compressed into one line
column4: which is expounded on by the remaining factors.

column1: The rising Moon Node contains the sum of all the experiences from our past lives. This is why it seems more familiar to us than its complement. It represents all our favorite habits
column2: which we cannot manage to free ourselves from
column3: but which hamper our development
column4: in other words our personal ""way of least resistance"". It is our duty to overcome our inner obstacles and pave the way for new experiences that go in a completely different direction
column5: as we see on the opposing sign. We should endeavor to free ourselves from the chains of habit and look forward to unexplored harbors. The houses containing the Moon's Nodes tell us which areas we should further develop and where we are caught by transmitted behavior patterns.

column1: One of the most interesting ways to see the personal horoscope is to look at how far we have come and then image what may lie in store for us."

1469;KURZDEUTUNG_0000000000002049;Your Northern Moon Node in Aries;"Your task in this life is to become an independent individual with clearly defined opinions and to pursue your ambitions enthusiastically. Previously
column2: you oriented yourself on your surroundings
column3: striving for recognition from others. This explains why you were often uncertain about your own needs. You sacrificed your identity to a desire to be encompassed by harmony; this dependency made you exploitable. You became a master of compromises designed to synthesize everything into one mass. You probably have spent a lot of time in cultivated circles

column1: 1470;KURZDEUTUNG_0000000000018433;Your Northern Moon Node in Taurus;"This Moon Node position challenges you to stabilize your values during your lifetime and to overcome temptations to misuse power or let yourself be manipulated. column1: 1493;KURZDEUTUNG_0000000000002180;The Part of Fortune - Your Personal Key for True Contentedness;"Everyone asks themselves once in a while what they can do to be happy and finding an answer to this question is not as easy as it may seem

column1: The Part of Fortune is calculated by subtracting the Sun position from the Ascendant position. We add the number of degrees of the moon to this result. A simple formula would look like the following:
Part of Fortune = Ascendant - Sun + Moon
The position of the Sun
column2: the Moon and the Ascendant are not randomly used for calculating the Part of Fortune. It is based on the consideration that the energy of these three bodies are what characterize people and gives them their individual personalities:  The Sun as the symbol of identity and ambition
column3: the Moon for its emotionality and its conscious and subconscious reactions
column4: and finally the Ascendant as the visible personality
column5: which expresses the energies of the Sun and the Moon. The position in the horoscope where Sun
column6: Moon and Ascendant are most harmoniously working together is called the Part of Fortune. The energies of a sign and the affairs of the astrological house concerned will show you how to reach a state of true happiness."

column1: 1574;SYNASTRIE_0000000001572930;His Moon in Conjunction with her Saturn;Your partner may try to exercise a restrictive influence on you. Especially on an emotional level

column1: 1575;SYNASTRIE_0000000001835074;His Moon in Conjunction with her Uranus;"Here your partner will always be good for surprises. You will feel this especially on an emotional level. Even if you usually enjoy it

column4: she will be capable of surprising you with a sincere expression of affection. Basically it will be noticeable that this aspect will bring a lot of changes into both of your lives; whether you can stand that
column5: will be up to you."

column5: while she appreciates having enough trust to let herself fall."

This is a very human experience and it is to be hoped that people become aware of these cycles and learn to use the energy released during that time creatively.

column1: 1579;SYNASTRIE_0000000000278594;His Moon in Opposition with her Moon;The feelings of both partners will be very different from each other so that you may react completely different in the same situation. Probably it is not easy to deal with the problems this aspect brings
column2: even if you are very interested in each other. Your intuition will drive you to opposite poles and it is probably hard for you to make your partner understand the way you feel. Emotional security may be out of reach for both of you. Don't ever stop sharing things with each other or the relationship won't stand a chance.

column1: 1580;SYNASTRIE_0000000000540738;His Moon in Opposition with her Mercury;"The man's feelings will go in another direction than the woman's thoughts. column2: which may be just a demonstration of his defiance. He would like to give her warmth and comfort
column3: while she misses stimulating discussions with him. It won't be easy for you to just relax together."

column1: 1581;SYNASTRIE_0000000000802882;His Moon in Opposition with her Venus;This relationship may contain some emotional conflicts. You have different ideas about harmony in a partnership. column2: therefore having no understanding for him. Even if she tries she may have trouble getting close to him. This is a challenging aspect maybe resulting in a disappointment. You should both approach your problems with a lot of sensitivity.

column1: 1582;SYNASTRIE_0000000001065026;His Moon in Opposition with her Mars;Here there is a danger of recklessly ignoring your partner's feelings and hurting him deeply. Maybe you want to dominate him by any means possible and don't give him a chance to show you who he really is. You think of him as being weak and try to provoke him to become aware of his strengths. Still these games won't help him because he is looking for a feeling of security not competition. You should really be a little more caring and try to understand the way he feels
column2: if you want this relationship to have a chance. On the other hand he could let himself get caught up in your ideas and try to live life more courageously.

column1: 1583;SYNASTRIE_0000000001327170;His Moon in Opposition with her Jupiter;"This is a challenging aspect because the woman's drive for freedom can make her partner feel insecure. column2: while he prefers to take care of the smaller problems of every day life. Her basic mood is more optimistic than his and it takes him a lot longer to get over an insult or a disappointment. Maybe he will accuse her of not being interested in his personality
column3: preferring to go out and be with a crowd of people rather than staying at home with him. If you want to resolve your conflicts in this respect
column4: you are going to have to put in a lot of effort."

column1: 1584;SYNASTRIE_0000000001589314;His Moon in Opposition with her Saturn;This opposition will lend your partnership a bitter note. column3: thus you should have no problem to agree on a decor for your home. She likes to get his inspiration from her partner and may even become a warm and likable person through him.

column1: 1671;SYNASTRIE_0000000000786626;His Venus in Conjunction with her Venus;This aspect is very beautiful and indicates happiness and harmony for the relationship. column2: this will allow you to have a lot of good times together. Since you have the same taste and complement each other well you can also create artistically together. If there aren't too many negative aspects
column3: you will probably have a long relationship based on equality.

column1: 1672;SYNASTRIE_0000000001048770;His Venus in Conjunction with her Mars;According to the classical gender roles

column4: that's why it could last a long time.

column1: 1675;SYNASTRIE_0000000001835202;His Venus in Conjunction with her Uranus;"Probably you fell in love quickly; and you may have felt the sparks intensely. Your partner appreciates your spontaneity and is probably not looking for a relationship for a feeling of security

column1: 1777;SYNASTRIE_0000000002359618;His Jupiter in Conjunction with her Pluto;Here you will sometimes be able to cheer up your partner when she is depressed

Through her you will be able to internalize the returning cycles of life.

column1: 1778;SYNASTRIE_0000000000016706;His Jupiter in Opposition with her Sun;In the negative sense of this aspect one of you may feel overwhelmed by the other

column1: 1779;SYNASTRIE_0000000000278850;His Jupiter in Opposition with her Moon;"This is a challenging aspect because the man's drive for freedom can make his partner feel insecure. Her world is too small for him; he is curious and open for new developments. His thoughts are occupied with philosophy and ethics
column2: while she prefers to take care of the smaller problems of every day life. His basic mood is more optimistic than hers and it takes her a lot longer to get over an insult or a disappointment. Maybe she will accuse him of not being interested in her personality
column3: preferring to go out and be with a crowd of people rather than staying at home with her. If you want to resolve your conflicts in this respect
column4: you are going to have to put in a lot of effort."

column1: 1780;SYNASTRIE_0000000000540994;His Jupiter in Opposition with her Mercury;"There could be problems because your view of the world just doesn't jam with your partner's practical thinking. Maybe you find her to be too conservative and would like her to look at life more objectively and understand the larger context of things. On the other hand
column2: she finds you superficial because according to her
column3: you never bother with details. This may result in communication problems. You will probably start pursuing new interests frequently and are intellectually more flexible than your partner; it could be good for her to partially adopt your attitude towards life."

column1: 1781;SYNASTRIE_0000000000803138;His Jupiter in Opposition with her Venus;"Maybe your partner's world is too small for you and she suffers because she never has the feeling that you are there just for her
column2: even for a short time. Your view of the world is made up of more freedom and tolerance than she is prepared to give you in the relationship. This is why it will be difficult to find a consensus. You aren't interested in stability and togetherness; but want to develop your mind and she may just be in your way. You will see her affection and need for harmony as an obstruction to your search for the higher truth. If you want to continue the relationship
column3: you will need to compromise."

column1: 1782;SYNASTRIE_0000000001065282;His Jupiter in Opposition with her Mars;You will fight your partner's independent consciousness and won't even be willing to listen to him. It may come to power struggles where he will fight with words while you counter with quick action
column2: hurting him more than you realize. Unfortunately these conflicts won't be productive until you are able to reach compromises. You won't even consider his ideas and he won't be able to deal with your energy. If you aren't able to come to terms with him
column3: he isn't going to hang around for long. Then you will probably be disappointed and feel humiliated
column4: while he will be happy to have freed himself from your chains.

column1: 1783;SYNASTRIE_0000000001327426;His Jupiter in Opposition with her Jupiter;With this opposition two different worlds will collide
column2: and if you don't watch out
column3: you will waste all your energy trying to convince each other of your positions. Each of you needs a certain amount of autonomy and independence
column4: still it's not easy for either of you to grant your partner the same freedom you would like to have. This aspect may promote your personal development
column5: but you will need more respect for each other
column6: focus more of your attention on the other's positive sides and offer more support.

column1: 1784;SYNASTRIE_0000000001589570;His Jupiter in Opposition with her Saturn;"Probably the man has restricted his partner somewhat
column2: because she doesn't think as freely as he does. He needs a certain amount of independence
column3: tolerance and honesty while she prefers to hang on to traditional values out of fear of change. Here two adverse philosophies will collide. She is willing to take on responsibility for a life together and to offer her partner security and constancy
column4: but that isn't enough for him. His world is simply larger than hers; he is curious and wants new experiences
column5: while she doesn't want to go along. He may be unwilling to commit himself and may be hurting her. You should recognize that you would make a great team if you could recognize each other's qualities."

column1: 1785;SYNASTRIE_0000000001851714;His Jupiter in Opposition with her Uranus;This opposition will create a lot of turmoil and dissatisfaction in the partnership. Maybe no one is willing to allow enough warmth and closeness to develop to give your relationship a foundation of trust. It will be hard for both of you to open yourself to the other and to sacrifice a bit of freedom. Maybe he has to criticize her constantly which causes her to back away. It would help you to discover what you have in common that you can build on. Conversations and even fights between you are sure to be lively
column2: but you should try to reach a consensus.

column1: 1786;SYNASTRIE_0000000002113858;His Jupiter in Opposition with her Neptune;The man will try to do everything he can to understand his partner
column2: because she fascinates him and holds a strong attraction for him. Still he probably won't get behind the mystery of her thoughts since her mind functions in a completely different way. Her reality doesn't have a lot in common with his
column3: and she places a lot of value on her dreams and visions. He tries to sort her emotional experiences into pigeon holes
column4: but won't be very successful. Sometimes he has the feeling that she has gotten him confused
column5: to the point where he can't keep up his outlook on life
column6: still that will happen much too often for it to be productive or exciting. She should take a serious look at his system of values
column7: while he should learn to respect her way of thinking and feeling. This will give the relationship a chance.

column1: 1787;SYNASTRIE_0000000002376002;His Jupiter in Opposition with her Pluto;In your partnership there will probably be a lot of fighting or undercurrents of resentment. Two contradictory attitudes on life will battle against each other. While the world is bright and interesting for him
column2: she sees more dark tones. She is very strong and has a will power which is so amazing that it scares him. He is looking for lightness and wants to live his life according to humanistic ideals
column3: while she is fighting with herself and may consider him superficial. Happiness and pain will come together here
column4: but it will be difficult for both of you to recognize that one will bring the other with it. If she continues to try to change him or even to control him
column5: she is going to lose him.

column1: 1788;SYNASTRIE_0000000000033090;His Jupiter in Square with her Sun;In the negative sense of this aspect one of you may feel overwhelmed by the other

column1: 1789;SYNASTRIE_0000000000295234;His Jupiter in Square with her Moon;"Probably you don't feel as secure with your partner as you would like. column1: 1790;SYNASTRIE_0000000000557378;His Jupiter in Square with her Mercury;You may often have problems because your healthy reason doesn't want to jam with your partner's view of the world. Maybe he is headstrong and won't give up trying to convince you of his truth

column3: because you will always be finding out things about each other which you can't understand.

column1: 1791;SYNASTRIE_0000000000819522;His Jupiter in Square with her Venus;You will have a tough time winning over your partner
column2: because he is terrified of losing his independence and is afraid that he will have to give up all his freedom in order to enjoy love and security. He may find that you lack intellectual flexibility and would like to hear you express more tolerance and a liberal view of the world in your conversations. The chances of living together in harmony could be increased if you would work on filling in some of the deficits in your education and were to pay more attention to his ideas.

column1: 1792;SYNASTRIE_0000000001081666;His Jupiter in Square with her Mars;Here you will do everything you can to capture this man
column2: although you hardly stands a chance of succeeding. The way he sees things will challenge you to use every ounce of your energy

column6: otherwise the relationship won't stand a chance.

column1: 1793;SYNASTRIE_0000000001343810;His Jupiter in Square with her Jupiter;This is a difficult aspect
column2: because not only do both of you have different outlooks on life but you also try to force them on each other. There will probably be heated discussions on questions of religion
column3: ethics and philosophy

column8: but each of you has to recognize that there isn't just one truth.

column1: 1794;SYNASTRIE_0000000001605954;His Jupiter in Square with her Saturn;Maybe your partner defends liberal

column1: 1797;SYNASTRIE_0000000002392386;His Jupiter in Square with her Pluto;Probably you are a lot less complicated than your partner and don't understand why anyone should torment themselves searching for insights the way she does. You would love to simply have fun together

column1: 1822;SYNASTRIE_0000000001048962;His Saturn in Conjunction with her Mars;"You have a good grip on your partner's activities and can coordinate them or direct them towards a sensible goal. Most likely you are more mature and more reasonable than your partner
column2: which can only help the relationship. She will have the feeling that she can rely on you; she is also willing to take your advice. That will give her a secure footing providing her with the freedom she needs to play around
column3: although it will also serve as foundation to build on. You two make a good team and if you are able to get caught up in your partner's enthusiasm and can manage to be flexible and spontaneous
column4: a stable and active relationship could be the result."

column1: 1823;SYNASTRIE_0000000001311106;His Saturn in Conjunction with her Jupiter;Anytime your partner wants to overstep boundaries
column2: you will prevent her
column3: which is good. This relationship will have a drive for expansion and enthusiasm for life which includes being reasonable and taking obligations seriously. This combination will keep you in balance. You should try not to restrict her too much
column4: because it could make her react defiantly. If you could accept some of her ideas wholeheartedly and without reservations
column5: it would make her very happy. In turn she should know how to appreciate being able to rely on you and also listen to you on occasion. This relationship will have good chances
column6: because it is light as well as serious.

column1: 1824;SYNASTRIE_0000000001573250;His Saturn in Conjunction with her Saturn;Both of you know what you want from a relationship and are willing to accept restrictions. Your values are about the same
column2: which could make the relationship stable. You would like to build something together
column3: and should be successful because each of you stands by the other
column4: whenever things get tough. You will have the feeling that are able to rely on each other and both of you take the other seriously. Because you are about the same age (although one of you might be 30 years older than the other) you may have similar experiences which will help you to understand each other better.

column1: 1825;SYNASTRIE_0000000001835394;His Saturn in Conjunction with her Uranus;With this aspect an awareness of tradition and belief in progress will be combined harmoniously. You will be able to change your partner's outlook on life and make him more optimistic. In addition you will motivate him to throw his outdated behavior overboard and adopt a way of thinking which is more in tune with today. You probably enrich his formerly dismal and gray world. He will gain enthusiasm and will be willing to risk growing and developing himself. In turn
column2: he can offer you stability. This is very important for somebody who changes as quickly as you do. He can also teach you to give your ideas form and structure
column3: making you more realistic and reliable. This will allow you to complement each other nicely.

column1: 1826;SYNASTRIE_0000000002097538;His Saturn in Conjunction with her Neptune;Your partner
column2: who usually stands with both feet on the ground
column3: could find himself confused by your views and your behavior
column4: although he will be basically fascinated by you and will do a lot to make sure that your ideas don't go unnoticed. Here two people have found each other
column5: who can put a lot into the relationship and can intuitively recognize what is going on in the other. You will show him his inner wealth and make sure that he gains access to his dreams. He will be busy with his fantasies
column6: which will make him softer and more emotional
column7: while he will give her the opportunity to direct her efforts to a realistic goal. You should have a lot of wonderful experiences
column8: making you more aware of how much you mean to each other.

column1: 1827;SYNASTRIE_0000000002359682;His Saturn in Conjunction with her Pluto;You can support your partner and help her to use her strengths constructively and to abide by the basic rules of society. She will become more reasonable through you
column2: because she has finally found a safe harbor. She will learn to take stock of her energy and will try not to expand her consciousness with all kinds of excesses. If she has fought against herself
column3: she will now appreciate the value of self-respect. In confrontations with her you will get to know your own strength
column4: because you will successfully resist her while holding on to your system of values
column5: even if you reevaluate them regularly.

column1: 1828;SYNASTRIE_0000000000016770;His Saturn in Opposition with her Sun;This aspect will make things complicated because a lot will depend on how the partner's relationship to her father has developed in the course of her life. If he determined how her life would be and still tries to be in control of her
column2: it will be very difficult for her to avoid seeing her father in her partner. He may even reflect some of the restrictive elements of her childhood. He is going to have to relax
column3: whereby she should support him. That could be the first step towards more self-confidence and personal integrity. Both of you should come to understand that you place restrictions on yourselves. Finding a creative way to transform this is Saturn's challenge with this aspect.

column1: 1829;SYNASTRIE_0000000000278914;His Saturn in Opposition with her Moon;This opposition will lend your partnership a bitter note. Both of you will be apt to fight battles which you have brought with you from your childhood. That can put both partners in danger of becoming unstable. Your partner will have the habit of ignoring your feelings and commanding you around. Maybe you don't feel that he understands you and his emotional frigidity may be frustrating. He also has high expectations and doesn't understand that you can't deal with that. If you could learn to rely on his affection
column2: that would be tremendous progress. He should really make more of an effort to be more open to your needs.

column1: 1830;SYNASTRIE_0000000000541058;His Saturn in Opposition with her Mercury;"Maybe your partner is restricting your intellectual freedom and can't accept your ideas because he wants enough security to maintain the status quo. He would like to dominate and tries to influence you. He may feel responsible for everything
column2: and doesn't give you a chance to become a responsible adult and make your own decisions. With enough good will it should be possible to find a way out of this mess; then the relationship could be stable."

column1: 1831;SYNASTRIE_0000000000803202;His Saturn in Opposition with her Venus;"Here your partner will do her best to make you feel guilty
column2: just because you may not live up to his expectations of responsibility in this relationship. Sometimes you will feel that you are weaker than he is; in addition his determination and coolness put you off. On the other hand
column3: he will often feel like he has to think and act for two. Before you can be really happy in this relationship
column4: you are both going to have to experience each other in order to find out how much mutual devotion you have and what you are willing to sacrifice."

column1: 1832;SYNASTRIE_0000000001065346;His Saturn in Opposition with her Mars;Your partner will feel that her drive is being restricted and won't be willing to accept your advice. You are probably more mature and more reasonable
column2: so that it would only make sense for her to listen to you. Sometimes she wishes that you were as enthusiastic as she is and could overcome your inhibitions about simply jumping up and doing something. Both of you have to realize that you would make a good team together. Your partner has the courage while you have the stamina and are serious enough to carry something out to its successful completion. Both of you should admit to your strengths and weaknesses
column3: if you want the relationship to last. Most importantly your partner will need plenty of freedom to learn from her own mistakes and should appreciate being able to rely on you.

column1: 1833;SYNASTRIE_0000000001327490;His Saturn in Opposition with her Jupiter;"Probably the woman has restricted her partner somewhat
column2: because he doesn't think as freely as she does. She needs a certain amount of independence
column3: tolerance and honesty while he prefers to hang on to traditional values out of fear of change. Here two adverse philosophies will collide. He is willing to take on responsibility for a life together and to offer his partner security and constancy
column4: but that isn't enough for her. Her world is simply larger than his; she is curious and wants new experiences
column5: while he doesn't want to go along. She may be unwilling to commit himself and may be hurting him. You should recognize that you would make a great team if you could recognize each other's qualities."

column1: 1834;SYNASTRIE_0000000001589634;His Saturn in Opposition with her Saturn;There could be a lot of problems in your partnership
column2: because each of you lives by different rules and shouldn't expect the same behavior from each other. It is as if each of you is headed in another direction. You are about 15 years older than your partner and may try to use the age difference to restrict the other. You will find that your partner won't accept that and has concrete ideas about life and therefore set goals for his life. If you want to stay together
column3: you need to overcome some hurdles
column4: first of all to respect that each of you has to make your decisions independently. That is the only way you are going to make it together.

column1: 1835;SYNASTRIE_0000000001851778;His Saturn in Opposition with her Uranus;Some of your most meaningful experiences will be together with your partner
column2: even if they aren't always painless. At first you will try to make your partner understand your outlook on life and not try to assume ownership of her
column3: although you won't get very far with that anyway. She will never give up her freedom and she looks for an interesting exchange in the partnership
column4: but not a safe harbor. That won't leave you unimpressed
column5: and once you have learned your lesson
column6: you hopefully will start to seriously consider her ideas. She could motivate you to make some necessary adjustments in your life
column7: although it will be difficult for you to throw your ingrained patterns of behavior overboard. She will recognize that continuity and stamina are useful qualities
column8: which can help her get ahead. If you walk your path together
column9: past and future will meet in your relationship.

column1: 1836;SYNASTRIE_0000000002113922;His Saturn in Opposition with her Neptune;Probably he feels that there is no chance of reaching her
column2: even if you invest every ounce of your energy. It may be that it is difficult for him to think clearly in her presence
column3: which is certainly due to her charm and the strong attraction. Unfortunately the two of you have very different ideas about your goals and values. He could try to take responsibility for her
column4: but should avoid it to save himself from disappointments later on. Maybe he thinks she is lost in her dreams and is incapable of making her way in the real world. But that may be deceiving. He should approach her with sensitivity and tenderness
column5: that will give the relationship a chance. She should recognize that his outlook on life is right for him and he will never be a knight in shining armor.

column1: 1837;SYNASTRIE_0000000002376066;His Saturn in Opposition with her Pluto;Here strong energies will collide
column2: because each of you is convinced that you should carry out your principles. You could very well convey support and confidence to your partner
column3: but that will only be successful if she is receptive to it. It probably bothers her that you are so established and fulfill every obligation. It may be too boring for her
column4: she is out for extreme experiences and wants to move on
column5: no matter what happens. She will ask a lot of questions which are unpleasant for you because they threaten to knock you off balance. You will find your relationship to be restless or even lively and you should watch out that you pull the emergency brake at the right moment
column6: which will probably be up to you. You can learn from each other
column7: but it won't be easy.

column1: 1838;SYNASTRIE_0000000000033154;His Saturn in Square with her Sun;This aspect will make things complicated because a lot will depend on how the partner's relationship to her father has developed in the course of her life. If he determined how her life would be and still tries to be in control of her
column2: it will be very difficult for her to avoid seeing her father in her partner. He may even reflect some of the restrictive elements of her childhood. He is going to have to relax
column3: whereby she should support him. That could be the first step towards more self-confidence and personal integrity. Both of you come to the realization that if you don't put some distance between you and your past
column4: you will only be caging yourselves in. Finding a creative way to transform this situation is Saturn's challenge of this aspect.

column1: 1839;SYNASTRIE_0000000000295298;His Saturn in Square with her Moon;This is a challenging aspect making it difficult for both of you to express your feelings openly and honestly. Your partner will have little understanding for your inner world and will try to dominate you. You will suffer under his emotional frigidity
column2: but won't be able to get away from him because he provides you with stability and security on a social level. Maybe he thinks that you are moody and too weak and has high expectations you can't fulfill. The external success is not as important to you as it is to him. Both of you may feel helpless because you want to clear things up. Take a look at the other aspects of this horoscope before you draw a final conclusion.

column1: 1840;SYNASTRIE_0000000000557442;His Saturn in Square with her Mercury;Most likely you feel being restricted by your partner because he can't accept your intellectual free will. He may subscribe to morals which you find outdated. His security is your oppression. Also he won't be receptive to your ideas because he primarily sees the risks and negative consequences of any endeavor. On the other hand
column2: he will have a hard time understanding how you feel because some things which you are convinced of don't seem to have any rational basis from his perspective. It can be difficult to resolve this problem
column3: but the only way to approach it is by talking openly with each other with a lot of sensitivity.

column1: 1841;SYNASTRIE_0000000000819586;His Saturn in Square with her Venus;This is a difficult aspect because your partner will have a tendency to dominate and to restrict you. He is willing to take on all the responsibility for you
column2: but expects to be respected for it. Even though you know that you can rely on him and appreciate it
column3: you are often dissatisfied with the situation. He will have a hard time letting you loosen him up
column4: even though it would give him more self-confidence. This is why this relationship is lacking life and spontaneity. What you really want is honest affection
column5: but what you end up getting is security. Your partner should be aware that you are no longer a child and are capable of taking on responsibility. Once this has been cleared up
column6: the relationship will probably be happier.

column1: 1842;SYNASTRIE_0000000001081730;His Saturn in Square with her Mars;If you can manage to meet each other half way
column2: you could learn a lot from each other. She will have a hard time following his advice
column3: because she is convinced that it would be in effect a submission to his will. Although a little guidance wouldn't do her any harm
column4: but would allow her to coordinate her strength and work for a sensible goal. Maybe he approaches her awkwardly when he wants to criticize her
column5: only provoking her to perform stunts which won't impress him anyway. She is brave
column6: but he has the maturity to make sensible decisions
column7: so that both of you could be successful
column8: if you would only accept each other.

column1: 1843;SYNASTRIE_0000000001343874;His Saturn in Square with her Jupiter;Maybe your partner defends liberal
column2: progressive ideas in order to gain your approval. In the relationship her drive for expansion and your hold on tradition will collide and cause friction. If you would just listen to each other
column3: you could learn a lot and complement one another. The problem is that neither of you wants to come down from your pedestal and hold your own truth for the only valid one. If the relationship is supposed to last
column4: your partner must learn to accept your limits and to make an effort to take responsibility for her behavior
column5: while it would do you good to let yourself enjoy the pleasant side of life and not always be so serious.

column1: 1844;SYNASTRIE_0000000001606018;His Saturn in Square with her Saturn;"Your paths haven't crossed accidentally. Here each of you will have principles
column2: which are not compatible with those of your partner. The problem is that neither of you is willing to deviate from your standpoint and may even try to convince the other. This creates challenge of this aspect; learning to tolerate and respect your partner's contradictory opinions. Each of you will make new experiences and you will learn a lot about how you can manage to get completely involved in the relationship. This includes the ability to compromise. Just don't make the mistake of restricting your partner or blocking her development."

column1: 1845;SYNASTRIE_0000000001868162;His Saturn in Square with her Uranus;"In your relationship two contradictory attitudes will collide with each other and challenge you to find a consensus. If you intend to stay together you have

to come to terms with your different values. She believes in the future and wants to initiate changes which will improve the situation. She needs a feeling of freedom and independence and is willing to neglect her friends for the sake of togetherness within the partnership. On the other hand
column2: he is convinced of obligations
column3: tradition and moral and may even make the mistake of restricting her. Old and new will meet
column4: and your task will be to recognize that our society needs roots as well as progress. It would be wonderful if you could find each other at this point."

column1: 1846;SYNASTRIE_0000000002130306;His Saturn in Square with her Neptune;There could be a lot of misunderstandings because you run the risk of talking over each other's heads. It is as if each of you were speaking a different language. Your partner talks about structure
column2: security and tradition while you tell of your dreams
column3: emotions and fantasies. Probably you could use someone to give you a sense of reality and self-discipline. Although your partner can usually find the right tone and will approach you with sensitivity
column4: it can put you off and leave you with the impression that he is emotionally cold and provincial. When you try to share your emotional world with him
column5: it scares him into thinking he has to place his principles at risk. You should see this as a challenge which both of you have to meet together.

column1: 1847;SYNASTRIE_0000000002392450;His Saturn in Square with her Pluto;This square could create some disappointments in your partnership. He would like to know where he stands with her
column2: but is unable to explain her passionate nature. She isn't in the market for security
column3: but wants to experience all kinds of things
column4: even if it causes her to suffer. Her fascination for destruction may shock him
column5: because he wants to slowly build up a foundation for life and doesn't have any problem conforming to society. Maybe he seems boring
column6: but is one step ahead of her
column7: because he stands behind everything he does. He should never allow himself to force his principles on her. Maybe she can bring him to make the necessary changes in his life. Both partners will need a lot of strength
column8: but can make things easier on themselves if they listen attentively to the other.

column1: 1848;SYNASTRIE_0000000000049538;His Saturn in Trine with her Sun;"Your partner will have the capacity to promote your personal development. He may be older than you
column2: enabling him to put all of his good intentions into practice. He can form your character and will be interested in doing it
column3: while you won't object to it.

column1: Basically
column2: this relationship will offer the potential to treat each other with understanding
column3: through which you both learn to see your existence together in a larger context. This insight will transform a certain portion of your potential for conflict (only very few relationships can avoid this) into shared creative activities. This may invigorate both of you and will bring you a step closer to reaching a state of happiness."

column1: 1849;SYNASTRIE_0000000000311682;His Saturn in Trine with her Moon;Here it will come to a union in which it will be easy for you to avoid restricting your partner emotionally. Even if you should claim  ownership of each other
column2: it won't be difficult for you to find an appropriate way to check this tendency. It will be important to the woman to devote herself to the independent development of her personality
column3: while the man makes sure the exchange in this relationship is based on equality. He will hardly be interested in oppressing her and ending up with a woman at his side who follows him unconditionally.

column1: 1850;SYNASTRIE_0000000000573826;His Saturn in Trine with her Mercury;He is reasonable enough and has the stamina to direct her ideas into channels which promise to be successful. She feels secure with him because he adds a feeling of stability to her life enabling her to work intellectually. Maybe she will encourage his world of quiet contemplation a little so that he can develop a more tolerant attitude in some areas. With this aspect the relationship will hardly reach hasty conclusions.
1851;SYNASTRIE_0000000000835970;His Saturn in Trine with her Venus;"You are very happy to have a partner you can rely on
column2: when it comes to making rational decisions. He will have no problem getting involved with you and respecting your emotions
column3: because the affection you give him will replenish his strength. With him at your side
column4: you can be honest about your emotions and even let yourself be vulnerable. This will enrich his life with both joy and tranquility. You will be able to lead a stable and reliable relationship; unless other factors in your horoscopes tell a different story."

column1: 1852;SYNASTRIE_0000000001098114;His Saturn in Trine with her Mars;You have certain expectations on a partnership
column2: and your partner will have no problems fulfilling them with her level of energy. She knows that she can rely on you and that you will make sure that the relationship is stable. Whenever she starts to worry about tomorrow
column3: you create a calm atmosphere. You will influence her
column4: but she will never let you reprimand or oppress her. The way you contemplate combined with your partner's drive to get out and do things will enable the two of you to build a firm foundation. She will initiate changes in your life
column5: which will make you very happy and may let her open herself even more. You should make a good team.

column1: 1853;SYNASTRIE_0000000001360258;His Saturn in Trine with her Jupiter;You will give your partner's drive to experience adventures form
column2: which will provide the stable foundation she needs to unfold her ideas. Because your thinking is founded on realism
column3: you will have to make sure that she always stays with the facts and that she puts her ideas into practice in a realistic manner. In this way you will keep your mind healthy and rational which will counteract her expansive character. Your relationship is characterized by a basic positive attitude
column4: because you get along well. The mutual respect you have for each other will give your relationship a special flavor.

column1: 1854;SYNASTRIE_0000000001622402;His Saturn in Trine with her Saturn;The two of you have similar ideas about relationships and don't intend to play with your partner's feelings. You can put your relationship on a stable foundation
column2: by looking for a common goal
column3: because you will be able to agree on questions of responsibility and obligations. Each of you will expect no more from the other than what you are able to give
column4: which is the best pre-requisite for a long lasting relationship. You have respect for each other and will hopefully want to maintain it.

column1: 1855;SYNASTRIE_0000000001884546;His Saturn in Trine with her Uranus;You can be a great help to your partner when it comes to choosing a path for her life. Instead of trying to convince her of your own attitudes
column2: you will respect and complement each other. You will appreciate her unique and imaginative nature. Especially when you start to take everything too serious. She will be like a refreshing breeze
column3: who will relieve tension and bring about change. She will feel secure enough to rely on you and knows how important it is to stick together even when differences of opinion crop up. You will help her to see that life sometimes brings unpleasant obligations with it
column4: which have to be fulfilled. Both of you may have problems with this.

column1: 1856;SYNASTRIE_0000000002146690;His Saturn in Trine with her Neptune;Whenever your partner is about to lose her grip on reality
column2: you can bring her back down to Earth. You can also be very sensitive
column3: so that waking up won't be painful for her. The two of you won't always have the same convictions
column4: but will respect each other's differences
column5: which will allow each of you to profit from your partner's strengths. You will appreciate the way she expresses her creativity and will do everything to support her. Also you will find her very attractive
column6: which is one more reason to accept her as she is. She can learn from you that there are basic rules in society
column7: everyone should follow
column8: and to take responsibility for herself.

column1: 1857;SYNASTRIE_0000000002408834;His Saturn in Trine with her Pluto;This is a very beautiful aspect
column2: which will bring stability and further development into the relationship. He is probably the quiet pole you can always return to whenever you are completely shaken up. She will be apt to make everything hard on herself and will want to experience things which won't always be in her best interest. Through him she will learn to budget her energy and to use it for constructive purposes. If she should ever be completely distraught
column3: she can be sure that he will be there for her. In return
column4: she will bring him to deep insights about his role in the universe. He will learn to keep up with the passing of time and not to be too compulsively tied to old structures. This will allow your partnership to grow.

column1: 1868;SYNASTRIE_0000000000000450;His Uranus in Conjunction with her Sun;"Two things which are decisive for this aspect are your expectations of relationships and the flexibility of your partner. If you want to stay together you are going to have to learn to deal with unpredictable behavior. You will have to find out what kind of surprises your partner has in store for you. If your partner is constantly pulling things out of his sleeve which add loving touches to the relationship
column2: or do you have to run to the bank to cover the bad checks he has written? It doesn't have to get quite so extreme
column3: but this illustrates the range of experiences you may encounter. If something goes against your grain
column4: you should try to get your way and not put up with anything. Try to greet this potential for surprises with humor as well as you can; your capacity for a sense of humor will be indicated by the other harmonious aspects manifesting themselves in this partnership horoscope. column1: 2009;TRANSIT_0000000000164166;Transiting Jupiter in your eleventh house;"In this period friends will become more important to you as you discover a feeling of camaraderie. column2: as you have found

column1: 2010;TRANSIT_0000000000180550;Transiting Jupiter in your twelfth house;"This transit will allow for introspection. If you find your insides tied up in ""knots""

Now you should consider everything you have accomplished in the last few years and take a look at everything you have left unfinished. Although you have an increasing tendency to be too critical of yourself
column3: just dont make a habit of it or let it interfere with your contact with the outside world. Some self criticism is alright

column3: the experiences will teach you how to behave cooperatively within a group as long as it lies beyond your professional interests.

column1: If you are successful

column1: All in all

column1: 2013;TRANSIT_0000000000147846;Transiting Saturn in your tenth house;"In the tenth house Saturn feels at home and it is also associated with the sign of Capricorn. column1: 2014;TRANSIT_0000000000131462;Transiting Saturn in your ninth house;During this transit an outlook on life will be created in which you will be able to live in harmony with your environment. column3: this will lead you to greater insights and bring you into harmony with your community. A long trip would do you a lot of good
column4: but Saturn isnt necessarily responsible for taking the initiative.

column1: 2015;TRANSIT_0000000000115078;Transiting Saturn in your eighth house;"In this time you should come to understand that it is better to live independently of other people and their resources. column2: which could take a drastic turn. You wont be able to get out of taking a look at the unpleasant side of your personality
column3: which will also put you under pressure to take some risks. Additionally
column4: you will probably find out more about your own personal needs and your sexuality."

column1: 2016;TRANSIT_0000000000098694;Transiting Saturn in your seventh house;"A fourteen year old phase in which Saturn has made sure that your personality experienced fundamental changes because you had to get to know yourself and think about your conduct

Possibly you will have to overcome inhibitions in order to find happiness with a partner or to get to know people. It isnt necessary to end your relationship
column4: friends can help you to gain insights which will bring your conduct to new depths."

column1: 2017;TRANSIT_0000000000082310;Transiting Saturn in your sixth house;In this phase it is important to go about your professional activities responsibly and also to carefully observe your bodys reaction to your various endeavors. In the worst case

column3: but Saturn has more to do with the consequences of poor behavior than any of the other planets. Beware of further signs of danger. This period of time
column4: which will last from two to three years
column5: will serve to improve the quality of your work
column6: without making it perfect. Instead of placing unrealistic expectations on yourself
column7: try to find the golden mean between your capabilities and your boss exaggerated demands. After this transit has passed
column8: you should have gotten to know your true capacities a little better. Insights into this area will automatically reduce the risk of disease.

column1: 2018;TRANSIT_0000000000065926;Transiting Saturn in your fifth house;At this time the conceited and more complex sides of your personality will make sure that you dont get caught up in your own ego and lose touch with reality. Traditionally the fifth house stands for all forms of recreation
column2: although Saturns influence may somewhat change them. The fifth house emphasizes everything pertaining to children. If you have children
column3: they may cause you problems during this phase
column4: maybe in the form of a generation conflict. Prepare yourself to do without some of the pleasant things you are used to and come to terms with yourself. This will lead you to an appropriate form of self expression and enable you to devote yourself to creative expression for extended periods of time.

column1: 2019;TRANSIT_0000000000049542;Transiting Saturn in your fourth house;"This transit concerns itself with inner stability which should be present at home and can be restructured during this time
column2: if it is necessary. If you have neglected to initiate changes when they were necessary
column3: you may be startled by Saturns drive to get things cleaned up. If you get along with your family and dont run away from conflicts
column4: you shouldnt have any problems. Unfortunately
column5: people tend to deceive themselves in this respect and then run into conflicts completely unprepared. This phase favors constructive new beginnings which will put you in harmony with your life and help you find an honest expression. If you arent in need of it
column6: you will be in a position to take your obligations at home and within the family more seriously and give others a feeling of security.

column1: This transit may cause problems with your parents or maybe they have a problem
column2: which has been waiting to be taken care of. Often parents of advanced age are brittle and are in need of care. This time quality could mark the beginning of such an obligation."

column1: 2020;TRANSIT_0000000000033158;Transiting Saturn in your third house;In this two to three year long period

column3: especially by relatives
column4: siblings and others. If there are communication problems
column5: they will be cleared up. Maybe changes are due in this area and you will realize that it is high time to listen more carefully to what other people want to say to you. This could scare you into keeping quiet in groups
column6: and thus giving the impression of having an introverted personality. All things considered
column7: it could be a productive time
column8: whereby it could be to your advantage to prick your ears and give in to positive changes
