column10: as are all lessons in which Saturn plays a role. The light at the end of the tunnel will come when you have learned to deal responsibly with the information you have received and when you have learned when its better to keep your mouth closed. Once you have understood this
column11: you will be able to concentrate on learning and filter the most important elements out of the mass of impressions.

column1: 2021;TRANSIT_0000000000016774;Transiting Saturn in your second house;In traditional Astrology this is a time for material losses. But that isnt something you should simply accept. There will be losses in this area only if your outlook on life places your own personal advantages above everything else. This is a longer period in which your experiences will cause you to reconsider your system of values. Even if you have been worrying about your future financial situation
column2: it would be better if you would start thinking about human values. If you concentrate on monetary values
column3: you may lose sight of the important things and then find yourself in financial difficulties. It would be best to organize your bookkeeping so that you can take time for the more important things in life.

column1: 2022;TRANSIT_0000000000000390;Transiting Saturn in your first house;"This period of time is clearly intended as a preparation for a new beginning. Saturn has left the twelfth house and passed the Ascendant. The beginning of the first house will probably reveal deficits in yourself. If you want to use this phase constructively
column2: you should think about whether you are able to keep up with your expectations. Some people make their own lives hell for no real reason. A great deal of people who live on this planet arent perfect. It is important to understand this and to be willing to make compromises. The best way to go about it is to follow the principle in the film ""Dead Poets Society""; ""Carpe diem""  ""make use of the day"". Then you will learn that it is better to take on challenges than to passively sit around and wait for better times."

column1: 2023;TRANSIT_0000000000000454;Transiting Uranus in your first house;"Uranus will remain in this house for about seven years. As it enters the first house

column1: 2024;TRANSIT_0000000000016838;Transiting Uranus in your second house;"The second house concerns your relationship to material things
column2: that means to everything you consider valuable and necessary in order to secure your existence. In this area sudden changes could introduce you to a new understanding. If you manage to react with flexibility which enables you to integrate these changes

column4: surprises and problems
column5: it could be that you are stuck in conventional ways of thinking and are feeling an exaggerated need for security which will only hinder your development. Share your resources if you want to be able to count on the help of others
column6: should you ever run into bad times. If you have the tendency to develop a dependency on other people or on status symbols
column7: Uranus will teach you how to become detached and to feel good about it."

column1: 2025;TRANSIT_0000000000033222;Transiting Uranus in your third house;"This phase may initiate changes in your concept of communication. column1: 2026;TRANSIT_0000000000049606;Transiting Uranus in your fourth house;In this period

column5: at first

column1: 2027;TRANSIT_0000000000065990;Transiting Uranus in your fifth house;"With Uranus in the fifth house

column1: 2028;TRANSIT_0000000000082374;Transiting Uranus in your sixth house;This transit is about restructuring your professional situation. If you have been dissatisfied with the work you do to earn a living

column5: such that your boss cant do without you

column1: 2029;TRANSIT_0000000000098758;Transiting Uranus in your seventh house;"Uranus will uncover all the latent dissatisfaction in relationships during its transit through the seventh house. But not only sexual relationships should be carefully considered but also all other human relationships
column2: like business partnerships.

column1: As you love experimenting and are open for everything
column2: the only thing you cant tolerate is boredom. You should become conscious of the fact that deep relationships need time and that you shouldnt be so impatient. It is also important to be careful because you could come to regret spontaneous decisions which cant be turned back"

column1: 2030;TRANSIT_0000000000115142;Transiting Uranus in your eighth house;"In the sense of classical Astrology the eighth house stands for the communal resources shared with your partner. Uranus will remain here about seven years and initiate great changes in the above mentioned area
column2: as far as changes are necessary. If you should have made yourself dependent on somebody or something you will notice it with time. Still with Uranus in the game it wont be a subtle process
column3: but rather in a sudden explosive manner
column4: which will also provoke questions of fate. Usually death is associated with this house
column5: but people have gotten away from the idea that it can only refer to an absolute physical death. It may also refer to structures within a persons life which are no longer necessary and when they are changed
column6: it can come to a ""death"" of the old which makes room for something new to grow."

column1: 2031;TRANSIT_0000000000131526;Transiting Uranus in your ninth house;"This house concerns the development of ones own life philosophy. It is important to train yourself to think flexibly because Uranus will alter your view of the world. The sooner you are able to integrate the new insights into your life
column2: the easier it will be to draw the right consequences. Uranus will always fight against stagnant thinking
column3: whether you want it to or not
column4: and will always win

column1: During this period
column2: you could suddenly move to another place
column3: maybe even to a foreign country. Spontaneous or long trips could determine your life. If you have always wanted to learn more about Astrology and its related fields then you should go ahead and begin studying on your own. The intellectual stimulation which you receive during this transit is certain to receive adequate reflection."

column1: 2032;TRANSIT_0000000000147910;Transiting Uranus in your tenth house;Uranus will certainly create a lot of commotion in this house
column2: which is devoted to finding your position. As you enjoy experimenting with your public influence
column3: you worry about your goals. Possibly you have wanted to change your profession for a long time

column1: 2033;TRANSIT_0000000000164294;Transiting Uranus in your eleventh house;"Within the next seven years your friends as well as your preferred activities could be completely transformed. In the eleventh house

column3: Uranus is at home too. This house is linked to the future but also to your ideals and dreams. Maybe a vision of your future is developing at this moment and is showing you the possibility of leading a life with a completely different orientation. If you feel that these changes would do you good
column4: then let them become more concrete. Allow yourself to react to other ""revolutionary"" tendencies with more flexibility. Basically
column5: its all about getting rid of out-dated behavior. People who come into your life will cause you to try out new behavior. With Uranus in its own house it shouldnt be difficult for you to feel up to the challenges of this process."

column1: 2034;TRANSIT_0000000000180678;Transiting Uranus in your twelfth house;Uranus will be in the house of Aquarius for approximately seven years before it crosses the Ascendant and reenters the first house where it will help to find a means for expression for the inside of a person. The twelfth house is associated with any kind of institution
column2: and your relationship to diverse institutions could be overthrown. You may come into contact with prison
column3: even if you dont end up there yourself
column4: someone close to you may. Things could be restructured so subtly that no one even notices. There will be more introspection during this phase which will include contemplation about your role in the universe
column5: although you could approach this with little patience and lack of stability. For this reason you shouldnt take on too much and try to stay relaxed and persevere.

column1: 2035;TRANSIT_0000000000180742;Transiting Neptune in your twelfth house;During this period of your development Neptune will travel through its own house
column2: because the twelfth house is the house of Pisces and Neptune. Even if this phase is one of intense introspection that doesnt mean that you will withdraw from daily life for 14 to 18 years. This phase is more about incorporating your insights into everyday life. If you feel inclined to delve into the study of alternative sciences
column3: this is a good opportunity to begin. You find yourself in search of the deeper meaning of existence and its connection to universality. Because Neptune and the sign of Pisces also stand for martyrdom and self pity
column4: you should be careful about your leaning to think you have to put these qualities on public display. All in all the insights resulting from this transit should serve to sharpen your intuition and allow you to rely on your inner voice.

column1: 2036;TRANSIT_0000000000164358;Transiting Neptune in your eleventh house;In the classical sense the eleventh house concerns your conduct and your position within various groups outside your professional activities. In an extended sense it will offer a description of the individual ideals concerning living together in a larger family which will describe the people involved as well as their future plans together. This phase is a good time to join a group which deals with spiritual and esoterical matters. As always when Neptune is in the game
column2: it is important to keep a clear head and not to drift off in euphoric illusions. Disappointments are nearly unavoidable. This house position can indicate that you have been disillusioned by your friends or vice versa. If you always try to express yourself clearly and honestly these problems can be avoided.

column1: 2037;TRANSIT_0000000000000004;The meaning of the transiting Sun;The Sun moves approximately one degree every day. So it travels through all 12 houses in your chart in a year and emphasizes all the important areas of life one after another. It tells you the areas to which you should devote your attention
column2: tells you about sources from which you can draw energy and tells you about your general concerns. The aspects between the Sun and the planets of your birth chart (especially with the Sun itself) tell us about our state of health. As the representative for your life energy
column3: personality
column4: your will power and self expression
column5: the transit aspects of the Sun also describe your current mental strength.

column1: 2038;TRANSIT_0000000000000006;The transiting Sun in your first house;When the Sun is in the first house it has just passed the Ascendant. The first house is associated with the self so that you can count on receiving new energies
column2: which you can probably use. Your own affairs should be very important to you at this time and maybe you will also find answers which you have been looking for a long time. You should have enough strength and energy to present yourself in a positive light and to secure your position in life. Still you should try to maintain objectivity when dealing with others because at this point in time you have a tendency to overemphasize your own problems. On the other hand
column3: this could be a time for you to develop your creativity and maybe even make changes to your self image.

column1: 2039;TRANSIT_0000000000003268;Prolog;"We welcome you to the interpretation of your transit chart. Before we go into the specifics of your individual constellations
column2: we would like to begin with a brief introduction.

column1: A transit happens when the planets in their current positions form aspects to the planets in your birth chart. We also interpret current planetary positions in your natal chart houses. The multitude of possible combinations makes of a constant formation of transits
column2: this can be observed in everybodys chart. The transits of slow orbiting planets give the aspects a generational characteristic
column3: because entire age groups are equally effected. The house position of these slow moving transit planets are of special importance and it might be useful to consider their aspects in the natal chart.

column1: How can the interpretations help?
In any case
column2: they shouldnt bring anyone to passively accept the course of events
column3: convinced that they are at the mercy of their fate. We hope that we were able to make clear especially for the more challenging transits
column4: that people have a choice and must accept full responsibility for the circumstances of their lives. Also the interpretations should not serve to prevent people from leaving their house without first making sure that ""the stars are in a favorable position"".

column1: In our opinion it is especially productive to keep an eye on the transits of the slow moving planets because they develop over longer periods of time and usually describe important phases of your life. Their interpretations will therefore be presented in more detail. Does a planet go retrograde
column2: you will encounter the same information three times: when the first aspect forms you will experience something new
column3: it will then be intensified on the trip back and then on the next pass can be put to practical use.

column1: It may be irritating when two or more contradictory interpretations are equally valid for the same transit. This becomes as problematic as the interpretation of the natal chart
column2: due to the computers inherent inability to instill sensitivity into the interpretations. Additionally
column3: everyone experiences different needs and ambitions at the same time occasionally.

column1: We would be pleased if you would find reading this interpretation helpful."

2040;TRANSIT_0000000000000132;The meaning of the transiting Mercury;"Mercury in the houses shows which areas of life you have been learning about and which topics could inspire you even to the point of leading you to do research in these fields. Mercurys transit aspects can help you to recognize the way you confront people around you
column2: how you approach problems and how you structure communicative contact to other people
column3: whereby in classical Astrology your relationships to your neighbors and siblings are of special importance.

column1: If Mercury is in transit with several planets
column2: it will cause excitement and confusion
column3: will challenge your intellect but not destabilize your life. Also shorter trips
column4: which may be for business
column5: are ruled by Mercury."

column1: 2041;TRANSIT_0000000000000196;The meaning of the transiting Venus;"A transiting Venus travels through your chart in about a year filling the affairs of each house with a dose of serenity
column2: creativity and sociability. The effected areas should be especially pleasant at that time
column3: even if Venus can cause you to be passive and sluggish at times.

column1: Primarily this planet stands naturally for love and harmony. The transit aspects tell us about the structure of the relationships
column2: if friendships are satisfactory for everyone and about the state of your partnership. The effect should generally be positive
column3: even if Venus in transit is traveling so fast that it only lasts a few days."

column1: 2042;TRANSIT_0000000000000260;The meaning of the transiting Mars;"In contrast to the previously mentioned planets
column2: which all travel quickly
column3: Mars needs a little more time to move through a house. On the average it takes two or three months; when Mars is retrograde it may take twice as long.

column1: When Mars is transiting a house it tells in which area you should invest your energy and from where you receive your motivation. Mars gives the energy to live and to achieve. Also sexuality
column2: aggression and achievement are all associated with Mars. Its transits describe the way you go about things; hard and inconsiderate or ""only"" determined and energetic. A weak Mars can make it difficult for you to assert yourself and defend your interests
column3: because you lack faith in your own powers. Mars determines the ""Ego"" of a person
column4: also setting egotistical goals
column5: the root of all evil in our world. Still this energy is necessary to assert yourself and to develop further."

column1: 2043;TRANSIT_0000000000000324;The meaning of the transiting Jupiter;"Jupiter remains in each house for up to two years
column2: depending on its size. Altogether one trip through the entire chart takes about 12 years.

column1: Maybe you can experience positive developments in the effected houses
column2: because Jupiter was always considered the great patron
column3: protector and the messenger of good luck. The principle of expansion as well as striving for enhancement in every form are associated with Jupiter. However when it comes to expansion it can quickly become excessive which may be noticeable when it comes in the form of a weight gain. Generally its benevolent effects can lead to sluggishness.

column1: The aspects of Jupiter in transit describe how your outlook on life can be influenced and how you see your role in the universe during this phase
column2: because this planet also stands for the intellectual confrontation with your surroundings on a higher level."

column1: 2044;TRANSIT_0000000000000388;The meaning of the transiting Saturn;"Saturn is seen as the ""Evildoer"" in classical Astrology. A more modern view is that it represents a challenge which presents you with an opportunity to develop. Its house position tells you in which area of life difficulties are likely to develop
column2: where your weaknesses are
column3: although it can also bring stability to a situation. In this sense Saturn presents you with the bill for your past behavior
column4: whereby the intensity of the influence of the difficult transit depends on you. Usually it only makes you aware of limitations which you can accept.

column1: Saturns entire cycle through the chart takes about 28-30 years and culminates in the so-called ""Saturn-Return""
column2: the phase in which Saturn reaches its natal chart position. This allows it to remain in each house for two or three years and in this time it is also retrograde. That means
column3: if it enters an aspect to another planet within a house
column4: it will be repeated to time more: The first encounter will call the problems to your attention
column5: the return will intensify the problem and by the third meeting you should have enough strength and maturity to work on a constructive solution and end the conflict.

column1: Finally
column2: it should be emphasized once again that Saturnine experiences can be painful
column3: but must not necessarily be
column4: if you live in harmony with yourself and your environment."

column1: 2045;TRANSIT_0000000000000452;The meaning of the transiting Uranus;"The transit of Uranus through your chart makes it possible for you to constantly get to know new aspects of your personality. That may be connected to some of the surprises

You may be experiencing boredom because you have a need to show your other side and to develop your individuality. The drive for independence can become so strong that you surprise yourself and everyone else with unusual actions.

column1: Any discussion of Uranus in transit at this time must mention that it has been in a conjunction with Neptune for some time and that the effects of these two planets are often difficult to combine. This conjunction has been located in the sign of Capricorn for several years
column2: which is associated with political connotations. During this period of time political structures were dissolved (Neptune) and that happened in fall of East Germany rather suddenly (Uranus). These days Uranus moved on into the sign of Aquarius.

column1: The harmonious transits of Uranus will motivate you to turn your attention to the future and to do your best to live in a society characterized by liberty and solidarity."
2046;TRANSIT_0000000000000516;The meaning of the transiting Neptune;"The transits of Neptune are not easy to see through. There are many levels on which it can manifest itself
column2: whereby it remains dependent on the state of consciousness of the individual person. Challenging transits can cause unstable people to feel helpless and insecure
column3: which may lead some to seek help in drugs or in institutions. The positive effects show true sympathy as well as a general sensitivity for everything happening around you. It is also important to be aware that Neptune also creates illusions. Until 1997 Neptune was in Capricorn
column4: where it has been forming a conjunction with Uranus for years. Now it moved on to Aquarius; many people associate its entry into Aquarius with the beginning of the age of Aquarius.

column1: Its transit through a house will take 14-18 years which should not mean that it exercises uninterrupted influence and that you will be unable to realistically perceive the effected area. Although you will probably notice that with the transition into the next house
column2: you will suddenly be able to judge the events of the previous house more objectively or emotions which had no justification will simply dissolve."

column1: 2047;TRANSIT_0000000000000580;The meaning of the transiting Pluto;"Pluto is a planet of violent regeneration. It rules Scorpio
column2: where it has been resting for several years. In 1997 Pluto moved on to Sagittarius. As the most distant planet known to man
column3: it remains in a house for up to 25 years. Due to this time frame
column4: its transit aspects are of particular interest. During the life of an average person
column5: Pluto will travel through three or four houses
column6: this might convey in which areas of life you will make the most extreme experiences.

column1: In the mythology of India
column2: Pluto corresponds to the goddess Shiva
column3: capable of destroying everything in order to rebuild. Pluto brings death but also life. This does not necessarily refer to the physical death
column4: but usually means philosophies of life and forms of conduct which are simply no longer useful and are ready to ""die"". In its transit through the houses
column5: Pluto will create violent changes. As a demonstration of its effects remember that Pluto was discovered in 1930. At this time the first atoms were being split
column6: this led to the catastrophes of Hiroshima and Nagasaki
column7: which marked the end of the second world war.

column1: Generally Pluto transits should motivate you to rethink your conduct and eventually make changes before you are forced to."
2048;TRANSIT_0000000000016390;The transiting Sun in your second house;"Currently your primary concern is improving your income

2049;TRANSIT_0000000000032774;The transiting Sun in your third house;The third house stands for communication both generally and within your closest relationships. The Sun in transit emphasizes the everyday relationship to neighbors

column1: 2052;TRANSIT_0000000000081926;The transiting Sun in your sixth house;"According to humanistic astrology the sixth house is concerned with the challenge of ""purity"". column1: 2053;TRANSIT_0000000000098310;The transiting Sun in your seventh house;"This house concerns itself with the challenge of communal and social mutuality. During this transit your relationships will take center stage

column1: 2054;TRANSIT_0000000000114694;The transiting Sun in your eighth house;"The eighth house is associated with Scorpio. In this phase you will get deeper in to your psyche and your spiritual life. Even if your daily obligations keep you from taking time for your self

column1: 2056;TRANSIT_0000000000147462;The transiting Sun in your tenth house;In the tenth house the topic is the challenge to define your position in life. column1: 2057;TRANSIT_0000000000163846;The transiting Sun in your eleventh house;"The eleventh house is related to everything beyond the career and home life which is important to you. 2058;TRANSIT_0000000000180230;The transiting Sun in your twelfth house;"The twelfth house is the home of Pisces and the planet Neptune. Use your energy to see your inner being and make behavior which was previously subconscious transparent. Even if this seems vague and impractical

column1: 2059;TRANSIT_0000000000180358;Transiting Mercury in your twelfth house;"This is the time when Mercury finishes its transit through the houses and your concentration turns inward. column1: 2061;TRANSIT_0000000000016518;Transiting Mercury in your second house;"Mercury in the house of values and possessions tells you that you are concerned about your income and security. Financial affairs should be integrated into this phase

column5: you should be given enough energy to tackle the tasks awaiting you.

column1: 2066;TRANSIT_0000000000098438;Transiting Mercury in your seventh house;In this period you may find yourself in a stimulating intellectual exchange with your partner

column1: 2067;TRANSIT_0000000000114822;Transiting Mercury in your eighth house;"This transit should enable you to gain insight into the depths of your psyche. 2068;TRANSIT_0000000000131206;Transiting Mercury in your ninth house;"The ninth house is Jupiters home but Mercury feels at home here. column1: 2082;TRANSIT_0000000000164038;Transiting Venus in your eleventh house;You are looking for fun and relaxation in activities

column1: 2084;TRANSIT_0000000000164102;Transiting Mars in your eleventh house;"In this phase it will be important to intensify all your contacts outside your professional interests. The drive you put into planning recreational activities could do a lot for your friends

2087;TRANSIT_0000000000115206;Transiting Neptune in your eighth house;"In this time you try to sound out your innermost being
column2: but you could be deceiving yourself. You want to track down the secrets of life and recognize your place in the universe. Because you are sensitive to hidden subconscious realms you could devote yourself to ""esoteric"" studies. In any case it will involve a longer developmental phase while you collect experiences and hopefully will see more clearly in the end. Slowly but surely old
column3: tired out structures will die out making room for a new order in your life.

column1: It would be best if you were only to acquire things which you can really afford. Dont get overconfident
column2: but calculate carefully. Otherwise you could misjudge a financial transaction and end up with less than you invested."

column1: 2088;TRANSIT_0000000000098822;Transiting Neptune in your seventh house;"This transit will have brought some clarity into your relationships. You will learn to see others
column2: especially your lover
column3: not just through rose colored glasses but complete
column4: with all the weaknesses. You will probably make some painful experiences on your way there or you will be frequently disappointed
column5: still this will serve your understanding of human nature
column6: so that you will be able to better rely on your judgment. It is important to speak open and honestly
column7: you should avoid keeping secrets.

column1: Perhaps it is also a time to come into contact with drug addicts or criminals. Or maybe you or your partner will be seen in the totally wrong light and will have to constantly deal with misunderstandings. In any case you should internalize something about human interaction during this long phase. Probably you can sense intuitively which contacts do you good and which people it would be better to stay away from."
2089;TRANSIT_0000000000082438;Transiting Neptune in your sixth house;"In traditional Astrology the sixth house emphasizes two areas
column2: work and health. In this phase
column3: lasting quite some time
column4: you will be able to find out what is good for you and what isnt. Ideally
column5: at the end of this transit you will have worked out a nutritional approach which will serve for the rest of your life. Neptune is also lord of ""reality warping"" substances
column6: or drugs. It would be useful to find out to what extent frustrations drive you to an intoxicated escape from reality and which substances take you there. Now dont panic
column7: this doesnt necessarily imply a dangerous drug addiction
column8: it concerns nothing more than your behavior when you are disappointed. Concerning your livelihood
column9: you will make best use of this transit if you choose a profession devoted to the general well being."

column1: 2090;TRANSIT_0000000000066054;Transiting Neptune in your fifth house;In this phase you will be on the lookout for spiritual and romantic lovers
column2: with whose help you will try to express your own individuality. Although relationships begun under this influence could have a shadowy aspect about them. Possibly you excessively idealize your partner such that a closer look would burst the bubbles you let grow so big and beautiful. If your heart is in it and you can defend your behavior
column3: at least to yourself
column4: you will easily be able to get through all the dangers of this transit. Seen positively this Neptune position should initialize a development which ends in finding adequate expression for your creative capacities
column5: which you werent even aware you had.

column1: 2091;TRANSIT_0000000000049670;Transiting Neptune in your fourthh house;"When Neptune is in the fourth house it will spend many years working on stability at home. Neptune has some ideas about how such a home might look. But you should watch out that your plans concerning your family and home arent too idealistic; a shot of reality is part of the deal. This is a slow process which will eventually allow you to see clearly
column2: which you will need in order to take charge of your life from a secure foundation. On another level the fourth house emphasizes your relationship to your parents. Probably you will be able to define your bond to them more clearly than you could before."

column1: 2092;TRANSIT_0000000000033286;Transiting Neptune in your third house;"This transit initiates a phase of development in your communicative behavior. Clarity by overcoming doubt could be your motto. For an example look at the first 14-18 years of life during which a person develops her self image. It grows primarily out of contact to brothers and sisters
column2: which are also a topic of the third house.

column1: On another level
column2: thought itself is transformed. It could possibly do you good to research the ""esoteric"" side of life in order to come to grasp that each individual person represents nothing more than one minuscule unit within the context of the infinite universe. Once you have understood this you can create a secure foundation
column3: free of illusions
column4: in the following transit through the fourth house."

column1: 2093;TRANSIT_0000000000016902;Transiting Neptune in your second house;In this phase Neptune will bring you to examine your attitude towards material possessions. What kind of a relationship do you have to your property? Are you hung up on dreams
column2: do you give in to illusions? This may involve dubious investments which promise more than they can deliver. If you spend the whole week planning how you are going to spend your lottery winnings and then suffer disappointment when the winner is announced
column3: that is the kind of behavior we are talking about. The second house also stands for a persons system of values and Neptune will bring you experiences which will guide you away from doubt and towards certainty. Neptune is no evil force
column4: but relishes temptation.

column1: 2094;TRANSIT_0000000000000518;Transiting Neptune in your first house;Neptune in the first house will cause many changes in your external and internal personality which will be difficult to figure out. In this period you will get to know yourself better. Thereby many facets of your personality will be brought to the surface
column2: which Neptune will try to use to further your development. If Neptune didnt have such a strong predisposition to dreams and illusions
column3: this process could be brought about quickly and painlessly. In other words the image you have of yourself does not necessarily conform to reality so that you will be constantly replacing it with another until you have learned to recognize and accept yourself together with your needs. On the other hand
column4: your sense of perception often proves itself to be very useful.

column1: 2095;TRANSIT_0000000000000582;Transiting Pluto in your first house;In this phase of development you have the chance to bring about changes deep within yourself. This procedure will be rather subtle but can lead to outbreaks of energies especially if Pluto runs into aspects with other planets on its trip through the first house. Pluto senses power hunger as well as a desire to destroy and rebuild
column2: therefore
column3: you should watch out for a tendency to want to control or manipulate others. Because the first house is about the ego
column4: Pluto will drive you to your knees for as long as it takes to reform your ego so that it meets with the demands of your community. You will get to know yourself and then get a better grip on your life by the end of this long transit.

column1: 2096;TRANSIT_0000000000016966;Transiting Pluto in your second house;"Humanistic Astrology refers to the second house as the test of possessions. Here all kinds of values are concerned. On its long trip through this house Pluto can bring about changes in your financial situation. This phase may begin with a financial collapse and result in an overthrow of your personal system of values. Most people agonize over such experiences
column2: but the saying ""rising like a phoenix from the ashes"" didnt come from nowhere. Pluto is destructive but also enjoys rebuilding. Finally
column3: it will initiate a new orientation to your materials and fundamental ideals."

column1: 2097;TRANSIT_0000000000033350;Transiting Pluto in your third house;It isnt easy to describe the Plutonic energies in the houses. Some of the statements made up until now have been harsh
column2: although it is clear that there wont be daily uprisings during this period of time. In the third house the immediate surroundings
column3: the daily routine
column4: thought and communication processes are at home. Because this long developmental phase is devoted to these areas
column5: fundamental changes may result. One or more changes in residence may be included in the deal
column6: as well as more intense contact to neighbors
column7: brothers and sisters. Your concept of communication will be regenerated by the challenges during these long years. Finally it should be possible for you to approach people in a way that will leave them with a positive feeling.

column1: 2098;TRANSIT_0000000000049734;Transiting Pluto in your fourth house;The home and being together with the people who live there could reach new emotional depths during this transit. Especially if Pluto forms other aspects on its trip
column2: it could come to disruptive events in your life
column3: such as building a house or transferring your base by moving to a new place. The inner psychological ravages which will slowly start to come about are even more important. Finally
column4: it will come down to the establishment of your way of life. This will happen in a way that will stand the greatest challenges. On this level
column5: the answer may come from your parents.

column1: 2099;TRANSIT_0000000000066118;Transiting Pluto in your fifth house;"Humanistic Astrology refers to the fifth house as the test of purity. That may sound strange when in classical Astrology in the fifth house everything is concerned with pleasures
column2: creativity and children. Actually a person with Pluto in transit through this house will begin to reflect about what pleasures are all about. Especially if Pluto runs into aspects with other planets
column3: it may alter your attitude toward enjoyment and self representation. Purity in this respect doesnt necessarily imply joining a monastery. The question is more the purpose these activities serve. Pluto wont concern itself with frivolous matters also pride and inappropriate conceit will have no chance at this time. Expect to do a lot with children during this phase; they may not necessarily be your own. That should keep you flexible
column4: but often it is from kids that you can learn the most important basic lessons of life."

column1: 2100;TRANSIT_0000000000082502;Transiting Pluto in your sixth house;You will have some experiences which will be important to you by devoting yourself to your work and paying more attention to your body. This holds especially true for Plutos aspects. Pluto doesnt form an aspect with another planet only once but three times
column2: first on the way there
column3: next on the way back and then forward again. Therefore Pluto in this house can lead to severe health problems and also to disturbances at work. But only if you have neglected to arrange for special clarity in these areas. If you are able to understand the connections and with no false adornment fulfill your daily obligations
column4: Pluto will reward you greatly with the most valuable gift imaginable
column5: good health.

column1: 2101;TRANSIT_0000000000098886;Transiting Pluto in your seventh house;The seventh house is the house of relationships. Humanistic Astrology assumes that conformity and contradictions are tested here. Pluto will provoke excitement in all of your relationships during its long trip through this house
column2: especially if it forms an aspect to another planet. Possibly you have an inclination to want to exercise power over people and if that is the case
column3: some day you may be forced to reconsider if you want to continue initiating endeavors without the support of others. Relationships lacking a firm foundation could break up completely
column4: whereas others may be intensified. The trick is to work out a concept for relations with others which both sides can relate to. At the end of this transit you should have learned your lesson about cooperation.

column1: 2102;TRANSIT_0000000000115270;Transiting Pluto in your eighth house;"In the eighth house
column2: the residence of Scorpio
column3: Pluto feels at home. On its long journey through this house it is concerned with the transformation of the self. Topics such as death and reincarnation will be emphasized here. Especially if Pluto forms aspects with other planets in this house
column4: things could happen which will force you into a confrontation with death. This wont necessarily concern your own death; it could just as well call attention to itself in your environment. For someone who enters this transit at 60 years of age there is certainly a possibility to die. Everyone has to greet death someday
column5: and with Pluto in this house one will be intensively prepared for it and will be able to depart in peace. Studying the so-called parapsychological and esoteric sciences
column6: including Astrology
column7: will make deliberation of this topic easier."

column1: 2103;TRANSIT_0000000000131654;Transiting Pluto in your ninth house;"In this portion of your life you will experience which role you play in society
column2: even if it wont be possible without sacrifice or painful experiences. For Humanistic Astrology the ninth house stands for the test of ones own significance. How seriously do you take yourself
column3: both as an individual as well as within the context of the entire universe? Thinking about these kinds of questions will probably bring you to change the orientation of your outlook on life to conform to the changing circumstances.

column1: The ninth house is the house of Jupiter which is often prone to exaggeration. Especially if Pluto forms aspects to other planets during its long trip through this house
column2: it can come to an excessive perspective of your own opinions. Still Pluto will make sure that pride comes before the fall. In the sense of classical Astrology the ninth house emphasizes consciousness expanding trips. Even if you dont live out of a suitcase for 25 years
column3: travel under a Pluto aspect may be profound and bring deep insights with it."

column1: 2104;TRANSIT_0000000000148038;Transiting Pluto in your tenth house;"For Humanistic Astrologers the tenth house is a place for the test of ones ability to find a position in life. The tenth house is the home of Capricorn
column2: the sign of (political) power. Pluto will help out with turbulent events during its long journey through this house supporting you to define your position in life. Especially if it forms aspects to other planets
column3: you may make significant changes to your lifes goals. Pluto can obliterate existing goals but also assist the creation of new ones. If you arent working towards anything in particular
column4: you will be amazed at the way new perspectives develop over the years. Finally
column5: watch out that you dont use your power potential for egotistical purposes
column6: this will diminish Plutos ""escapades"" to some extent."

column1: 2105;TRANSIT_0000000000164422;Transiting Pluto in your eleventh house;The eleventh house is the residence of Aquarius. According to traditional Astrology the topics are group activities
column2: collective interests
column3: ideals
column4: hopes and a persons vision of the future. Possibly you will throw many of your opinions overboard during the course of this phase of your life
column5: especially if Pluto forms aspects with other planets in this house. Also your circle of friends is subject to changing influences
column6: provoking basic changes in your activities outside of work. The ideals for which you were actively proselytizing yesterday may have no meaning for you today. This era will teach you more about your collective significance. How painful these lessons will be lies on your ability to place a higher priority on community than on your own ego.

column1: 2106;TRANSIT_0000000000180806;Transiting Pluto in your twelfth house;During Plutos long trip through the house of Pisces
column2: hidden complex facets of your personality will be brought to light. Experiences made during this phase will provide answers to mysteries
column3: especially if Pluto forms aspects to other planets in this house. This refers to a regenerative transformation of your own psyche. Pluto encounters the illusory and clouded tendencies of Neptune
column4: the planet of the twelfth house. This may cause confusion due to the contrast between the subtle ways of Neptune and Plutos directness. Hereby Plutos most important task is to enlighten the hidden subconscious character traits which foster inhibitions and transform them into conscious action. Therefore it is also important to look into the past because therein lies the key to the events which will eventually lead to solutions.

column1: 2107;TRANSIT_0000000000000002;The transiting Sun in Conjunction with your Sun;"Your birthday is either today
column2: tomorrow or yesterday; many happy returns. Of course you know how it is to be the center of attention for a brief period; tanking up energy for a fresh start of the next year. Its your own personal new years eve celebration. Hopefully you feel joy and satisfaction because a birthday is a special event. Many people reflect back on the previous year and use the occasion to plan what they would like to do with the coming 365 days. Also you are good at getting your way
column3: especially since the birthday kid is usually granted special privileges."

column1: 2108;TRANSIT_0000000000065538;The transiting Sun in Sextile with your Sun;About two months before and after your birthday
column2: this aspect appears in your birth chart. Two months after your birthday you can tell if the changes you decided to implement can stand up to the test of reality. This transit
column3: which lasts about two days
column4: invites you to join others for common activities. Now it may also be two months before the next year of life and you will be able to see more clearly where things got hung up in the last year and find a way to redefine your goals.

column1: 2109;TRANSIT_0000000000032770;The transiting Sun in Square with your Sun;About three months before and after your birthday this aspect will appear in your chart. A square aspect usually brings challenging situations with it. Possibly you will meet someone who will cause you to doubt not only what you are and also brings you to put yourself in doubt. If this causes a crisis or not depends on whether your goals
column2: your opinions and that what you do can stand up to serious scrutiny. If you act in harmony with the cosmic energies this aspect will provide you with fresh wind.

column1: 2110;TRANSIT_0000000000049154;The transiting Sun in Trine with your Sun;About four months before and after your birthday this transit will appear in your birth chart. The Sun enters this harmonious aspect together with a related sign. During this time you will feel good and want to relax. People around you have no problems with you and group activities will also be harmonious. A high energy level will put you in a position to set a satisfactory course for the next month. If you should determine that not everything in the past has gone as planned
column2: you can do something to change that.

column1: 2111;TRANSIT_0000000000016386;The transiting Sun in Opposition with your Sun;About six months after your birthday this aspect will appear in your transit chart. This opposition aspect tells of your personal climax for the year and you will probably be confronted with challenging circumstances. Maybe you will meet someone who will cause you to seriously doubt all your development of the past year. If you know what you are doing
column2: you will be capable of asserting yourself. If not
column3: it may lead to a minor crisis in which you will have to examine if your ambitions and your conduct can withstand a serious challenge.

column1: 2112;TRANSIT_0000000000278530;The transiting Sun in Opposition with your Moon;"In this phase your will and your life energy will confront your emotional world; you will be challenged to think about whether you are emotionally in tune with your ambitions. The Moon also stands for the situation at home. Possibly there is a minor disagreement at home
column2: but never fear
column3: this transit wont bring anything Earth shattering
column4: only a short period where in your own feelings with respect to the way you conduct your life are made conscious. If you have difficulties expressing your feelings
column5: give yourself a break today and withdraw to contemplate. This transit is too short-lived to leave a lasting impression
column6: but you will see clearly
column7: that you are up to the challenges of daily life."

column1: 2113;TRANSIT_0000000000262146;The transiting Sun in Conjunction with your Moon;At this point your will and life energy will meet up with your emotional world and you will find out to what extent your ambitions are in tune with your feelings. The Moon also stands for the situation at home. You will have a few days to check out your subliminal emotional level. But never fear
column2: this transit wont bring anything Earth shattering
column3: only a short phase in which your own feelings with respect to the way you conduct your life are made conscious. If you have difficulties expressing your feelings you will be amazed by your ability to overcome your inhibitions. Still this transit is too short-lived to leave a lasting impression.

column1: 2114;TRANSIT_0000000000327682;The transiting Sun in Sextile with your Moon;"During this phase your will and your life energy will meet up with your emotional world; today you will have no problems responding emotionally to your ambitions.
The Moon also stands for the situation at home
column2: which is why it will be easy for you to actively contribute to the household. Thereby you are in touch with your emotions and have no problem expressing your feelings to others. This transit will bring a short period in which your emotional base with respect to the way you lead your life will become conscious. If you usually have difficulties being open and honest with others
column3: you will be amazed that today you will be able to overcome your inhibitions. Still this transit is too short-lived to leave a lasting impression."

column1: 2115;TRANSIT_0000000000294914;The transiting Sun in Square with your Moon;"In this phase your will and your life energy will confront your emotional world; you will be challenged to think about whether you are emotionally in tune with your ambitions. The Moon also stands for the situation at home. Possibly there is a minor disagreement at home
column2: but never fear
column3: this transit wont bring anything Earth shattering
column4: only a short phase where in your own feelings with respect to the way you conduct your life are made conscious. If you have difficulties expressing your feelings
column5: give yourself a break today
column6: withdraw to contemplate. This transit is too short-lived to leave a lasting impression."

column1: 2116;TRANSIT_0000000000311298;The transiting Sun in Trine with your Moon;"During this phase your will and your life energy will meet up with your emotional world; today you will have no problems responding emotionally to your ambitions. The Moon also stands for the situation at home
column2: which is why it will be easy for you to actively contribute to the household. Thereby you are in touch with your emotions and have no problem expressing your feelings to others. This transit will bring a short phase in which your emotional base in relation to the way you lead your life will become conscious. If you usually have difficulties opening yourself up
column3: you will be amazed that today you will be able to overcome your inhibitions. Still this transit is too short-lived to leave a lasting impression."

column1: 2117;TRANSIT_0000000000540674;The transiting Sun in Opposition with your Mercury;"Today you may react annoyed when you meet people. Somehow you want to confide in others and try to get involved in deep conversations. Possibly you cant see your position very clearly which confuses others. At this time you find it difficult to concentrate; it would be better to allow yourself a few hours of rest in solitude or go out and enjoy yourself. Even if listening to others isnt your strong point right at the moment
column2: you should do your best because this is one of the challenges of this transit. Satisfying communication includes the art of giving your undivided attention to someone else
column3: today you may find listening to others animating."

column1: 2118;TRANSIT_0000000000573442;The transiting Sun in Trine with your Mercury;Today is a good day to confide in others
column2: and therefore you will communicate with others more than usual
column3: but will do your best to avoid stress. Seeing your positions clearly helps you to explain them to others. You work effectively because you have no problems drawing on your power of concentration. Today you will be a good listener
column4: although this isnt usually your strength. If you are prone to talking more than you listen
column5: people will be amazed today at your effective communication
column6: which includes the art of giving others undivided attention.

column1: 2119;TRANSIT_0000000000557058;The transiting Sun in Square with your Mercury;"Today you could be a little annoyed. Somehow you will strive for a more intense communication than usual. Possibly you wont see your positions clearly; you will confuse people around you. At this time you will suffer from a lapse of concentration and may treat yourself to a few hours of rest in solitude or you will take a short relaxing outing
column2: because listening to others isnt your strength. Satisfying communication must include giving your attention to your partner and today simply isnt the right day for it."

column1: 2120;TRANSIT_0000000000589826;The transiting Sun in Sextile with your Mercury;Today you have something to confide and therefore will communicate more than usual. You can see your position clearly and explain it understandably to others. You will work effectively because you have no problem drawing on your power of concentration. Although listening to others is not one of your strengths
column2: today you will be a good listener. If you are already prone to talk more than you listen
column3: this will be a difficult day because others may get burnt out listening. You should know that part of the art of effective communication is giving your partner your attention.

column1: 2121;TRANSIT_0000000000524290;The transiting Sun in Conjuncition with your Mercury;Today you have something to confide and therefore you will communicate more than usual. You can see your position clearly and can explain it understandably to others. You will work effectively because you have no problem drawing on your power of concentration. Listening to others is not your strength at the moment
column2: you prefer to talk about yourself. If you are already prone to talk more than you listen
column3: this will be a difficult day because others may get burnt out listening. You should know that part of the art of effective communication is giving your partner your attention.

column1: 2122;TRANSIT_0000000000786434;The transiting Sun in Conjunction with your Venus;"Today your creativity and loving way of caring about people will be emphasized. Although you appreciate being the center of attention
column2: you dont just take
column3: but also like to give. Today you should be feeling great and be getting a lot of attention especially from members of the opposite sex because your charm wont go unnoticed. Have a good time
column4: go to the theater or to a nice concert.

column1: This transit does have one catch. Conceit and a tendency to show off may be included in the deal
column2: which may put others off. If you are aware of this and are paying attention
column3: you will have an enjoyable day."

column1: 2123;TRANSIT_0000000000851970;The transiting Sun in Sextile with your Venus;Today you are creative and are unusually friendly and dont mind being the center of attention. To avoid taking too much you make a special effort to give as well. Today you are feeling great
column2: which has something to do with the charming way you treat members of the opposite sex. Expect to get a lot of attention because people will notice your charm. Have fun
column3: go to the theater or a nice concert. This would be a good day for a party where you could meet people in a relaxed atmosphere. Looking back on this day will be especially satisfying.

column1: 2124;TRANSIT_0000000000819202;The transiting Sun in Square with your Venus;"Today you sense a desire for recognition and want to be treated well by others. Even when you are the center of attention
column2: you arent sure how you should express your affection because you prefer to take. It would be good to relax today and find your own way to initiate creative activities. Go to the theater or a nice concert because you feel passive at the moment.

column1: This transit has one small catch: It could include a little conceit and bring you to boast too much
column2: making yourself a nuisance. If you watch out for this
column3: there shouldnt be any problems and you will have an adventurous day."

column1: 2125;TRANSIT_0000000000835586;The transiting Sun in Trine with your Venus;Today you are creative and feel great on all levels. As the center of attention
column2: you treat everyone especially affectionately. It isnt your intention just to take
column3: you also want to give to others. The harmonious energies are flowing towards an enjoyable encounter with a member of the opposite sex. Judging by the attention your charm arouses
column4: you can expect it to have positive effects. Have a good time
column5: go to the theater or a concert
column6: buy yourself something nice. Today you wont be prone to overdo things. This would be a good day for a party
column7: where you can meet people in a relaxed atmosphere. Looking back on this day will be especially satisfying.

column1: 2126;TRANSIT_0000000000802818;The transiting Sun in Opposition with your Venus;Today you sense a desire for recognition and want to be treated well by others. Maybe you will try to have a talk with someone you trust because you know that you need more attention than you are able to give. If you have a fight with your partner
column2: you should use the energy to spend a pleasant day together instead. Relax
column3: go to the theater or to a nice concert because you are feeling more passive today. Take care that you dont overestimate yourself or it may cause an uprising. If you are careful
column4: there wont be any problems and you will be able to spend an enjoyable day with someone you like.

column1: 2127;TRANSIT_0000000001064962;The transiting Sun in Opposition with your Mars;Today you could indulge in a negative expression of your ego powers. This may include conflicts with others which have gotten out of hand and are due to be cleared up. You feel nervous and edgy because you dont know what to do with all your energy. Circumstances prohibit its adequate expression. It may be that you are too concentrated on yourself. It would be nice if you were to participate in communal activities and place your abundance of energy at the disposal of your family and friends. If you get hung up on having your way it will only end in a fight. Then you will find yourself isolated and feeling dissatisfied.

2128;TRANSIT_0000000001097730;The transiting Sun in Trine with your Mars;Today harmonious powers are at work which could be useful for a new project. At the moment you have a lot of good ideas for putting them to constructive use without creating stress. Physically
column2: you are in good shape and you wont let the day go by without physical exertion. Even if it is strenuous you get a lot of enjoyment out of it. At the end of the day you will look back and wonder how you managed to accomplish so much without getting tired. Because you arent hung up on asserting your ego
column3: others will enjoy working with you. The evening will find you completely satisfied.

column1: 2129;TRANSIT_0000000001081346;The transiting Sun in Square with your Mars;Today you could indulge in a negative expression of your ego powers. This may include clearing up conflicts with others. Being overwhelmed by your own energy
column2: you feel nervous and edgy as circumstances prohibit their adequate expression. It may be that you are too concentrated on yourself. It would be nice if you would take part in communal activities and place some of your excess energy at the disposal of friends and family. If you are only out to assert your ego
column3: people will avoid you and you will end up feeling dissatisfied.

column1: 2130;TRANSIT_0000000001114114;The transiting Sun in Sextile with your Mars;Today strong powers are at work which could be useful for a new project. At the moment you are having a lot of good ideas for using them. Your own physical energy is abundant and it would be a shame if it wasnt adequately expressed. No doubt today will be rough
column2: but at the end of the day you will be able to look back and admire your accomplishments. Because you are not just concerned with asserting your ego
column3: others will enjoy working with you. In the evening you should be filled with a feeling of satisfaction.

column1: 2131;TRANSIT_0000000001048578;The transiting Sun in Conjunction with your Mars;Today strong ego powers are at work. These could be useful for a new project and should be put to constructive use. Physically you are in good shape and should engage in some type of physical activity to avoid becoming nervous and edgy. Because this can lead to senseless arguments. Even if the day is strenuous
column2: you will be able to look back on it in the evening and think about how satisfied you are with your life. If you are generally dissatisfied then dont wonder if today has been full of aggravations.

column1: 2132;TRANSIT_0000000001310722;The transiting Sun in Conjunction with your Jupiter;Today you are feeling great and are looking out at the world optimistically. No matter what happens today will be a good day. As with every transit involving Jupiter
column2: things will center around expansion. At the moment you probably want to do something extraordinary and are dreaming about exotic places. But you dont necessarily have to take the trip
column3: a wonderful dream is enough for you. Basically
column4: you are good hearted and generous
column5: but there is a danger of getting arrogant and acting too spontaneously because you are too sure of yourself. Even if you find it difficult
column6: it is important to allow other people enough space.

column1: 2133;TRANSIT_0000000001376258;The transiting Sun in Sextile with your Jupiter;Today you are feeling great and are looking out at the world optimistically. Everything you have to do today will be a success because it is just that kind of day. As with every transit involving Jupiter
column2: things will center around expansion. At the moment you probably want to do something extraordinary and are dreaming about exotic places. But you dont necessarily have to go on a trip

column2: or maybe you are dissatisfied with your job or would like to reorient yourself professionally. If you have been putting up with too much to fulfill your obligations and perform to someone elses expectations
column3: it is time to break out and enjoy yourself for a change.

column1: Due to the challenging nature of this transit
column2: the process of transformation will hardly proceed without creating tensions. There is also a danger of becoming confused for a period of time. Of course the solutions must first be sought and found within yourself. Therefore you should carefully weigh all the pros and cons before you integrate any new elements into your life and toss the old overboard.

column1: Contradictory principles are colliding because the expanding Jupiter is in transit with the restrictive Saturn. As soon as you can find a balance between them
column2: you will be able to orient your life around it."

column1: 2381;TRANSIT_0000000001622338;Transiting Jupiter in Trine with your Saturn;"Under this transit you will feel a need to expand your life experience
column2: but will not pounce on every opportunity which promises to serve this goal
column3: but will proceed carefully and cautiously. You can count on receiving encouragement from others along the way. If you have been putting up with more than you can handle recently in order to fulfill obligations and perform to someone elses expectations
column4: you will now see your goals from a distance and proceed to initiate the necessary changes to achieve them.

column1: If your life has been relatively easy up until now
column2: you will be able to provide a spiritual background to your efforts. You will come to understand what you are working for and have to accept restrictions. Success is guaranteed because you dont go to work bitter
column3: but with joy and self confidence. Because you proceed with such great caution
column4: this would be an excellent time to organize your finances and invest in profitable enterprises.

column1: In any case
column2: put this time to productive use while you have patience and far reaching vision to work with. This transit will allow you to find a balance between Jupiters expansion and Saturns restrictive principle."

column1: 2383;TRANSIT_0000000001851714;Transiting Jupiter in Opposition with your Uranus;"Under this challenging transit you can be drawn toward risky endeavors which could have sudden and negative consequences that you arent able to size up. Even if you find it difficult
column2: you should plan as carefully as possible and act with extreme caution. Your dreams are castles in the air and your behavior at the moment tends to be like a defiant child who doesnt care about anything other than getting its way. Currently you are programmed to implement reform
column3: with little regard of the cost and although you have the well being of humanity at heart
column4: you could be prone to deny your day to day obligations which is likely to create problems for others. Probably you lament about the state of society before you have any alternatives to offer.

column1: Possibly you desire to be free
column2: but dont know what freedom looks like. The privileges you demand tend to be self centered
column3: which doesnt earn you much sympathy from others. It would be better to take time to consider what you would like to change and which changes are feasible
column4: before placing bees into other peoples bonnets. This transits greatest challenge is to keep a cool head. Make use of opportunity without neglecting your responsibility if you want to profit from it."

column1: 2384;TRANSIT_0000000001884482;Transiting Jupiter in Trine with your Uranus;"During this time you will probably make drastic changes to your attitude towards life. Your horizons could be suddenly and unexpectedly expanded by experiences with other people. This could motivate you to get involved in social issues and fight for the rights of the oppressed. Demands for social justice may call you to be prepared to take extraordinary action. Because this is an harmonious transit
column2: you will hardly run risk of overestimating yourself and your efforts will be characterized by a farsightedness. There is also no danger of your plans being reduced to chaos by impatience
column3: because you are aware of the ill effects of a lack of restraint.

column1: Feel fortunate that in your endeavors Fortuna has her hand in it making everything take a turn for the better. Your initiative will be rewarded because you are open to new ideas and are always prepared to learn. Intuitively you sniff out opportunity so that you wont have to remain idle
column2: which at this time would seem more like a punishment to you."

column1: 2388;TRANSIT_0000000002097474;Transiting Jupiter in Conjunction with your Neptune;"During this time your antenna will be fine tuned to other peoples problems and you may even develop a philosophy of life around helping the needy. You devote your abilities and all of your good will to those who are less fortunate. This will earn you the respect and sympathy of others
column2: although whenever Neptune is involved there is a danger of being taken advantage of. Your outlook on life could move toward religion and mysticism as you represent such high ideals as selflessness and community and strive to further develop yourself by overcoming your most basic needs. Probably you will devote yourself to inner processes during this transit. This will only become critical if you deny your individuality and try to become a martyr.

column1: In this period you will discover your sensitive side and will start to pay attention to your dreams
column2: to write poetry or study music. Anyone who needs you will find you ready to listen. Hopefully
column3: you will be able to rely on others in your time of need as well. If you keep your feet on the ground and remain true to yourself
column4: you will find tranquillity and also make others happy."

column1: 2389;TRANSIT_0000000002163010;Transiting Jupiter in Sextile with your Neptune;"During this time you will formulate new human ideals which you would like to integrate into your life. This is already characterized by the sensitivity with which you approach the problems of other people. Neptune represents sensitivity and Jupiter expands on it
column2: such that you could make a philosophy of life out of giving assistance to those in need. A desire to be needed makes you determined to realize your ideals; at the moment that is more important than any egotistical interests. Possibly you lack the drive to realize your visions
column3: but even if they remain in your imagination they wont do anyone any harm.

column1: Probably you have been learning more about the holistic aspects of life and would be willing to approach some of the esoteric fields
column2: whereby Astrology is exquisitely suited to adding another perspective to life.

column1: Use this transit to look inside yourself and meditate on your role in society. Postpone all business transactions for the moment because worldly affairs could make you a victim of self delusion."

column1: Helping the disadvantaged could even become a philosophy of life

column1: During this time you will learn to differentiate between reality and your wishes and ideals. Dont let yourself get involved in experiments and listen to people you trust when they reflect on your behavior. It would be nice to discover your sensitive and creative side and build on it."

2393;TRANSIT_0000000002376002;Transiting Jupiter in Opposition with your Pluto;"During this time a drive to change things will overtake you and you may even want to completely transform your life. You could represent an extreme position and become eccentric
column2: but you will develop such a thick skin that other peoples inability to comprehend wont bother you. However
column3: if you arent in harmony with yourself and your surroundings Pluto will give you an unpleasant reminder of the fact that other humans inhabit this planet besides you. Jupiters expansion principle will make sure your experiences leave an impression.

column1: Dont overestimate your possibilities and try not to see things so bitterly. You wont find perfection anywhere and you are no super hero. Therefore you should be generous enough to forgive yourself for a small slip up once in a while. Keep cool and try to express your feelings."

2394;TRANSIT_0000000002408770;Transiting Jupiter in Trine with your Pluto;"You have a drive for making changes and may even want to completely transform your life. This is the right time for it because you are able to get to the essence of yourself and recognize how to get more satisfaction out of life. column2: but thanks to the harmonious nature of this transit
column3: you wont become embittered. Even if people think that you are hard on yourself
column4: it isnt as bad as it seems; Pluto works on deeper levels and demands that existing structures be rearranged in order to rise up like a ""Phoenix from the ashes"".

column1: Your determination may be marked
column2: but not to the extent that you want to control and manipulate your environment. That wouldnt help your career moves and you know it. column3: because you have enough energy to realize your goals."

column1: 2408;TRANSIT_0000000001835394;Transiting Saturn in Conjunction with your Uranus;"Under this transit you will have to accept some restrictions to your freedom
column2: as unpleasant as it may be. Perhaps you want to break out
column3: leave your boring routine behind you and get out of your obligations
column4: but Saturn wont let you get away with it. You will only be successful if you consider every change carefully and have good reasons for implementing them. Although Uranus energy is directed towards creating new circumstances through sudden changes

column1: 2409;TRANSIT_0000000001900930;Transiting Saturn in Sextile with your Uranus;"Spontaneity and continuation will maintain harmony and balance in your life. You like to experiment but also recognize the danger in new endeavors and cut out unnecessary risks. This is a mixture which may make you happy: although you know exactly what you should do with your spare time and are also open to new friendships. Your boss cant complain because you do your work thoroughly and correct. Tradition and progress don't contradict each other because you recognize that innovations are based on what our forefathers built and that a coat of bright paint isnt enough to change history.
Even if you try to make changes during this phase
column2: they will be well thought out and moderate. One of your strong points is your creativity which enables you to work well with your colleagues. An ability to remain open without being naive will offer some immunity to grave disappointments. It wont be difficult for you to live in old structures because these will give you enough freedom to try everything out which seems interesting at the moment. Others are able to convince you of their convictions
column3: because you are honest and are also able to admit weaknesses. Dont let this transit pass by without putting its potential to constructive use."

column1: 2413;TRANSIT_0000000000016770;Transiting Saturn in Opposition with your Sun;"This is neither an easy or a joyful transit
column2: nevertheless it offers some opportunities. Probably you feel that you are always coming up against hurdles. Nothing is working like it should
column3: which makes you feel insecure. You have to work hard and prove your performance constantly
column4: although successes are rare and these bear no relation to the effort involved in bringing them about. Exhaustion
column5: physical weakness or illness could do their worst. Possibly old inhibitions may surface which limit your achievements. Or you are afraid to open yourself up and admit your weaknesses to others. Conflicts with your father or with other authorities may arise; either because you dont want to accept restrictions and obligations or because you are actually being incapacitated. The greatest problem is that you could lose your self-confidence and be subject to additional failures.

column1: Assume that a lost battle also serves a purpose and you are now able to recognize what will be useful in the future. Take good care of your health and fulfill all of your responsibilities with great care
column2: this will protect you from terrible experiences."

column1: 2414;TRANSIT_0000000000049538;Transiting Saturn in Trine with your Sun;"During this period
column2: work will glide from your hand
column3: you have no trouble completing your work in a disciplined manner. This doesnt make you unhappy since you like your work and can see the results. You know what you want and can use your skills efficiently
column4: which will result in an advance in your career. If something doesnt work right away
column5: dont give up too easily
column6: this transit will bring strength and persistence. You can accept restrictions and get along well with bosses and other authorities
column7: who should be pleased with your performance and have no complaints. Use this transit to take care of obligations you have been putting off and to work on concrete projects. Now is the time to build a foundation which will stand up to future crises. Because the Sun finds itself in a transit
column8: you can develop your personality and explore your maximum level of achievement at the same time. ""Realization of potential"" is a term frequently used in this context."
