column1: 2417;TRANSIT_0000000000000386;Transiting Saturn in Conjunction with your Sun;"Under this transit you will be faced with tests and other burdens. Probably not everything is running as you had hoped it would
column2: but this is precisely what will help you to recognize what you are actually capable of. Possibly
column3: you feel that your entire personality is inhibited and insecure. This may be caused by external circumstances
column4: but you may be making things difficult for yourself. Now you are challenged to bundle all of your energy and concentration for one specific purpose. Dont disappoint yourself; accept the challenge.

column1: If you dont get discouraged
column2: then this transit will simply be a work-intensive period
column3: during which you will have to sacrifice some pleasures in order to taste the benefits at a later time. You will get nothing for free
column4: but may hope that your hard work will be rewarded and grant you more self-confidence. Patience
column5: perseverance and discipline will receive new meaning for you during this transit. Because you arent in the best health
column6: it is very important to pay attention to your bodys signals. Otherwise
column7: Saturns restrictive effect may express itself in the form of a disease."

column1: 2418;TRANSIT_0000000000262530;Transiting Saturn in Conjunction with your Moon;"This transit indicates a serious if not depressive mood. You may detect exaggerated self doubt and increased conflict with negative aspects of your personality. Maybe you feel worthless
column2: lonely and unloved. You are most inclined to withdraw from the outside world and give in to your self pity. That would be the worst way to deal with the challenge of this transit. If you want to use it constructively
column3: look inside yourself and come to terms with your emotional state. Seen in a positive light
column4: this is an opportunity to analyze your feelings with no artificial embellishments and to find out just how much everything really means to you. You can clear up problems in your relationships without rose colored glasses or overwhelming infatuation
column5: because you are now ready to make emotional sacrifices if any should be necessary.

column1: Another phenomenon of this transit is a tendency to think about the past and long for it to return. That could keep you from perceiving the opportunities offered in the present. Usually the ""good old days"" werent so pleasant as we remember them because everyone is inclined to suppress bad experiences. Try to stay sober during this time and dont act in a self destructive manner. This will encourage emotional maturity which is a good basis for a new initiative."
2419;TRANSIT_0000000000328066;Transiting Saturn in Sextile with your Moon;"This transit indicates a somewhat more serious mood
column2: which you will be able to put to good use. As you work through your recent experiences you will find it easier to dispense with your rose colored glasses. Without being over zealous or coming under the influence of some overwhelming emotion
column3: you are trying to find yourself and harbor the intention of doing some emotional ""house cleaning"". People appreciate your consideration for their feelings. If you are not generally subject to moods or sudden emotional outbursts you tend to keep yourself under control. This period would be a good time to take a closer look at your emotions and to find out how much everything means to you. If you want to get away from something or someone
column4: go ahead and do it without feigning self pity. Possibly you will seem somewhat spaced and colder than usual
column5: although you havent changed
column6: you just dont respond to sentimentality. When you are ready to comfort someone or offer to help
column7: then it is someone who deserves the attention. Conflicts will be easily worked through because your perception isnt blocked by personal or emotional involvement. You get along with your family
column8: which is a relief because they are important to you during this transit."

column1: 2420;TRANSIT_0000000000295298;Transiting Saturn in Square with your Moon;"This transit will bring a serious
column2: if not depressing mood. Possibly you will feel worthless
column3: unloved and isolated from your surroundings. A deep insecurity could take hold
column4: robbing you of your joy. Fears and inhibitions which you thought had been overcome
column5: suddenly appear again and make it difficult for you to open yourself to people you love and trust enough to talk about your problems. Since emotional ties to the world have somehow been broken misunderstandings and tension have developed. Basically you dont feel at home with yourself. Problems with your family or emotionally trying obligations could crop up. You may have to care for a member of the family for an extended period of time which will leave you with little personal freedom. Dealing with women during this time will be especially difficult; the Moon represents women.

column1: Get over your inhibitions and accept help from others. Dont withdraw to wallow in self pity but be determined to master the crisis. Celebrate small successes and dont close your eyes to the beauty of life. Then you will be able to leave this dark valley behind you."
2421;TRANSIT_0000000000311682;Transiting Saturn in Trine with your Moon;"Under this transit you will be able to satisfy most of your emotional needs
column2: which is largely due to the fact that you know what you need. Having taken the time to work through all the recent events
column3: you are ready to put your rose colored glasses aside. Without becoming overzealous or drowning in emotion you are trying to find yourself and intend to ""clean up"". People appreciate your consideration for their feelings. You are generally not subject to moods or sudden emotional outbursts and keep yourself under control. This period would be a good time to take a closer look at your emotions and to find out how much everything means to you. If you want to get away from something or someone
column4: go ahead and do it without feigning self pity. Possibly you will seem somewhat spaced and colder than usual
column5: although you havent changed
column6: you just dont respond to sentimentality. When you are ready to comfort someone or offer your help
column7: then it is someone who deserves the attention. Conflicts will be easily worked through because your perception isnt blocked by personal or emotional involvement. There is no conflict between your private and professional obligations because you dont assign priority to either area."

2423;TRANSIT_0000000000524674;Transiting Saturn in Conjunction with your Mercury;A very restricted perspective can make things difficult not only for you but also for your environment by leading to intolerance and stubbornness. Possibly you will constantly remain critical of yourself although you dont feel comfortable with it and sense that a lot of good opportunities are slipping by. Your thoughts wont be particular positive
column2: although you will be able to concentrate
column3: a certain lightness and joy will be missing. In another aspect
column4: you wont be getting into risky endeavors or put your house and home at risk. During this period you will take more time to consider important decisions. It would be best to use this transit to find out more about what the people around you really think and to learn to communicate more clearly. If you dont feel much like talking and have trouble expressing your thoughts
column5: it may help you get over that. Try to get a grip on the eternal guilt complex and do everything to stay aware of the pleasant side of life. You have enough self discipline to restrict yourself and ban all thoughts which are too pessimistic.

column1: 2424;TRANSIT_0000000000590210;Transiting Saturn in Sextile with your Mercury;"In this phase
column2: you will appreciate having an extraordinary ability to concentrate. Mental discipline
column3: attention to detail and a talent for organization are the attributes associated with this transit. You may discover a talent for managing or find a solution to a problem which has been giving you a headache. Because you are very aware of your intellectual capacity you wont hesitate to accept responsibility for your projects. Taking care of concrete matters will have priority; you wont go around chasing fantasies.

column1: Because you are certain not to overlook the small print and because all the details are important to you
column2: you could take care of business deals which have been in the works for a while or make investments. You arent easily impressed
column3: dont let yourself be lead on and can weigh decisions carefully. You take your work seriously
column4: know what you are talking about and are open to reasonable arguments
column5: such that no one can accuse you of being intolerant or pig headed. It would be best to look for an intellectual challenge and find out what your mind can do."

column1: 2425;TRANSIT_0000000000557442;Transiting Saturn in Square with your Mercury;This transit represents intolerance
column2: exaggerated precision and mental inflexibility. You are convinced that nothing escapes your attention
column3: although you often cant see the forest for all the trees. It is difficult for you to recognize larger connections because you lack objectivity and are preoccupied with details. During this time you could have communication problems. People have trouble understanding your way of thinking and because they are overly critical and are prone to take everything apart
column4: you wont find much sympathy. Maybe your views are old fashioned and arent in tune with the times. Some people have the impression that your own dissatisfaction is your motivation to make life difficult for others. Your demands on others are exaggerated
column5: if you dont ease up and learn to laugh at a joke once in a while
column6: you will soon be feeling lonely. Dont lose your sense of humor and learn the art of conversation. If you didnt take everything so seriously or insist on being exact
column7: you will master your intellectual challenges.

column1: 2428;TRANSIT_0000000000803202;Transiting Saturn in Opposition with your Venus;"This transit wont provide you with much enjoyment. Possibly you will have to fulfill social or family obligations which restrict you and disrupt your enjoyment of life. It will be more difficult than usual to come into contact with others. Everything will be a little more serious and often end with disappointment.

Either you expect too much from others or you are put under too much pressure. Relationships which arent based on mutual respect and honest affection wont stand chance during this transit. It may seem like the relationship was ended by external circumstances
column2: but be aware that you created these circumstances. You arent open for the pleasant side of life
column3: because everything that is fun quickly seems to be superficial. It may even come to people avoiding you because light conversation is so difficult for you and you arent much in the mood for laughing and joking any more either. All of that can lead to inhibitions or fears about meeting new people. Being the center of attention in a large group of people makes you feel insecure; you also feel uneasy when others expect you to be charming.

column1: Dont isolate yourself again
column2: but have faith in your friends
column3: who arent going to let you down during this difficult phase. You have to make an effort to show your feelings. You should not bury yourself in work and neglect romantic relationships
column4: because after this transit you will regret it."

column1: 2429;TRANSIT_0000000000835970;Transiting Saturn in Trine with your Venus;"This transit will leave you little time for superficial enjoyment; you will prefer to be involved with people. There will be time to reflect on friendships and to think about which people are the most important to you. It is possible that you will learn a lot from the people of different age groups who will come into your life. You will be supported and will know how to act in society.
Obligations to your lover or business partner will be fulfilled conscientiously. As long as no one tries to take advantage of you
column2: you will remain loyal and upright. Bonds of friendship wont be unnecessarily placed at risk
column3: because you are aware of your charm and its effectiveness at arousing sympathy. Perseverance and your ability to concentrate give your creative work a certain depth. You will hardly fall head over heals in love or see your relationship through rose colored glasses. If problems arise in your relationship
column4: the chances are good that you will be able to find a reasonable solution accommodating the needs of everyone involved. It is important to you to give your partnership a stable foundation and to clear up misunderstandings. This may not be the most romantic period of your life
column5: but you will be able to avoid unnecessary conflicts and disappointments."

2432;TRANSIT_0000000000786818;Transiting Saturn in Conjunction with your Venus;"At this time you probably arent the most charming example of the human species. It is difficult for you to be lovable or to express positive feelings. Especially in relationships
column2: people find you cold. Superficial friendships dissolve
column3: mostly because you arent very much fun. In extreme cases relationships and long-standing friendships may fail
column4: if it is clear that they arent strong enough to weather tests. By and large this is a pleasant transit which can bring fruitful insights into your expectations of others and your role in society. Even if your thoughts are plagued by strong self doubt
column5: you will still be able to differentiate true friends from false.

column1: Your creativity seems to be inhibited. Generally you wonder why some pastimes used to be so important to you. But dont worry
column2: your joy of life will come back and allow you to recognize that you can overcome crises. Possibly
column3: the effect of this transit will seem less destructive merely by bringing you the ability to avoid falling head over heals in love with the wrong person."

column1: 2433;TRANSIT_0000000001048962;Transiting Saturn in Conjunction with your Mars;"This transit can have many different effects
column2: depending on the persons work ethic and level of energy. Generally
column3: Saturn will concentrate strength. If you are involved in many activities all at once you wont get anywhere. If necessary Saturn will slow you down forcing you to choose your goals carefully and to work hard at them. During this period you will be able to master tasks which demand organizational talent as well as correct procedure. Probably this transit will be a challenge. Even if you are ready to throw in the towel
column4: you will have to show that you are disciplined enough to continue working hard. That would only make things worse because Saturns challenges should be accepted without hesitation. If you fight your obligations
column5: it will lead to conflicts with others who will deal strict and mercilessly with you.

column1: Avoid conflicts with people you like because your tact isnt up to it. If you are willing to work hard and accept restrictions
column2: this transit will bring out your best side. Have faith that there will be easier times ahead."

column1: 2434;TRANSIT_0000000001114498;Transiting Saturn in Sextile with your Mars;Under this transit you wont act without support or without careful consideration
column2: but concentrate your activities on concrete goals. Knowing what you want and what you are capable of as well as stamina
column3: hard work and the ability to concentrate will bring you much success. Because you arent intimidated by the thought of putting in long hours your career may well advance a few steps up the corporate ladder. In spite of your ambition
column4: you are very capable of cooperation because your vision isnt restricted to your own interests. You could serve as an example and an inspiration to your colleagues because you never ask others for anything which you arent prepared to give. Any restrictions brought about by professional obligations
column5: such as overtime
column6: are taken in stride. As far as your cooperative energies are concerned
column7: they have satisfied every expectation. Probably you have developed an interest in athletic competition. The ability to accurately judge how much energy you can afford to invest in a particular activity will ensure that you dont overdo it and that you pay attention to your bodys signals.

column1: 2435;TRANSIT_0000000001081730;Transiting Saturn in Square with your Mars;This transit can be very frustrating
column2: because success seems to evade you
column3: in spite of a lot of hard work. It looks as though an invisible force is constantly placing hurdles in your path and screwing all your plans up. On top of all that
column4: you are constantly being endowed with new responsibilities although you are already overburdened to the point where you are ready to throw in the towel. Others are not exactly on good terms with you because you are inclined to act in your own best interests and can be rather tactless about it. You simply arent cooperative and try to fight your way through on your own. You may feel insecure because your sexual interests arent very clear at the moment or you are too inhibited to practice sexuality and suffer from fears of failure. Being inclined to self doubt and temper tantrums
column5: it is important for you to watch out that you dont take out your frustration on the wrong people and get involved in acts of violence or cause an accident. No matter what happens
column6: remember that this phase wont last forever and sometime the rewards you have earned will show up.

column1: 2438;TRANSIT_0000000001327490;Transiting Saturn in Opposition with your Jupiter;"During this transit you will have to live with some restrictions to your personal freedom
column2: which will influence your outlook on life. Obligations or a tendency to work too hard may make it difficult for you to act like you used to and just go out and have fun. If you used to take life easy
column3: that will change now
column4: because you will be forced to deal with failures. These failures will be associated with the affairs of Jupiter's natal house and it's sign position. Financial losses could force you to give up your accustomed standard of living and to be content with less. Avoid closing important business deals because success isnt exactly a predetermined outcome. In the worst case you will appear embittered and closed minded. Dont let it get so far that others avoid you because of your rigid
column5: joyless existence. At the same time
column6: you could be inclined to intolerance and moralizing
column7: which are not in accord with societal norms. Maybe your thinking has become pessimistic
column8: which only serves to make everything worse.

column1: Take care to retain some level of openness and dont let things get you down
column2: even if this isnt the happiest period in your life."

column1: 2439;TRANSIT_0000000001360258;Transiting Saturn in Trine with your Jupiter;This transit will keep optimism and sobriety in balance. A desire to develop yourself and your outlook on life will bring you to search for concrete challenges. The fact that you fulfill your obligations correctly and also know how to enjoy yourself could provide a good foundation for development. Your success is due to a lot of good luck and your ability to recognize opportunities and use them wisely. Getting along with others is no problem because you know what you are talking about and keep both feet planted firmly on the ground. A perspective which includes both the details as well as their larger context will allow you to close profitable business deals. Learn to accept necessary limitations
column2: this will help you to stay in control even while working on large projects. Taking time to conscientiously work through all your experiences will stabilize your outlook on life and help you to mature. It would also be good to learn to overcome unnecessary inhibitions and believe in the good in people. This transit will teach you to feel free in spite of obligations to your community.

2442;TRANSIT_0000000001311106;Transiting Saturn in Conjunction with your Jupiter;"Two contradictory principles will meet up in this period
column2: which can only have positive effects if you are able to bring them into harmony with each other: the difficult
column3: serious and limited Saturn will be conjunct with the Jupiter of your natal chart
column4: which represents an easy going manner and strives for expansion. This will enable you to find fulfillment in your work or to integrate the concepts of responsibility and obligation into your outlook on life. How this will look in the end is entirely up to you. If you continue to chase after pleasures
column5: Saturn will force you to change your philosophy of life and confront serious matters. Saturns effects may be strong enough to weaken your self confidence and induce a feeling of inhibition

column2: or maybe you will just redecorate your house. Changes within the family
column3: your home or in the relationship to your mother could arise. During this phase you are going to meet people who will help you with all of this. Women may be especially important while this transit lasts regardless of your gender because you feel attracted to women
column4: who stand for individuality
column5: independence and spirit.

column1: At the moment you have the opportunity to leave your past behind you and take advantages of the opportunities your spontaneity offers."
2477;TRANSIT_0000000000278978;Transiting Uranus in Opposition with your Moon;"As with all difficult transits

column4: even if you arent able to identify its cause. Especially in your relationship to women you could have difficulties because you refuse to take on responsibility
column5: allow no one to get close to you
column6: or to offer emotional support to others. It may go so far that you want to break out and reorient yourself. Being impatient
column7: you get frustrated very easily and are quick to feel torn and uprooted. Because the situation is difficult to judge at this point
column8: you should put off important decisions until you have come to peace with yourself. Dont forget that your behavior will influence events on the surface which you will quickly suppress but these may also be in some way intended.

column1: 2478;TRANSIT_0000000000541122;Transiting Uranus in Opposition with your Mercury;"This transit is classically associated with confusion
column2: nervousness and difficulties with concentration. That may be due to your openness allowing you to take in so many impressions that you arent able to find the time to sort them out. Although mentally you are running at top speed
column3: you are still overworked. It would help to relax and spend some time getting your head together.

column1: During this time you will be inclined to take on extreme positions and even believe that you have finally found the ultimate truth. Still you hold back when talking to your friends to avoid confusing them too much; it would be better to listen to someone you trust and let yourself be brought back down to Earth.

Maybe you have the feeling that your thoughts are getting out of control and are bringing you into areas where you dont want to be. Everything interests you although you cant let yourself be too deeply involved in any single topic
column2: because you are too impatient since everything has to happen immediately. Avoid making important decisions at this time
column3: because there is a danger that you will overlook important details and be mislead by wishful thinking. Even if you have great ideas for the future
column4: your insights could merely confuse you making you appear inconsequent. It may be some consolation that this transit will be an opportunity to throw your old
column5: rigid ideas overboard."

column1: 2479;TRANSIT_0000000000573890;Transiting Uranus in Trine with your Mercury;"Countless new acquaintances will inspire you as you have now become open enough to accept new ideas. Mentally you are running at top speed

column3: although only a fraction of them are likely to ever be realized. But that wont matter because under this transit you will be flexible and are fortunate to have people to filter the important things out for you. There may be an increase in your desire to communicate

column5: so there may be more activity in this respect during this transit. Although you may not undertake a trip around the world
column6: but may be traveling for business reasons
column7: which could prove to be stimulating.

column1: One goal could be to get rid of your prejudices and approach new areas openly. Spiritual development will become more important and you dont let anyone dictate which direction it should take. The search for spiritual independence has very good chances of succeeding."

column1: 2483;TRANSIT_0000000000786882;Transiting Uranus in Conjunction with your Venus;"This is a classic aspect for falling in love and being consumed by extraordinary passions. People who seem independent and lead exciting lives will seem especially attractive. Maybe you will use a new lover to break out and leave your mundane life behind. Still you will probably dive into it opening yourself up to disappointments because you didnt take a close enough look to start with. Uranus likes to idealize
column2: of course being in love makes it easier than at any other time. If you feel oppressed or bored in your old relations
column3: this is the phase to reorient yourself. Maybe you will end your relationship overnight
column4: although that will be extremely painful for your current partner. It would be possible to discover unexplored and exciting aspects in your previous relationship and experience something like a second honeymoon.

column1: Generally you will experience changes in all your relationships. It will be easy for you to approach people openly and without prejudices. Also you think a lot about the community and mostly defend liberal issues.
Friendships formed under this transit wont necessarily be long-lived
column2: but will be stimulating. A wonderful and exciting time may lie ahead of you."

column1: On the other hand

column1: 2488;TRANSIT_0000000001065410;Transiting Uranus in Opposition with your Mars;"During this transit you will receive a sudden rush of energy
column2: but will have difficulties using your strength appropriately. Possibly you feel provoked although no one wants to harm you

column4: impulsive or violent so it would be better if you would try to find something useful to invest your energy in. At the moment patience isnt one of your strong points
column5: just be careful that you dont let your frustrations out on innocent bystanders. Try to get ahead step by step and to concentrate on what you are doing because you may be prone to accidents.

column2: independence and high energy levels. Pay attention to your tone of voice as well as other peoples feelings otherwise you may not earn much sympathy.

column1: Before you go fighting for your rights
column2: consider more carefully if they have really been infringed upon or if you can find a compromise. It could end up leaving you the victim of your own aggressions and even get you tangled up in physical conflicts. Take your time making decisions and avoid saying things that you might regret later.

column1: Finally after this transit you will be more satisfied and have a firm grip on life
column2: which those around you should recognize."

column1: 2502;TRANSIT_0000000001573314;Transiting Uranus in Conjunction with your Saturn;"In this phase of life you will have the opportunity to leave old useless fears behind you and prepare yourself to face the future. The changes you will experience will require you to react with flexibility and not to respond from your gut. Your old ways are no longer reliable and you now have been given the opportunity to discover new strengths and to develop a new understanding of yourself. This depends on whether you recognize opportunities or merely lament about your plight and complain about imagined disadvantages. It would be possible to live out your ideals and shake off constraints and compulsion
column2: just dont reject all responsibility and arouse insecurity in even your best friends by acting like a mutineer. Uranus and Saturns opposing qualities should be kept in balance. If you can manage that you will create free space and bring a fresh wind into your life without having to give up essential structures. It may be that overnight you will recognize that striving for a career and social recognition is pointless and suddenly drop out.

column1: In any case you will have to consider what you want out of life and eventually make radical decisions quickly. Under some circumstances you may continue on as before
column2: but your new attitude has added a deeper meaning to your goals allowing you to accept values such as discipline and order. If you have allowed your father to put you under pressure up until now
column3: you will at present be able to develop independently of his expectations. A direct talk with him could help a lot."

column1: 2503;TRANSIT_0000000001835458;Transiting Uranus in Conjunction with your Uranus;This transit occurs shortly after birth when the transiting Uranus is retroactive and crosses the position of Uranus in your birth chart again
column2: or about at the age of 85 years
column3: which can be seen as the end of a Uranus cycle. As a baby or a small child one experiences a time of constant turmoil due to the constant confrontation with various impressions which can be exhausting. If you are of an advanced age
column4: you will be able to withdraw from all obligations and look back on life somewhat objectively. It is a time to prepare for death and to give up your desire for individuality.

column1: 2504;TRANSIT_0000000001900994;Transiting Uranus in Sextile with your Uranus;"This transit comes along twice in each persons lifetime: once during puberty and once at about 70 years of age during retirement. Our understanding of Uranus transit is therefore more like a cycle which should be seen in its entirety.
If the sextile comes about for the first time early on in life
column2: this is similar to suddenly becoming an adult
column3: at least physically. Interest in the opposite sex will be aroused and often you can observe how young people rebel against their parents in this and insist on being able to lead their own lives. Activities which are beyond the scope of the family will become more important
column4: because that is where sudden developments and experiences take place which are so essential to the individual development.

column1: The second sextile transit comes around during retirement and will hopefully inspire you to become active again in your old age
column2: although that may be difficult because older people often arent sure what they should do with their freedom
column3: once they have it. So this transit can symbolize the loss of professional structures
column4: which have determined the lives of people for more than 40 years. Try to use this opportunity to take on projects which you have been wanting to work on all your life and have been putting off. Dont think that its too late now."

column1: 2505;TRANSIT_0000000001868226;Transiting Uranus in Square with your Uranus;"This transit comes about twice in the life of the average person: once during the early twenties and later
column2: in the early sixties
column3: shortly before retirement. This is why people refer to Uranus transits as a cycle seen in its entirety from the perspective of the individual.

column1: The first time this transit comes up
column2: it symbolizes the difficulty of entering adulthood. More and more it is expected that you rely on yourself in your decision making and that you ward off everything that has hindered you in your development. If young people are leaving their parents homes early
column3: this period could be a time of detachment from ones parents. Individual responsibility for your own actions and forming an independent identity is what is called for. People want a new orientation although our system of values is being constantly revised.

column1: As this constellation appears the second time we find ourselves in preparation for retirement and again it is a time of letting go from something which a lot of people at this age dont enjoy leaving; the workplace. It makes it seem like youre being thrown onto the scrap heap
column2: although no one finds it easy to deal with getting older. Unfortunately in our Western society it has become commonplace for older people to be put out to pasture
column3: whereas other cultures continue to profit from their wisdom."

column1: 2506;TRANSIT_0000000001884610;Transiting Uranus in Trine with your Uranus;"Usually everyone experiences this constellation twice: the first time at around 28 years of age
column2: and the second time at about 56. In the context of the Uranus cycle
column3: this transit is generally seen positively.

column1: During the first Uranus-Uranus Trine the so-called Saturn Return occurs simultaneously
column2: which is of great significance to the individual as its effects coincide with this transit. This is the phase for reflection on ones experiences and there is also time to consider their meaning with relative objectivity. At this time necessary corrections will be made such as a divorce and changing jobs. After having gotten some life experience
column3: but still young enough to start over completely with a new orientation if need be. Maybe you doubt whether the direction you have been going is right for you
column4: but it is necessary to find the courage to make decisions.

column1: At the age of 56 you should have learned to overcome unnecessary inhibitions and fears and to accept your personality. You should take the liberty which is your right and not let yourself be put under pressure without good reason. Maybe to your own amazement you will start over again and explore new paths which may lead to unusual experiences. Certainly there is no danger of becoming reckless because you have had time to find out what is really important to you."

2507;TRANSIT_0000000001851842;Transiting Uranus in Opposition with your Uranus;"The Uranus-Uranus opposition is the most important transit of the Uranus cycle and is every bit as significant as the so-called Saturn Return. This transit occurs between the ages of 39 and 44 years
column2: the period psychologists refer to as the mid life crisis. This term addresses frustrations associated with unfulfilled dreams and relationships which over the years have become empty. When a person suddenly notices that there isnt unlimited time to devote to achieving goals or to get to know oneself and others better.

column1: Naturally it depends on whether the individual has been making its own way and is responsible for all of its actions. Generally this transit will provoke a panicky reaction and hurried decisions whereby you burn bridges behind you and then regret it shortly thereafter. Take time to consider which aspects of your life should really be changed and which are worth keeping. Create perspectives for the future because you wont be able to change the past."

2508;TRANSIT_0000000002113986;Transiting Uranus in Opposition with your Neptune;"In this phase you could sense sudden impulses of unusual longings which may blow you away. Maybe its important for you to use your abilities in service to your community or you want to have collective sensations and spiritual experiences. Unfortunately you take things too emotionally
column2: are naive and expect a great wave to carry you away from it all and give you the opportunity to forget reality and explore other worlds. There is a danger that you suppress reality and escape into your ideals
column3: this tendency may be further complicated by an increase in drug consumption.

column1: Give yourself a break during this transit
column2: because you wont be especially productive anyway. If you feel like youre losing the ground from under your feet
column3: then confide in a good friend
column4: it would be especially advantageous to talk to someone older who has already been through it all. In any case avoid taking steps which bar the way back."

column1: 2537;TRANSIT_0000000000541186;Transiting Neptune in Opposition with your Mercury;"This transit can inhibit a clear understanding and cause confusion in the area of communication. Perhaps you dont express yourself clearly and have trouble understanding where the person you are talking to is headed. It may be difficult to analyze and organize your thoughts or you wont be sure what you should make of all this. You may be taken in by deception and place your trust in people who have done nothing to earn it. You could also adopt other peoples opinions uncritically and dont realize your mistakes until later.

Be careful not to let yourself be talked into doing things you would normally oppose. The problem is that under this transit your intuition will also be effected and you could distrust both your intellect and your feelings. Making decisions will be especially difficult because you wont be able to assess the consequences. The time span of this transit will make it impossible to postpone all decisions. However
column2: it would be better to rely on the advice of trusted friends
column3: who are important to you and who you have known for a long time. Although it could be hard for you to talk about uncertainties
column4: that is exactly what you should do. Dont waste your time day dreaming
column5: but direct your thoughts to every day reality. Abstract and complicated topics could just add unnecessary frustration."

column1: 2538;TRANSIT_0000000000573954;Transiting Neptune in Trine with your Mercury;"During this transit you will get a lot of enjoyment out of your imagination. If you are able to find the right words to clothe your thoughts
column2: it will be especially rewarding to make them accessible to other people. Without wanting to place unnecessary restrictions on the workings of your mind
column3: try to examine the processes with which you solve every day problems. It may be that your way of thinking will change enough under the influence of this transit
column4: making you conscious of new aspects of community. It would do you good to capture your momentary feeling of inspiration and freedom in poetic or literary works. Situations which seem mundane could now appear in a new light because you react more sensitively to what people want to tell you. Instead of remaining on the surface
column5: you make an effort to sense which direction the conversation is taking and determine what kind of help would be most appreciated. Being open to metaphysical phenomena and mysticism as a part of daily life doesnt get to the point of being a danger to a healthy rationale or allow you to get lost in lofty ideals.

column1: Attaining a deeper understanding of both yourself and the people you feel closest to will allow you to profit from a harmonious synthesis of intellect and sensitivity. Talk about ideas
column2: visions
column3: dreams and thoughts will result in a more productive exchange."

column1: 2541;TRANSIT_0000000000524802;Transiting Neptune in Conjunction with your Mercury;"Under this transit you may have trouble expressing your opinions clearly and precisely. Probably some words have special meanings for you and misunderstandings can arise due to differing definitions. Another deficit of this transit is organizational skills. Important details may be overlooked
column2: you may proceed carelessly or forget appointments. Even thinking one thought through to its conclusion may be difficult for you
column3: you may also have trouble applying logic and drawing consequences.

column1: In spite of all this

Most likely you will be happy to share your innermost experiences with the people you feel close to. During this period of your life you will be prone to make decisions from the gut
column5: depending on how you are feeling at the time."

column1: 2542;TRANSIT_0000000000786946;Transiting Neptune in Conjunction with your Venus;"This transit is made up of two sides; one wonderful and one dangerous. To tell the bad news first: in your love life great confusion could arise because you are constantly falling in love with unattainable ideals. Once you are convinced to have found the great love of your life
column2: you will discover tiny
column3: ugly imperfections and be completely devastated. Disappointments like these are unavoidable. Maybe you believe that a fairy tale romance involves giving up ""The Self"" entirely and remain blind to whether your partner is willing to sacrifice or not. You are inclined to let yourself be exploited because you dont want to awaken out of your dreamy state.

column1: If you were to find a way to avoid these dangers
column2: it will open the way for some wonderful experiences. Willing to give everything
column3: hopefully you will find someone who knows how to appreciate this quality. Probably you will rediscover your romantic vein and sometimes feel like youre living in a paradise.

column1: If you havent put your extraordinary creativity to use up until now
column2: this would be a good time to make your first attempt. During this phase your entire being will be softer and you will worry more about others and use your talents to create harmony.

column1: Without wasting a lot of words you are able to express your needs and also harmonize them with those of your community. Especially sensitive people will be captivated by your charm and want to be your friends."

column1: Now you may get a little lazy and want to sit back and enjoy life. Under this transit

column1: 2547;TRANSIT_0000000001065474;Transiting Neptune in Opposition with your Mars;Under this transit you could find yourself fighting an invisible enemy and want to defend yourself even if you havent been attacked. Feeling weakened and a fear of appearing egotistical prevents you from directing your energies toward a concrete goal. Being oversensitive and inclined to overreact could cost you some friendships. Problems are not only caused by ineffectively organizing work and your tendency to take on too much at once
column2: but also by your lack of self-confidence. Maybe you no longer feel strong enough to fulfill your obligations. Although that isnt necessary yet because this transit is designed for contemplation on its motives and its behavior during competition. Dont rush into anything
column3: even if a lack of courage should cause you to throw caution to the wind
column4: there will be time enough to examine the effects within you. Mismanaged energy could lead to self inflicted psychological wounds
column5: nightmares or violent fantasies. The most important thing during this period is not to put yourself under pressure or let your frustration out on innocent people.

column1: 2548;TRANSIT_0000000001098242;Transiting Neptune in Trine with your Mars;"In this period you will prefer to invest your energies in the well-being of other people. The ability to work well with others and leaving your personal goals in the background will be helpful in achieving harmony in accord with your humanitarian ideals. On the other hand your power of ego will prevent you from being exploited while you take on practical goals. Under this transit the goals you have set may be realized because during this time you wont rush into things but will be guided by inspiration. It could be of great help to show others how to work for the community without denying or neglecting their own individuality.
Keeping a good balance between your actions and energies will make you feel more at ease
column2: especially if you work in a profession involving imagination
column3: inspiration and vision. Possibly getting involved in competition or some other tense situation will alter your behavior toward people you dont like. During disagreements you try to really understand other people and respect their arguments always trying to draw useful consequences. This is only possible when disagreements are founded on every opinion being respected as a part of the whole. Especially during this time
column4: you should be able to identify yourself with everyday tasks. If you are forced to do something against your convictions or something just doesnt feel right
column5: it probably wont be successful now. It would be a shame for a wonderful potential to be lost due to this kind of constellation."

column1: 2552;TRANSIT_0000000001311234;Transiting Neptune in Conjunction with your Jupiter;"If you have been living in accord with a code of ethics up until now
column2: you may start to slip up. There may be a long period of time in which you are no longer sure what you should make of some of your experiences
column3: although this can only lead to an evaluation of your ethical standards. Rigorous or restricting moral standards may dissolve and may even make way for altruism. If you get involved in any form of community service then do it with joy without adopting the role of a martyr. The feeling of being connected to the entire world allows you to keep up a good mood throughout the day and act according to your ideals. Possibly you are so deeply involved that the thought of not succeeding is incomprehensible. Be careful of exaggerated optimism!

column1: Also reexamine whether you have overestimated your role in the course of events. Its better to take small steps which allow you to find fulfillment in every day life."

2553;TRANSIT_0000000001376770;Transiting Neptune in Sextile with your Jupiter;Now you feel comfortable with friends and acquaintances. Being open and friendly often leads to deeper discussions and an exchange of opinions. Probably you will have a feel for other peoples underlying outlook during this transit. That will help you avoid larger disappointments. Knowing what to expect from others enables you to avoid building up expectations and emphasizing negative character traits. The search for peace and harmony will bring you to spend more time in contemplation. A willingness to do something for the community may contribute to loosening up your strict moral code. Humanitarian thoughts may also be passed on to others who show an increased interest in listening to you. It is important to you to use your time wisely and to educate yourself. Your intuition may lead you to philosophical or religious subjects and you should be able to make use of your head and your instinct to give your life a new orientation. Appreciate your wonderful
column2: calm and optimistic approach.

column1: 2554;TRANSIT_0000000001344002;Transiting Neptune in Square with your Jupiter;During this period it will be difficult for you to accurately estimate your own capacity and your role in the course of events. If you get on everyones nerves by dictating rules or preaching morals
column2: it wont contribute to your popularity. Possibly your experiences will serve to confuse your outlook on the world such that you completely lose your sense of security and are no longer sure what is going on. That will only happen if your grand illusions caused you to see the world through rose colored glasses. Neptune could prevent you from seeing opportunities and allow your fortune to slip through your fingers. If things go well you could be freed from old fears and inhibitions which will cause you to see your responsibility to society in a new light. This would also be the end of a development which is a great concern of yours in this period of your life. Before your new self confidence leads you to live independently
column4: you will miss having things the way you are used to and will feel insecure. If you have been serious and responsible
column5: you will now feel unusual needs
column6: which you probably wont feel comfortable allowing yourself to fulfill. Thinking about work is not the focal point

column8: or if you manage to get over your addiction to work in favor of intellectual development which will give your imagination more space. Especially your relationship to your father could improve during this transit. You are no longer willing to let yourself be pushed around
column9: let others tell you what to do nor are you prepared to accept restrictions. Because you have the necessary sensitivity
column10: you will have rough confrontations with your ""Old Man""."

column1: 2562;TRANSIT_0000000001835522;Transiting Neptune in Conjunction with your Uranus;While youre living through this transit
column2: remember that you arent alone
column3: but are in the company of everyone your age. It is essential to consider the house position of Uranus in your birth chart as well as its aspects in the interpretation. Generally Neptune will slow Uranus down a little
column4: not letting the changes come as suddenly as they otherwise would. In this period you should be able to avoid sudden actions or decisions
column5: if only because Neptunes energy is basically confusing and you may not know which direction you should take. If you undertake something suddenly
column6: it is likely to have negative consequences because self-deception or external disappointments may play a role. At the end of the century this transit will have influence on very old people. Maybe you are experiencing your own process of giving up your individuality in favor of reflection on human dreams
column7: fantasies and visions as a need arises to withdraw from the outside world.

column1: 2563;TRANSIT_0000000001901058;Transiting Neptune in Sextile with your Uranus;"This is the time for spiritual insights. With your mind open to new experiences
column2: you can feel free to start learning about any new topic. It would be especially helpful to approach Astrology or other fields of esoteric learning with intuition. While experimenting in every field
column3: you accept limits and make sure that you keep your psychological stability. The most important thing is to expand your inner world and attain brotherhood and sisterhood with all of mankind. With generous offers of help and plenty of ideas you try to improve the conditions around you
column4: whereas your concerns go beyond your own development to include the development of the entire planet with all of its inhabitants
column5: because you no longer want to differentiate between people.

column1: You keep your faith in the future without following naive conceptions. Maybe you finally feel like you can break free of old unnecessary inhibitions and abide only by sensible rules
column2: preferring to use unconventional methods and individuality to set reforms in motion. Pay attention to your dreams
column3: because they could guide you to a better future."

column1: 2564;TRANSIT_0000000001868290;Transiting Neptune in Square with your Uranus;Neptune/Uranus transits represent new intuitive insights. The challenging square between the two planets
column2: allows you to fight against new experiences or be unpleasantly surprised by them. Possibly you suffer from various forms of stress and emotional imbalance which put a strain on your friendships. A harried attempt to rid yourself of unnecessary inhibitions once and for all could make you appear stilted
column3: or you have visions of the future which have no bearing on reality and therefore cannot be realized. By and large you have good intentions
column4: but have difficulty putting them into practice because you lack an understanding of the way things are connected. A desire for change and an expansion of your intellectual dimensions fail to guide you in a specific direction. A general feeling of dissatisfaction could grab you making not only your life difficult but also getting on the nerves of everyone around you. What ever you manage to learn during this period will be hard earned. Try to restrict your spontaneity once in a while and concentrate more on the traffic on all sides of you. You feel overwhelmed by your increased awareness and knowledge which you havent absorbed yet. This will leave you nervous and insecure.

column1: 2567;TRANSIT_0000000002114050;Transiting Neptune in Opposition with your Neptune;"Now you are about 85 years old and are encountering the last station of the Neptune cycle. The disintegrating tendencies which are ascribed to Neptune show up in the form of physical disability or the beginning of a psychological weakness.

At least this could be registered by others; your consciousness will take off in other directions which wont have a lot to do with general reality. It is the time in which worldly affairs become less important as you prepare to take leave of this world
column2: calmly awaiting the new dimensions which death will eventually bring: the drive for control and action will slowly evaporate. Hopefully old fears will have dissolved and their place will be filled with a certain tranquillity. Probably you also have a need to withdraw and leave the spotlight for others. If your physical condition allows it
column3: you could explain to the coming generation that material perspectives are often overrated and spiritual relationships neglected."

column1: 2568;TRANSIT_0000000002146818;Transiting Neptune in Trine with your Neptune;"Under the transit you are approximately 55 years old and are experiencing a harmonious period of the Neptune cycle. It should be clear to you now that an exaggerated ego presents an obstacle to living together with others and how everyone should try to do their part to contribute to a well functioning community where everyone can rely on each other. It would be wonderful if you would recognize that you havent completely given up on your dreams and ambitions but became more aware of reality. Its not necessary to give up your dreams
column2: but merely adjust them to be more realistic.

column1: Probably you have a need to do more for other people and to follow your intuition. Or else you get tired of constant competition and wish that you could approach your work calmly. New unexpected ideas will come up and guide you to a new direction. Your spiritual development will take on more meaning
column2: so that you may either become active in your church or you will get interested in esoteric fields.

column1: In any case you would like to use the remaining time to construct something useful
column2: which will benefit the people around you. This also involves being aware of your own deeper emotions and being able to express them. Make the most of this period and try to test out your new insights and integrate them into your life."

column1: 2569;TRANSIT_0000000002130434;Transiting Neptune in Square with your Neptune;"You are now about 42 years old and in a somewhat critical phase of the Neptune cycle. Dissatisfaction and confusion could make your life difficult and make you think that your dreams will never be realized
column2: which is a depressing thought. Maybe you are looking for a way to get to know yourself better
column3: but are searching in the dark. Now is the time to look back on your life and consider whether you are satisfied with what you have achieved. Although the response is likely to be negative
column4: what will only be made worse by the lack of realistic alternatives.

column1: Be assured that you will be inclined to see everything worse than it really is. It would be better to avoid important decisions
column2: because easier and more hopeful times will come. Try not to withdraw too much from the external world
column3: but keep in touch with your friends
column4: even if you dont feel much in the mood for light conversation."

column1: 2570;TRANSIT_0000000002163202;Transiting Neptune in Sextile with your Neptune;"In this period of Neptunes cycle you will examine whether you still have the same dreams or if your visions have changed. As you withdraw more from the outside world and look deep within you will discover yourself which will enable you to question if your goals are still a priority as well as help you find out what you need to ensure your happiness. The first successes or difficulties on the job will make you think; you will want to find out if you are on the right path
column2: although instead of theorizing about the answer you respond from the gut. For you it is important to be in harmony with yourself and not to betray your own hopes
column3: wishes and dreams. If you have neglected your own spiritual life and have paid attention only to external successes you will have to change your attitude. Maybe you havent taken full advantage of your freedom and want to make up for it now. The sensitivity with which you respond to others could enable you to discover many new opportunities. Your interests are directed to personal needs
column4: although you dont place these over the well being of the community
column5: so that this transit may provide wonderful experiences living together with others."

column1: 2571;TRANSIT_0000000002097666;Transiting Neptune in Conjunction with your Neptune;The planet Neptune moves through the zodiac so slowly that its not possible to complete the journey in one lifetime. For this reason this transit can only come about shortly after birth
column2: when the transiting Neptune becomes retrograde and crosses the position of Neptune in the birth chart. It is not very useful to interpret this transit.

column1: 2582;TRANSIT_0000000009437698;Transiting Neptune in Conjunction with your MC;"If you enter this transit at an age when you are choosing your professional orientation

If you dream of influence
column3: fame and  fortune
column4: but arent willing to work for it
column5: you may be wasting your time. The best thing to do would be to turn to people you think you can trust and who know you well.

column1: If you are artistically active
column2: this transit may be very useful to you by activating your imagination and getting started on projects which you have wanted to realize for a long time. Your sensitivity is well developed
column3: which makes you successful at helping others."

column1: 2621;TRANSIT_0000000001638978;Transiting Pluto in Sextile with your Saturn;"During this period you will be capable of doing something constructive
column2: without expecting to see results immediately. With your hard work and stamina you could impress your boss or do well in your own business because you have an eye for detail and your work is thorough. You are very realistic and get along with very few luxury articles; amusing yourself isnt as important to you as self discipline. Maybe you arent entertainment personified
column3: but you take your responsibility seriously and do your best to help those in need.

column1: Under this transit you will create structures which are well thought out and highly valued. Still
column2: a transformation will take place within your being
column3: because you work through your experiences adequately and your personality is becoming more solid. You find the courage to confront your weaknesses and overcome them
column4: even if it is a difficult process. At the end of the development a consciousness should have evolved which can best be described with the word integrity. Everything you have achieved was well earned
column5: because nothing is free."

column1: 2622;TRANSIT_0000000001573442;Transiting Pluto in Conjunction with your Saturn;"This transit will provide you with the opportunity to free yourself of social obligations and discover the values which matter to you individually. Maybe this path will lead to the loss of recognized status symbols; it may be possible that you will have to give up your job or some of your possessions. Even if it hurts at first
column2: it holds opportunity for you. You will test the limits of your stamina and develop something like humility. You could become aware how little a person actually needs
column3: if he isnt subject to the constant seductions of advertising; consuming or exercising influence on the society doesnt necessarily make anyone happy. Old inhibitions or fears could be overpowered during this phase of life. Possibly there is a conflict which will lead to the break down of structures
column4: because Plutos energy unloads itself suddenly or even violently. There could especially be conflicts with your father
column5: if you refuse to submit as is expected of you. The result of your development in this period will be more freedom of movement; you have a gone through a change of consciousness
column6: which has relieved you of superficial burdens. In spite of all of this you will have no trouble working disciplined
column7: because you have clear ambitions."

column1: 2623;TRANSIT_0000000001835586;Transiting Pluto in Conjunction with your Uranus;During this transit you would like to free yourself from all restrictions and do everything to form your own individuality. You could approach things with more intensity and should be prepared to deal with a lack of understanding. Possibly you are known as an eccentric. Provocation or blind activism wont get you very far
column2: but you will recognize this soon enough. Plutos energies unload themselves suddenly and powerful
column3: which is why conflicts with authorities can develop. However
column4: you wont be able to keep that up for the entire duration of this transit because it will last several years. The goal is to recognize your desires and not isolate yourself from society
column5: because man is a gregarious animal
column6: who tends to follow the herd.

column1: 2624;TRANSIT_0000000001901122;Transiting Pluto in Sextile with your Uranus;"This should be a very creative phase of life
column2: because you are in the right frame of mind to test everything out. The more unusual the experiment is the more it interests you. These experiences will leave traces behind which will change your personality. New unexplored facets will come to the surface. Probably it will quickly come to a dramatic development because such energetic transits tend to bring unexpected events. While living out your spontaneity and tired conventions you dont put everything at risk. With a capacity for learning which is almost limitless
column3: your mind is alert and eager to investigate interesting fields
column4: which certainly includes Astrology.

column1: Under this transit you should have a satisfying social life and be able to meet people and expand your circle of friends. If some people have put you under pressure or have tried to restrict you in the past
column2: you will get up the nerve to take leave of them
column3: because it will be increasingly important to you to have as much freedom as possible. Generally there should be a lot of movement in your life
column4: which will prove itself to have positive effects."

column1: 2625;TRANSIT_0000000001868354;Transiting Pluto in Square with your Uranus;"During this time you will have to prove your flexibility
column2: because your life will be marked by tremendous changes. If you refuse to conform to the changing circumstances while clinging to out-dated values
column3: you will make things more difficult for yourself. External events may overwhelm you and place everything which you have built in question.

column1: This transit may manifest itself in such a way that you beat your head against a wall and search for change at any price
column2: whereas structures which are worthwhile retaining are also destroyed. You shouldnt wonder if you lose your orientation and become insecure. Dont rebel against all types of institutions and authorities without a clear purpose
column3: otherwise people wont take you seriously.

column1: Seen positively you have the chance to rid yourself of concepts which have lost their validity. This will be a large step toward the further development of your personality. To avoid trouble
column2: act as cautiously as possible."

column1: 2626;TRANSIT_0000000001884738;Transiting Pluto in Trine with your Uranus;"This should be a very creative phase of life

These experiences will leave traces behind which will change your personality. New unexplored facets will come to the surface. Probably it will quickly come to a dramatic development because such energetic transits tend to bring unexpected events. column3: because it will be increasingly important to you to have as much freedom as possible. Generally there should be a lot of movement in your life
column4: which will prove itself to have positive effects."

column1: This transit may manifest itself in such a way that you beat your head against a wall and search for change at any price
