column1: Seen positively you have the chance to rid yourself of concepts which have lost their validity. This will be a large step toward the further development of your personality. To avoid trouble
column2: act as cautiously as possible."

column1: 2628;TRANSIT_0000000002130498;Transiting Pluto in Square with your Neptune;"Having reached a mature age
column2: this transit could leave you feeling insecure
column3: because it causes confusion in your spiritual life. Maybe you feel like you have lost contact to your inner self and sense longing which you thought you had overcome. Your active imagination wont help you
column4: but will only cause confusion. Structures which you have become attached to will disappear leaving a void. Possibly you dont understand what is actually happening and wont see clearly until the transit has passed. Just dont let yourself be drawn to extreme views or exotic belief systems
column5: even if you feel a need to change your life and are trying to find peace within a larger community.

column1: Now the challenge is to look within yourself and explore all the facets of your personality. If you have been able to see through deceptions or like to escape into certain fantasies
column2: at the end of this transit you will be forced to accept the truth."

column1: 2629;TRANSIT_0000000002163266;Transiting Pluto in Sextile with your Neptune;"If you are effected by this transit
column2: you are probably between 50 and 55 years old and in the process of delving deep into your psyche to explore the last remaining secrets. You would like to spur on your development and ban all illusion from your life. Maybe you feel that you can suddenly see more clearly and wont be deceived so easily. If you have found a faith or have become active in a religious group
column3: this decision will be well thought out
column4: not an act of blind fanaticism.

column1: You will have the opportunity to become aware of subconscious patterns of behavior in the area of life represented by the house position of Neptune in your birth chart. Possibly you will fulfill long sought after dreams
column2: whereas other peoples reaction wont make any difference to you
column3: although it will be difficult to let go of desires which cant be fulfilled. Enjoy this period
column4: because your emotional state will be stimulated and you wont have any difficulty showing your emotions."

column1: 2630;TRANSIT_0000000002097730;Transiting Pluto in Conjunction with your Neptune;This transit requires self-recognition in the areas which Neptune is most likely to cloud up. This period of life will give the chance to see through self-deception
column2: fraud and illusion. Subconscious patterns of behavior in the area of life represented by the house position of Neptune in your birth chart will be uncovered and either altered or consciously put to use. Maybe you feel like you can suddenly see more clearly and wont be deceived so easily. This transit will not only effect whats going on inside you but also external events. Still you can steer your energy into certain projects
column3: which you have been planning for a long time
column4: but havent had the confidence to try to realize them. You can assume that you see possibilities realistic and arent deceiving yourself. Since everyone in your age group is effected by this transit to the same extent
column5: you arent living through it alone. It will be possible to get together with others who are feeling the same way. The individual effects are the result of Neptunes house position and its aspects to the other planets.

column1: 2631;TRANSIT_0000000002359874;Transiting Pluto in Conjunction with your Pluto;This transit can only occur shortly after birth when Pluto is retrograde. An interpretation doesnt seem to make a lot of sense.
2632;TRANSIT_0000000002425410;Transiting Pluto in Sextile with your Pluto;"Although you are now experiencing a time of change
column2: it wont throw you off. Having learned to accept the fact that no one can hold onto people or situations
column3: you are willing to let go. Increasing your awareness and putting new insights into practice presents no problem for you. An awareness of your weaknesses and the less attractive sides of your personality allows you to accept yourself as you are. Instead of wasting energy trying to paint things in rosy colors
column4: you search for the truth
column5: even if it is unpleasant. You could serve as an example for others. Probably you will be often asked for advice
column6: because you are at peace with yourself
column7: which is the result of introspection. You may influence your environment
column8: but will hardly use these abilities for your own benefit. The wonderful thing about this transit is that you are open for new experiences and dont let yourself become uncertain.

column1: If you are looking for a more individual interpretation
column2: look at Plutos house position in your birth chart and its aspects to other planets."

column1: 2633;TRANSIT_0000000002392642;Transiting Pluto in Square with your Pluto;This transit presents a great challenge. Possibly you will be in the midst of a mid-life crisis and will have to take note of changes which are disturbing. You tend to get worked up about something that can burst like a bubble becoming nothing. You can overestimate your strength and get started on things which are too big for you to handle. So be careful and dont disregard the advice of friends
column2: even if it is difficult for you to listen. The lesson of this transit is that no one can hold onto the past
column3: but must give in to the changing tides. If you start acting stubborn and inflexible
column4: more intensive events will force you to discover your flexibility. Dont ignore your weaknesses but work on them and integrate them into every day life. Contact to others could be made difficult by your tendency to want to have your way and take on a position of leadership. You will notice that you change your behavior and have to show respect for others peoples decisions. The only comfort for you in this phase is that you are in a position to learn a lot
column5: especially about yourself.

column1: 2634;TRANSIT_0000000002409026;Transiting Pluto in Trine with your Pluto;"Although you are now experiencing a time of change
column2: that wont throw you off. Having learned to accept the fact that no one can hold onto people or situations
column3: you are willing to let go. Increasing your awareness and putting new insights into practice presents no problem for you. An awareness of your weaknesses and the less attractive sides of your personality allows you to accept yourself as you are. Instead of wasting energy trying to paint things in rosy colors
column4: you search for the truth
column5: even if it is unpleasant. You could serve as an example for others. Probably you will often be asked for advice
column6: because you are at peace with yourself
column7: which is the result of introspection. You may influence your environment
column8: but will hardly use these abilities for your own benefit. The wonderful thing about this transit is that you are open for new experiences and wont let yourself become uncertain.

column1: If you are looking for a more individual interpretation
column2: look at Plutos house position in your birth chart and at its aspects to other planets."

column1: 2635;TRANSIT_0000000009192002;Transiting Pluto in Opposition with your Ascendant;"During this period
column2: people will enter your life who have a special meaning for you. Unfortunately
column3: these contacts wont necessarily always be pleasant or harmonious. There is more of a danger that you will be watched
column4: put under pressure
column5: become dependent or be tossed around at the whim of dubious characters. This could lead to a conflict which will enable you to be freed from the clutches of these people and live independently again. You should watch out that you dont use unfair methods
column6: even if your opponent is strong and relentless.

column1: This confrontation will bring you the opportunity to discover your own strengths and to learn to deal with extreme behavior. You will recognize what independence means to you. The path may not be as dramatic as all this
column2: but may lead to a union with someone who represents a mature personality to you. Even in this case you shouldnt give up your individuality in order to chase after someone you admire; be assured that everyone has to find a personal specific solution."

column1: 2636;TRANSIT_0000000009224770;Transiting Pluto in Trine with your Ascendant;"This transit will offer you many opportunities to make positive changes deep within you. Will power
column2: energy and self-confidence give you the potential to make an unusually intense impression on people. Because this is a harmonious transit
column3: you will have a lot of influence on people you are close to
column4: and friendships will bring more mutual satisfaction. A great responsibility weighs upon you
column5: but you are now aware of it and are ready to act accordingly. Maybe you will be placed in a ""power position"" for the duration of this transit
column6: which will require you to act in the interests of many people. Go for it
column7: because you should know that acting out of pure egotism wont get you anywhere and should therefore be in a position to make decisions for the benefit of a lot of people. Thereby you shouldnt hesitate to get away from people or circumstances which arent good for you. This will lead to deeper more meaningful friendships than you ever believed to be possible. This kind of enrichment to your life will encourage you to go off in directions which you havent been aware of up until now."

column1: 2637;TRANSIT_0000000009208386;Transiting Pluto in Square with your Ascendant;This is a challenging transit
column2: which wont pass unnoticed. There may be a lot of excitement especially in your personal relationships. If these leave you feeling dissatisfied
column3: that will probably be noticeable during the course of this transit. Maybe you will be forced to end some relationships. The more you struggle against it
column4: the more painful it will be. That's the way Pluto works! Painful experiences like these make room for new sensations
column5: even if at first there seems to be no indication that the pain will ever end. Now your challenge is to make changes in your life
column6: because this transit represents a new beginning. Old baggage can be thrown overboard quickly
column7: which is why you wont hesitate to get away from people or circumstances which arent good for you. Unfortunately there is a danger that you wont be able to deal with failures and then act impulsively out of frustration which could cause accidents or end in violent outbreaks. Character traits which you have ignored up until now will be expressed so clearly that you will be forced to deal with them. Maybe you will put yourself under pressure and not be able to relax. If this is the case
column8: traveling or meditating would do you good. This period of time may be an easy one for you
column9: but you also have the strength to master every crisis and to profit from each one in the end.

column1: 2638;TRANSIT_0000000009241154;Transiting Pluto in Sextile with your Ascendant;"This transit will offer you many opportunities to make positive changes deep within you. Will power
column2: energy and self-confidence give you the potential to make an unusually intense impression on people. Because this is a harmonious transit
column3: you will have a lot of influence on people you are close to
column4: and friendships will bring more mutual satisfaction. A great responsibility weighs upon you
column5: but you are now aware of it and are ready to act accordingly. Maybe you will be placed in a ""power position"" for the duration of this transit
column6: which will require you to act in the interests of many people. Go for it
column7: because you should know that acting out of pure egotism wont get you anywhere and should therefore be in a position to make decisions for the benefit of a lot of people. Thereby you shouldnt hesitate to get away from people or circumstances which arent good for you. This will lead to deeper more meaningful friendships than you ever believed to be possible. This kind of enrichment to your life will encourage you to go off in directions which you havent been aware of up until now."

column1: 2639;TRANSIT_0000000009175618;Transiting Pluto in Conjunction with your Ascendant;"This is one of the most powerful transits
column2: which wont pass unnoticed. Will power
column3: energy and self-confidence give you the potential to make an unusually intense impression on people. Possibly you have access to powers which should be used with caution. Currently your challenge is to make changes to your life
column4: because this transit represents a new beginning. Old baggage can be thrown overboard quickly
column5: which is why you wont hesitate to get away from people or circumstances which arent good for you.

column1: There is a danger of handling failures badly and then acting impulsively out of frustration which could cause accidents end in violent outbreaks. Character traits which you have ignored up until now will be expressed so clearly that you will be forced to deal with them. Maybe you will put yourself under pressure and not be able to relax. In this case traveling or mediating would be good. This period of time may be an easy one for you
column2: but you also have the strength to master every crisis and to profit in the end from each one."

column1: 2640;TRANSIT_0000000009437762;Transiting Pluto in Conjunction with your MC;This time is suitable for working on professional plans
column2: earning public recognition and contemplating the meaning of what you are doing. If you dont try to make the necessary changes now
column3: you will have them forced on you
column4: either by losing your job or through a loss of status. You will get the bill for your past actions and if you cheated
column5: manipulated or took part in games of power
column6: that will be avenged. You ask yourself what it is that you expect to get out of life and wont let yourself be distracted from achieving what you set out to do. If you have found a fulfilling activity
column7: you could work hard and become embittered
column8: but dont put yourself under pressure. If you are dissatisfied with what you have achieved up until now
column9: you could change your profession overnight or discover a new passion. Possibly you will be promoted and will receive power
column10: but you don't know yet how to deal with it. Anyway self-doubt and changes in your effectiveness in public will lead to new directions in your professional and social life.

column1: 2641;TRANSIT_0000000009503298;Transiting Pluto in Sextile with your MC;"This is an appropriate time for realizing your professional plans
column2: such that you can draw more satisfaction out of your daily efforts. During the long course of this period you may see a promotion or even a change in employment. Because this is a harmonious transit
column3: you will enthusiastically delve into new activities and also be prepared to carry more responsibility. You ask yourself what you really want to achieve in life and which position you want to attain. Because you arent prone to delusions of grandeur at the moment
column4: you make changes that are sure to be profitable. With your determination you know all too well that elbowing your way forward wont get you anywhere
column5: but balancing the interests of everyone involved will. Once you have found a fulfilling activity
column6: you will use all your strength to work for it.

column1: Maybe you will be invested with power
column2: which you will have to learn to wield
column3: although that shouldnt be difficult. In any case
column4: changes to your effectiveness in public will lead you in new directions."

column1: 2642;TRANSIT_0000000009470530;Transiting Pluto in Square with your MC;"During this time you wont be able to avoid questioning your professional plans as well as your attempts to earn public recognition. Furthermore you seem to be questioning everything that you have been doing. Maybe during the course of this period you will become so embittered that you will call others to stand up and rebel against you. If you dont make the necessary changes in your own ways now
column2: you will have changes forced on you
column3: either by losing your job or through a loss of status. You will get the bill for your past actions and if you are cheated
column4: manipulated or got involved in games of power
column5: they will be avenged. You ask yourself what it is that you expect to get out of life and dont let yourself be distracted from achieving what you set out to do.

column1: The consequences of this transit dont necessarily have to be negative; one thing is clear: there are some changes that are necessary
column2: it only depends on how you deal with these. If you dont resist them
column3: they will bear fruit which could take your professional life in a new direction and influence your reputation."

column1: 2643;TRANSIT_0000000009486914;Transiting Pluto in Trine with your MC;"This is an appropriate time for realizing your professional plans
column2: such that you can draw more satisfaction out of your daily efforts. During the long course of this period you may see a promotion or even a change in employment. Because this is a harmonious transit
column3: you will enthusiastically delve into new activities and also be prepared to carry more responsibility. You ask yourself what you really want to achieve in life and which position you want to attain. Because you arent prone to delusions of grandeur at the moment
column4: you make changes that are sure to be profitable. With your determination you know all too well that elbowing your way forward wont get you anywhere
column5: but balancing the interests of everyone involved will. Once you have found a fulfilling activity
column6: you will use all your strength to work for it.

column1: Maybe you will be invested with power
column2: which you will have to learn to wield
column3: although that shouldnt be difficult. In any case
column4: changes to your effectiveness in public will lead you in new directions."

column1: 2644;ASTROMAP_0000000000003268;AstroWorld Cartography;"Already in ancient times astrologers were aware of the relation between the signs of the zodiac and the countries of this planet. The discovery of planets and continents
column2: the forming of new states and various societal changes
column3: were responsible for constantly adapting the existing astrological theories to the prevailing consciousness of the times. Therefore it is certainly no coincidence in this present time of growing ""Globalisation""
column4: including worldwide communication and mobility
column5: that Astro-Cartography gets more meaningful. Basically the world has become a smaller place. Therefore it is so easy these days to establish relations with foreign people in their respective countries.

column1: The modern adaptation of Astro-Cartography has definitely to be credited to Jim Lewis who developed this modern form of Astro-Cartography in the seventies. It was only after examining the qualities of various places on this planet that gave a new meaning to our existence. That ability to change one's life by changing one's location is the unique gift of Jim Lewis's Astro-Cartography.
As long ago as the middle ages
column2: astrologers calculated so called Relocation-Charts
column3: using a different place of birth for the calculation of the chart in order to interpret one's abilities and downfalls while being at this place. Since the same birth time is applied
column4: the planetary positions within the Zodiac remain unchanged.  Only the AC-DC and the MC-IC axis
column5: as well as the houses
column6: will change their positions. Of course you may create as many relocated charts as you wish.

column1: But it goes further
column2: since an important factor when creating an Astro-Map is the calculation and display of all the positions on the surface of the Earth where one or more of your natal planets touch a Horoscope-Axis. (The AC-DC axis appears in form of a curve
column3: while the MC is shown as a straight line and the IC as an interrupted line). The underlying thought behind these constellations is that they are places of potential personal power where the planetary energies are more strongly expressed. Besides the axis positions of the planets
column4: the so called Parans
column5: the points where planets intersect the formerly described lines
column6: become important when interpreting this kind of chart. Their influence can be felt within a radius of roughly 200 miles
column7: although the energy of the Paran also applies to the entire range of the degree of latitude. By choosing places that are important to you
column8: you can create relocation charts that can be subjected to detailed analysis.

column1: For example
column2: should you move to another city or country
column3: you can examine whether one of your natal planets is intersecting or aspecting one of these lines. Whether these energies manifest as rather problematic or as supportive
column4: depends on the planets involved.

column1: Apart from using Astro-Cartography in personal Astrology it is also applicable in mundane Astrology."

2645;PERSONAR_0000000000003268;The Personar;"This astrological technique was developed by Peter Orban and Ingrid Zinnel and serves as a tool to study a natal chart in greater depth. The basic underlying principle is the theory that human beings having multiple personalities at their disposal
column2: even if we are only partly aware of it. Therefore the natal chart can be understood as a stage where the planets adopt the role of archetypal (inner) persons. Of these
column3: we may be aware or not. They may even represent our Ego-ideal or
column4: on the contrary
column5: their existence may be denied. The twelve archetypes are: the warrior
column6: the beauty
column7: the intellectual
column8: the mother (the small child)
column9: the hero (the father)
column10: reason
column14: the old one (representing the law) and the master.

column1: Each Personar-Chart serves the purpose of further interpreting one of these inner persons. While the natal chart combines them
column2: they are isolated in the Personar
column3: in order to examine a certain inner person. This will be done by creating a horoscope of the particular moment when the natal sun arrives for the first time at the position being occupied by the  planet (person) concerned
column4: the natal chart being the Sun-Personar. Thus we arrive at the birth chart of this inner person associated with the sun. The interpretation of this archetype allows us to learn more about our hidden character traits
column5: hopefully leading to the acceptance of even the bad ones. Including the natal chart
column6: which is the Sun-Personar
column7: there are 10 Personars
column8: which provide a detailed description of the 12 archetypal persons (Venus and Mercury represent both two of these persons).

column1: The Pluto-Personar informs us about our fanatical traits. Pluto is associated with destruction and regeneration
column2: often resulting in sudden changes."

column1: The Mercury-Personar represents the 'Intellectual'
column2: whose existence is entirely based on his mental capacities
column3: as well as 'Reason'. The Mercury Personar's predominant life quest seems to be balancing all that is unbalanced. It also describes our approach to the challenges of the mundane world."

column1: 2648;PERSONARVENUS_0000000000003268;The Personar;"This astrological technique was developed by Peter Orban and Ingrid Zinnel and serves as a tool to study a natal chart in greater depth. The basic underlying principle is the theory that human beings having multiple personalities at their disposal
column2: even if we are only partly aware of it. Therefore the natal chart can be understood as a stage where the planets adopt the role of archetypal (inner) persons. Of these
column3: we may be aware or not. They may even represent our Ego-ideal or
column4: on the contrary
column5: their existence may be denied. The twelve archetypes are: the warrior
column6: the beauty
column7: the intellectual
column8: the mother (the small child)
column9: the hero (the father)
column10: reason
column14: the old one (representing the law) and the master.

column1: Each Personar-Chart serves the purpose of further interpreting one of these inner persons. While the natal chart combines them
column2: they are isolated in the Personar
column3: in order to examine a certain inner person. This will be done by creating a horoscope of the particular moment when the natal sun arrives for the first time at the position being occupied by the  planet (person) concerned
column4: the natal chart being the Sun-Personar. Thus we arrive at the birth chart of this inner person associated with the sun. The interpretation of this archetype allows us to learn more about our hidden character traits
column5: hopefully leading to the acceptance of even the bad ones. Including the natal chart
column6: which is the Sun-Personar
column7: there are 10 Personars
column8: which provide a detailed description of the 12 archetypal persons (Venus and Mercury represent both two of these persons).

column1: The Venus-Personar connects us with 'The Beauty' and 'The Other' within us. 'The Beauty' shows all the ingredients necessary to transform life into a joyful experience
column2: while delving deeply into 'The Other' may shed some light on who could be our 'Soul-Mate'.  This personar is associated with relationships in general."

column1: The Mars-Personar tells the tale of the warrior within us who energetically takes on the challenge of coming to terms with the daily tasks life has to offer."

column1: The Saturn-Personar represents the 'Old' or the 'Law-Representative'. Believing in traditional values
column2: he demands obedience and shows us the consequences of our actions. This Personar deals with the sometimes painful lessons life forced upon us
column3: but which serve the purpose of helping us to overcome inherent fears and inhibitions
column4: and helping us to find out more about our destiny in life."
